title: Not very impressed
review: I stayed here for one night before my return home so that I would be close to the airport. The hotel is clean and quiet, but it could use some updating. Staff was mostly friendly including the shuttle driver. The servers in the restaurant could have been nicer. But this hotel has a lot of little annoyances that added up:  1. Facial tissues in the bathroom consisted of three tissues in a plastic wrapper. Why is the hotel rationing tissues? Good thing I didn't have a cold when I stayed here.  2. The light-blocking curtains were difficult to find. For a minute, I thought I was going to be woken up by the sun rising.  3. There was a safe in the room. But it had no key. And why is it using a key in the first place? Even the rural B&B where I stayed before coming here had an electronic combination lock as did the two urban hotels in Spain where I stayed before that. Although I was only here for one night I still feel safer locking up my passport and cash in the safe and I couldn't do that here.  4. There was a noticeable gap in one of the hardwood floor boards, as if things were done carelessly or cheaply here. I've provided a photo.  5. The water temperature in the shower was uneven. I was constantly adjusting it.  I am not normally a "nit picker" (go read my other hotel reviews to see), but this kind of stuff made me feel like I wasn't getting a good value for my money.  I'm unlikely to stay here again the next time I'm in Barcelona - I'll likely go with another hotel near the airport next time.…

title: Awesome
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for leaving your extensive review on Tripadvisor. I have taken note of your feedback and will use it to improve our installations.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manage

title: Perfect hotel near airport
review: This hotel is perfect for a short stay.I highly recommend for people who need to have a shuttle.Also there is a cool pool and sauna.Breakfast is available at the price 14€ per person.Shuttle works 4-1am daily

title: Nice hotel handy for the airport
review: Dear Guest.  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you had such a great stay with us and we look forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Nice and Easy
review: We were so happy that we booked this hotel prior to our early morning flight.  It was a very nice hotel with good amenities.  The best part for us was the early (4:45 AM) free shuttle to the aiport to catch our early flight.  A lot of the airport hotels do not have this early service.  We did not purchase breakfast with our room because of our early flight, but we were able to take advantage of coffee, juice, and breakfast snacks offered in the bar area before we left.  We were totally surprised since we didn't expect this!  We would highly recommend this hotel!

title: Very nice hotel
review: Stayed here for the last leg of my trip with my boyfriend.  Area was walkable to La Rambla and our favorite cafe. Room service food was great. Spa and massages were good.  Staff was very friendly and helpful. Very clean hotel. The only bad part of our stay was the Temperature of our hotel room didn’t go below 21 c.   It was hot a lot of nights for us. But other than that the stay was great.

title: Very Thankful to the entire Staff!!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the review. I think however you have mistaken the review for another hotel. We are not within walking distance to La Rambla and if still have the air condition available so you would not have had any hot nights here.  Sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Cruising at Ciutat
review: My wife and I stayed at this hotel for one night only. We had the opportunity to take the advantage of using the transfer Shuttle that the hotel offers from the Barcelona Airport Station to the Hotel. We enjoyed the time there at the city of Prat and of course the great bread and coffee shops that surrounds the hotel.  The day after we left the hotel and the country, my wife noticed that she had left inside the safety, her jewelry bag (with several items inside), and her prescription glasses (in their case). She was indeed very mortified and worried for the lose of these things. However, when she called the hotel she was calmed by the great staff (Javi, Gerard and Alan) who said that they would look and check with the housekeeping Department. The last person she spoke with was…

title: Good option for staying near Barcelona airport
review: Dear Mr Wayne.  Thank you very much for your nice comments about our hotel, services and our staff. It makes us all very happy to read your nice words. Let us know if you want to us to send them to you or to keep them until your nex trip to Barcelona.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Luxury for not much money
review: We stayed here after a 2 week cruise because we had an early flight the next day.  We were able to check in at 10 am - we arrived about 9 a m .  What a surprise ! The rooms are nicely designed with a nice large bathroom and our room was very quiet.  All the staff were helpful and pleasant the main restaurant was closed but, we ate in the bar area.  Our wake up call arrived at 5 a m and the shuttle picked us up exactly on time.  I booked the cruise pkg - early check in breakfast included and a shuttle (about 15 min away) to the airport .  I would definitely stay here again - it's about 20 minutes from city center but it didn't matter.  With all the demonstrations we had no desire to make the trek. Thank you also for the tea kettle in the room 🌹

title: Lovely Place
review: Great service by front desks, kind personality and empaty. Well maintained clean room, lovely indoor heated pool. Easy to catch shuttle from airport terminal 1 - car park G. Nice local supermarket around  the corner. Surrounding is residential area.

title: good hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Hotel past its prime
review: The personal is welcoming, the bed is good, we slept well. About the restaurant, just good, now i find the price too excessive. a bit far from center city, if you take taxi which are in front of the hotel, you will pay approximately 20 euros it depends of taxi. Now, if you want discover and go with the metro it's enough far but you have for less of 10€. I have really like the shuttle even you have alone, the chauffeur bring back you to the airport.

title: 4 stars ... not for my experience
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good Hotel for Pre Cruise Stay
review: The website and Tripadvisor photos overstated the quality of this hotel.  The facility is old and although clean and functional, did not seem like particularly good value.  It is located in a working class residential suburb with some interesting local dining options a short walk away, and it is close to the airport.  For the price (130 Euros) I expected something a little higher in quality.

title: Airport hotel with free airport shuttle
review: Comfortable room on a Sunday night; though we weren’t on a cruise ship, many guests seemed to be coming and going from ships. Would have ranked higher, but overwhelming cigarette odor in the bathroom. Yuck!!

title: Good hotel near the airport
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am sorry to hear that the room smelled of smoke. The whole hotel is completely non smoking but unfortunately sometimes people decide to smoke anyway. We always ventilate for a long time to get the smoke out but I understand that in this particular case we fell short.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the rest of your stay with and we look forward to see back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good location, close to the airport
review: Needed a room to stay over one night for early morning flight and this hotel was perfect. Quiet, clean, good staff, everything you need and plenty of little restaurants within walking distance. Free shuttle to the airport.

title: Friendly staff.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your great review of our hotel.  We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to see you back with us again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good ecperience
review: Stayed there for one night and chose this hotel for the early shuttle to the airport. The young man that checked us in was a little distracted, because he put down for the shuttle a different room number and the next morning we were told there is no room for us in the van.  In the end  it proved that there was room and we made it to the airport in time. The rooms, grounds are clean, nice, stylish decor. We paid on the spot for dinner, which seemed a little pricy for the choices. Early in the morning they have a small station with coffee and some biscuits for a quick bite. Overall a good accommodation.

title: Handy to airport with airport shuttle available
review: I was in Room 125, which has a big bed, TV, desk, in-room safe and plenty of power sockets.  The bathroom is big, and has both a shower and bath, and there’s a hair dryer. The hotel provides a shuttle to the airport.

title: The worst hotel experience ever.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: A good stop the night before a flight out of BCN
review: This is a not client-centric hotel. The management is only interested in their revenue and not on client service.  Due to a strike in Barcelona Airport, we had a flight change and needed to book 2 rooms (we have 2 infant boys and there was no room available for 4). We made it wrong because we followed the days of the flights. We booked the 27th when we should have booked the 26th. We arrived at 01:30 AM and only at the hotel we noticed our confusion. We asked the cancellation at Booking.com and Booking said it only depends on the Hotel. We asked at the Hotel and they said that because it was Booking they couldn't   (this is not true). They charged the full 2 rooms that were empty (or not) on the 27th. If they cared about the client, they would charge the Booking.com service…

title: Nice hotel, could use more sound deadening
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor.  I am sorry to hear about the confusión you experienced when you made the booking the 24th of July. We do have a cancellation policy of only 24 hours which we do apply it on all the platforms we work with.   I understand your frustration  but we need at least that time to be able to sell the cancelled room.  If a guest should cancel after that we are forced to charge the first night.   If you need any further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good for brief stay
review: We stayed at this hotel the night before an international flight out of BCN in order to return our rental car in advance and have a stress-free van ride to the airport the next morning.  That worked great.  Hotel staff were very friendly and helpful.  Room was spacious and clean.  To our surprise, we heard no airplane noise at all.  The pool is smaller than it looks in the photos, but it was good to swim.  And while the neighborhood just north of the hotel is very industrial, two blocks south is an entirely different world: there are pedestrian streets through a residential neighborhood with small shops, restaurants, and a park where families were out enjoying the evening.  We had excellent Tapas at the Cèntric Gastrobar.

title: Overnight stop
review: Close to the airport with a free shuttle. Gave us an early check in, which gave us almost a full day to explore Barcelona. Tube fare into city centre only 2.20, taxi 20 euro. Room was good size and bed comfortable. Staff friendlyand helpful. Highly recommended.

title: Good Airport Hotel
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for your nice review of our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you had such a great experience with us and we look forward to see you back with us again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Close to the airport
review: It's a good hotel for maybe a night or two and you have an early morning flight. Rooms and bathroom were comfortable, breakfast was really good. The hotel also has in-house shuttle service to the airport which is about a 15 minutes ride. My shuttle at 12:45pm left right on time.   If you're looking for a hotel for a long stay, I wouldn't recommend as the neighborhood is pretty dead. There is a gas station across the street if you need snacks, water and the likes. Other than that, there isn't much going on. Highly recommend solely for the purpose of being in a situation where you would need to stay in close proximity to the airport.

title: Good hotel but unpleasant surprise on arrival
review: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our neighbourhood El Prat De Llobregat might surprise you if you give it a chance. There are plenty of restaurants, small shops and bars just a few minutes walk from the hotel.  Looking forward to see you back with us in the near future,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Not good as you pay
review: Located close to the airport, which only helped little since it took forever (52 minutes) for the free hotel shuttle to arrive. The hotel itself is ok but nothing special. You need to take a cab for 20-25 EUR to get to downtown Barcelona.

title: Not delivering.
review: Front of house (Allan) was attentive and excellent. The rest of the staff couldn't care a less and did not even try to provide customer service. The rooftop bar closed well before the advertised time and the house bar wasn't much better. Very limited range (no cocktails). Restaurant food was okay but wait staff were on another planet. Rooms were nice and comfortable but in summary the connection to the airport early the next morning was the highlight of this stay.

title: Very good
review: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am sorry that we this time didn't live up to your expectations. Our roof top bar we have open from 16:00 - 22:00 but as there are no roof we have been forced to close it some days in May as it has been more cold and wet than normal. I have taken not of your other comments and we will work on them to keep improving our service. I will make sure Alan read your nice comment. He will be very happy.  Hope to see you back with us again and then give you a better impression of our hotel.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: A good choice if you are staying overnight before flying out of Barcelona Airport
review: We arrived late, the restaurant was closed but their bar was open and we had some decent food. The waiter was super nice and helpful with our baby’s needs.  The room was equipped with a super nice crib, everything was clean, tidy and it was spacious.  Decor was simple but elegant.  The bathtub is not made for short people haha but otherwise the bathroom was awesome.  The shuttle took very long to pick us up but it was ready and very punctual in the morning to take us to the airport, the drivers were super kind.  It was only a night but we really enjoyed our stay.

title: From bad to worse
review: Dear guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and the service given by our staff!  Looking forward to see ypu back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Nice one
review: I found this hotel an excellent value for the price. The hotel has very nicely equipped rooms with lovely antique-type furniture, a bathtub in the bathroom, and ample closet and shelf space. The breakfast was nice with lots of fruit. It does not have a very attractive location and there was a frustrating 45 minute wait for shuttle service from the airport.

title: Dated
review: Was surprised at the lack of modern news in the room.  Gaudy dated gothic style furniture cheap beds and for sure needs modernising. Got to say was disappointed  Beds were 2 singles pushed together Not for me

title: excellent hotel
review: Dear guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with the tripadvisor community. I am sorry to hear that the style of our furniture didn't live up to your expectations. We are currently planning a complete refurbishment of all the rooms which will be done in the end of 2019. We both have twin beds and double beds in the hotel.  I hope to see you back in the near future,  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great airport hotel
review: after we book with the hotel, they immediatly sent us a e mail about how and where to found where the shuttle bus locate out side the terminal with photo and English on it. (it is hard if you don't know spoke and read ) , unlike the 2 other hotels we have cancel after booking,  because they all tell us we have to call the hotel when we arrived,then they will sent the shuttle, how can one call if you  don't speak any Spanish .And when we arrived, the shuttle is there, because they know what time our flight arrived, and they also arrange for us the shuttle back to the airport the next day to meet with our group. room is nice and clear, the best thing is they have all the bottle water at the gym for people to drink, { i found out the hard way on our tour in Spain all the hotel  and…

title: Great airport hotel
review: Dear Annie,  Thank you very much for leaving such a nice and extensive review. It's great to hear that you had such a great stay with us and that you enjoyed our services. We look forward to see you back with us again soon!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Excellent
review: When we stay near an airport we generally set our expectations low. However this hotel pleasantly surprised us. The staff were very obliging. The shuttle service was prompt. The rooms were interesting, attractive and clean . The only issue was that it was in a remote neighbourhood with not much around.

title: Lovely Spain
review: Our stay was very comfortable and enjoyable. The accommodation were exceptionally nice. Very affordable.  Room service was very prompt.  Dessert was delicious and not very costly. The breakfast was out of this world. The hotel concierge even offered to have the driver to take us to the metro. We declined, only because we needed to walk off the delicious breakfast. If by chance we were to miss our plane home we would stay here again.

title: Not pleasant
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your great review. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to see you back with us again soon!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: great alternative to the usual drab airport hotels
review: plus · Cleaning good. Breakfast very good.   minus· Check-in took half an hour, because the man spoke on the phone for 10 minute. He didn't apologize. We didn't have slippers in the room. We have asked the cleaning lady the next day and she brought them to us. The swimming pool is very small and it has cold water. In the last day, we took some doughnuts in some paper napkins from the breakfast to eat them on the way back. They put us to bring them back.

title: Neat and the shuttle is a plus
review: Dear Livia,  Thank you for taking the time to leave some comment.   Our breakfast is served as a buffet and as all the buffet around the world the food should be consumed inside the buffet room.   If you wish to buy some sandwiches or doughnuts to have for later on in the day we can also arrange that in our bar.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great location hotel, clean and nice rooms
review: This charming little hotel is a great alternative to the drab and anonymous airport hotels. It has a lovely pool, spa, and sauna, and the rooms, though old-fashioned, are clean and well-appointed. Bathrooms are large and have nice amenities. The hotel has a free shuttle bus leaving every half hour, and is ten minutes from Terminal One.

title: No A/C in rooms
review: We booked this hotel due to its great airport shuttle and staff, but what we learned later was that air conditioning in the rooms is not available until the hotel says so! So we opened the window only be hearing the load noise of Barcelona city and area! It was a very sleepless night! We will never stay here again!

title: Theft Issue
review: Dear Kathleen,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am sorry our hotel didn't live up to your expectations. During your stay we still had hot air in the rooms as we were in the winter period. Unfortunately we can only put either hot or cold air in the rooms and duirng most of March we have chose to keep the hot air on as it gets quite cool during the evening and night. We have now tsince a few days back urned on the A/C system in all bed rooms.  I hope we will get the opportunity to welcome you back on day to our hotel and that you get a better night sleep then.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: should be 5 star
review: My room got broken in. The lock on my Samsonite suitcase was damaged so skillfully and subtly that I hadn't realized my money inside was stolen until my last day of stay. I requested the hotel manager to report to the police, and asked him to clarify if the hotel has any CCTV in the hallways to see who entered my room. The hotel only sent me a police report in Catalan, and didn't bother answering my further queries nor offering any sort of compensation. My Catalan-speaking colleague told me the police report stated there was evidence of two strangers wandering around the hotel lobby and staircase for about 10 minutes. I suspect the housekeeping staff(s) is/are somehow involved in tipping the thieves off on which room(s) to target, as it's extremely unusual and suspicious why out…

title: Lots of problems
review: Dear Anthea,  Thank you for your mail. We have tried our best to get a clear picture of what happened during your stay.  As you didn't notice any theft until you had left the hotel and the country, I helped you make a police report with the local police based on the details that you had provided us and for you to have a report of what you claimed had happened.     Your suspicion that our housekeeping staff should be involved in some criminal activity is just absurd and unfair.  Barcelona has a well known problem with petty theft and as a hotel we are working closely with the police to prevent and solve any case of theft and especially during the Mobile World Congress the police dedicate more resources to security for the congress delegates.   Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Again
review: loved this hotel, attention to detail everywhere, super clean, food in bar was incrtedible, staff were great, it really felt more than a 4 star, ive stayed in lots of hotels nr el rat and this is the best, well done guys

title: Good location but poor customer service
review: A total of 4 of us arrived at the hotel late afternoon on 26JAN19 standing in front of the check-in counter waiting for check-in. A middle age individual believed to be a manager was standing in front of and blocking the check-in counter. He chatted with a guest for about 15 min totally ignoring the 4 of us waiting impatiently at the counter. Neither the staff behind the counter and this individual greeted us. He then walked away after finishing his chat and returned to an office without greeting us or even a word of apologies for our wait. This is the worst experience we encountered at a 4 star hotel. Other than this poor experience, location and free airport shuttle would still be a plus.

title: Acceptable airport hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments on Tripadvisor.  I have reviewed our camaras to see what happened while you were checking in. The man you mention is our Food & Beverage manager and he wasn't blocking the desk but was with a guest who will celebrate their wedding in our hotel and needed the attention of the recepcionist to register a prepayment.  I am sorry to hear that you felt you were ignored but I can assure it was a misunderstanding as it was another guest who was before you. Normally we have two recepcionist but during the time you checked in he was at his dinner break.  Hope to be able to see you back with us in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Nice hotel
review: Acceptable airport hotel, not so close to airport, even if it is in el Prat. It is difficult to find with a car. Rooms a bit outdated.Parking in the basement. Nice personnel, kitchen open until late hours.

title: Nice hotel, the kids loved the pool
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments about our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your overall stay with us and look forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Clean, comfortable, very good value for the money
review: This is a good choice for staying close to the airport.  The room was basic, but fairly comfortable. My husband thought that he could smell smoke although it was designated a non smoking room. The restaurant opened at 8:00 which was a little late for us, but we had a satisfying meal in the bar area. Breakfast was excellent. The staff was pleasant. The shuttle was easy to use both from and back to the airport.

title: Quaint and close to the airport
review: The staff was extraordinarily helpful, the room very comfortable and clean, and the breakfast was terrific! The airport shuttle was quite efficient and courteous as well - all for a great price. We had a hard time regulating the thermostat, but that could just be due to our inexperience with the European system.  I'm confident, though, had we been staying longer than the 15 hours we were there, that we'd have asked at the front desk and someone would have been there on the spot!   The staff was very friendly and went above and beyond to accommodate our requests, without seeming to be inconvenienced by unprepared Americans.  LOL

title: Cleanest hallways I ever saw!
review: Dear Heidi,  Thank you very much for your great comments. We are very happy to hear that you had such a wonderful stay with us. I will make sure our staff read your nice words. They will be very happy!  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren Director

title: Clean and comfortable, could use an update
review: Very clean rooms and certainly the cleanest hallways I ever saw in any hotel! Comfortable beds. The rooms are not the largest but for two people it's ok. Excellent breakfast with many, many dishes to choose from. You won't leave hungry!

title: Best worst experience
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and your breakfast in our restaurant.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Worst hotel ever
review: The rooms were quite adequate, and the building had a historic feel. We had a very nice dinner in the restaurant. The front desk arranged for a taxi to take us to the airport, since our morning flight was to early for the shuttle.

title: Great airport shuttle
review: I was very impressed by this hotel. It exceeded my expectations for a convenient hotel as an overnight stay to get to the airport. Communication was easy to clarify using the shuttle and came with detailed and illustrated instructions.   The shuttle from the airport comes every 45 minutes, which is not bad. You just get to the parking lot and wait for it among other shuttle buses.   The shuttle to the airport you schedule it at the front desk. It seems to come every half hour or so, which is very convenient.   It's about a 10 minute shuttle each way - for the price alone saved on taxis, this place was worth it.   The hotel rooms were very clean and soundproof as well. Beds were comfortable and bathrooms were in clean and excellent condition.   Getting into Barcelona city wasn't…

title: Reasonable
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Yes, our shuttle pass by the two terminals in Barcelona airport every 30-45 minutes depending on the time of the day.  We look forward to see you back with us again soon!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Short stay before and after Mediterrain Cruise
review: Stayed here for two nights before catching a flight back to Australia. Arrived very late and literally fell into bed.Breakfast (which was included) the next morning was mediocre,the buffet was certainly not copious and seemed to be replenished with one or two extra items which were almost fought over by the quite large amount of restaurant patrons. Second day was much the same..."Excuse me,"Have you got any butter"......"Here".....".That's actually margarine" ......."We have no butter"......walks away.  Am I being over the top!...Maybe,but for the $445.00 AUS we paid, a pat of butter would have spread a little love! Also the roof top bar, supposedly open to 9 pm was closed and our swim in the quite impressive covered roof top pool  was dampened due to several workmen digging…

title: Good quality convenient stay
review: Dear Phil,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed most of your stay with us.  I have taken note of your comments regarding the breakfast. We do actually both have butter and margarine on our breakfast buffet. I will make sure to talk our breakfast to make sure they all aware of which is butter and which is margarine.  We were reforming the swimming pool 3 weeks ago and it's now up to the highest standard possible regarding control of PH and quality of the water. I am sorry that there was some noise while they were working but it had to be done.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: A welcome relief after hours cramped on a plane
review: The hotel was clean and pleasant. We chose them because they had service to and fro Barcelona airport and the Barcelona port for our cruise. The room was clean. Service at the breakfast buffet was good. Lunch in the hotel was nice as well.

title: Perfect airport hotel
review: This 4 star hotel is in the most perfect location at only 10 minutes away from the airport, and its reception is open 24 hours a day. It has a free shuttle service which runs every 30 minutes from 4:45am to 1:45am. You can also call the hotel to get the shuttle to pick you up if you don't want to wait like we did. We stayed at this hotel on 2 different occasions and were very impressed by the speedy pick up in a large comfortable shuttle bus, the professionalism at reception, and the clean, bright, tastefully decorated rooms. We were given a welcome cocktail at the bar and also had very good tapas there at a reasonable price.The highlight for me was the breakfast buffet which is included in the price and had an excellent selection of delicious fresh food. For travelers who have…

title: Hotel near Barcelona Airport
review: Dear Fiona,  Thank you very much for your nice comments about our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you had such a great stay with us during the two times you visit us. Looking forward to see you back with us again soon!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Perfect spot near airport
review: This hotel was near the Barcelona Airport.  It you have a late arrival or early departure, like I did, it is a good choice.  If you want downtown Barcelona, it is not.  Room was fine, about what you might expect.  The only complaint has probably more to do with Barcelona rather than the hotel.  The water was the most heavily chlorinated that I experienced on this trip.  I would recommend drinking bottled water if you are staying here.

title: Airport hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Nice hotel close to airport
review: Pleasant staff, quiet rooms in a neighborhood with shops and restaurants.  We stayed after our cruise so we could be close to the airport. We were able to get into our room early. Enjoyed the rooftop bar and the morning breakfast was fantastic!

title: Enjoyable stay
review: Stayed here pre cruise on their cruise package.collection from airport and transfer to port after hotel stay first class!. Hotel itself in a residential area,but close shops,cafes and supermarkets. Staff very helpful and friendly. Room nice and clean. Food:good selection at breakfast. Lunch in main restaurant Superb. Food in lobby bar area Excellent. Hotel has a small indoor pool and gym with a sun terrace attached. As well as the lobby bar there is outside bar on the top floor,opens at 5pm. Hotel charges €10 for safe key which you get back when you checkout. All-in all an enjoyable stay,would definitely stay here again if in Barcelona it's away from the hustle and bustle of the city centre.

title: Good Experience
review: Dear Ian  Thank your your comments regarding your recent visit. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and our food and beverage department which is something we work hard on to keep up a high standard..   Looking forward to see you back with us again in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Close to Airport
review: We chose this hotel for it's close proximity to the airport, because we had an overnight in Barcelona between our evening flight from Lisbon and our flight to Charlotte early the next afternoon.  For this it was an excellent decision.  It is not the typical American chain, so be aware that some of the common items that one expects may not be found.  For instance, there were no wash cloths in the room.  For those who have stayed in European hotels, this will not come as a surprise.  We found the décor charming and the staff was friendly and spoke English.  After a walk around the area, we determined that our best option for dinner was at the hotel.  The meal in the restaurant was quite tasty.  The hotel has a rooftop lounge, but we didn't know this until we were on our way to bed…

title: Hotel is okay but could be better
review: Dear Kathy,  Thank your your comments regarding your recent visit. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We do have wash cloths on demand, I have taken note to improve the information given by our staff on check in.  Looking forward to see you back with us again in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Hotel is fine. Restaurant, not so much.
review: Some good things about, close to airport, have shuttle in and out and a honest restaurant. We just stayed for the overnight between two flights and works fine. The shuttle free in and out save enough to have a goid meal at the hotel restaurant. The rooms are ok, a little dark ages for me, but clean and with a good free internet.

title: Just like it seems
review: Basic hotel, worth it if you have a stopover and many hours to wait! Kind staff :) Clean but dated rooms, with basic courtesy kit. We had also dinner in the restaurant, nice food, average prices. Service shuttle available!

title: Good hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope to welcome you back to our hotel very soon!  Sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Hotel good, Location not so good.
review: Arrived needing to drop hire car off at airport, staff very helpful and used the shuttle service back from the terminal which was 10 minutes, had tapas in bar which was excellent and good portions (I’m not usually a tapas fan!). Staff all helpful, room comfy and clean.

title: Great staff, good food, comfortable ,clean  and well decorated property.
review: Dear Judit,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.  Sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Bad and good
review: Hotel was clean, nicely decorated and nicely furnished.  I did not feel comfortable in the area around the hotel and believe the food offerings were limited.  This is a good place for an overnight layover, but I do not recommend a long-term stay.

title: Great hotel !
review: We were in a hurry after having missed our flight and immediately we needed a hotel. What a surprise! We were met by wonderful surroundings! Specially thanks to Albert, the receptionist, who gave us all necessary information. He was very forthcoming and efficient and provided us with all details about our stay. World class service! Thanks Albert!

title: Fine and convenient but watch out...
review: Dear Johann,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your comments on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will make sure that Albert will read your nice review. He will be very happy!  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon!  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: So much noise
review: Conveniently located near the airport for one overnight stay before catching an early morning flight. Service, facilities and sleep quality are all fine.  One word of warning: Barcelona is unfortunately known for thieves and pickpockets, but one would not expect them in this hotel lobby. While taking a drink at the hotel lobby bar, a guy who pretended to read the menu was definitely making a move to grab my wife’s handbag. When he saw he was spotted he dropped his menu and disappeared immediately. One should be always careful, and the hotel should definitely enhance security.

title: Very Convenient Location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments on Tripadvisor. We are happy to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us. The security of our guest and their belongings is something we take very seriously we have trained staff and cameras in all the public areas the hotel.  In the situation you are discribing it seems however that he slipped through our security measures. I am glad to hear that you were able to stop the thief.  Looking forward to see you back again with us in the future.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great overnight
review: This hotel is not very isolator so There is so much noise everytime somebody moves in the hotel and the aircondition is Also very noisy. Nice people Worning There but sleeping Quality is terrible. The hotel is very Close to the airport

title: Nice hotel; convenient to airport
review: Recently my husband and I spent a night at Ciutat del Prat.  It is extremely convenient to Barcelona Airport--about 15 minutes--with a free shuttle both ways.  Do make reservations for the shuttle when you arrive. The hotel is clean, quite modern, has a restaurant, and the breakfast (which costs 13 euros/each) is very good and very convenient. Wifi is free in room. I would say this hotel is a business hotel.  It's in the newer part of the city and doesn't seem to have any major attractions near it.

title: Overnight stop
review: Dear Ellen,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and our services. Our hotel is located in El Prat de Llobregat and although we don't have any major attractions here, the little village has many bars, restaurant and small shops and also a beach and a big natural park with many different birds and other animals just a short bus ride from the hotel.   Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Near Barcelona Airport
review: The hotel room needs a little updating/ tidying up repairs. Roof top bar excellent as were the mojitos. One of best we have had anywhere we have travelled.  Needed a bit more clarity as to instructions when meeting FREE bus from airport.

title: the best of hotels near Barcelona Airport
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and the great Mojitos that our bartenders prepares up on the roof top bar. I have also taken note of your suggestions.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good airport location
review: The hotel is located near to Barcelona international airport, good rooms, nice food, welcoming staff, small indoor swimming pool and sauna. A small gym with few equipment only. They do have a schedule Bus from and to the airport. I recommend for those who have connections to take and/or in transit from and to Barcelona Airport.  Thank you

title: Very convenient for airport and good connections to city
review: Well located to airport, with transfers starting at 4.45am. Excellent connections to central Barcelona (I got a last train back on a Sunday evening around midnight from central Barcelona). Area is fine to walk around - a bit deserted but not unsafe. Rooms comfortable. Restaurant food decent. Staff were very nice with excellent English (thank-you!!!)

title: Good choice at the airport
review: Dear Louise,  Thank you very much for your nice comments about your recent stay with us. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed our hotel. I will make sure our staff read your nice words. They will be very happy!  Looking forward to see you back soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very dissapointing
review: Our flight from Manchester arrived three hours late so when we called the hotel the Concierge suggested we take a cab and the hotel picked up the charge. Having arrived in the middle of the night we didn't see much of the hotel's facilities however, next morning the breakfast was first rate. Our room was clean and quiet so no complaints. At around £100 Salles Hotel represents good value for an airport stay.

title: Terrible Service - bed is rock hard and television did not work in room.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for reviewing our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with although it was shorter than predicted. We look forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great choice near the airport
review: Checked in here the night before flying home, and whilst the location together with the shuttle bus service to the Airport is ideal, the hotel was to say the least very dissapointing. Little or no athmosphere or ambience in the public areas, staff behind the bar arguing and complaining, a room which was not soundproof and therefore very noisy and finally a shower which did not work effectively, we only discovered this prior to our departure .(The issues with regard to the noise and the shower) were brought to the attention of the reception staff on our check out)  This is not a cost effective hotel and standards need to be significantly higher,I could not reccommend this hotel to other travelers.

title: Airport Stopover
review: I was very impressed with the hotel.  The bedroom and bathroom was spotless with lovely sheets and towels.  A nice way to spend the evening before a long trip home.  They have a shuttle bus as well.  Would highly recommend this hotel for an airport stopover.

title: Wonderful stay.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for reviewing our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you had such a great stay with us and that you enjoyed our room services.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Let me out!
review: We cannot day enough about this hotel and the location.  First off, if flying in there they have an airport shuttle to/from the hotel/airport.  EXCELLENT.  Then check in was fast and, friendly.  Room was very spacious as well as bathroom was spacious.  Very CLEAN!!!  The breakfast buffet in the morning is wonderful and a great way to start your day. Also, the bar on  the 5th floor makes wonderful drinks/tapas and has a great rooftop view. We stayed a total of 2 days before we embarked on a cruise and then 2 days when we returned from our cruise.  So 4 days total.  On our last day there we took a 10 minute cab ride down to the El Prat beach & ate @ beachside restaurant (El Calmar)...I'm sure I spelled that wrong.  The wonderful hotel front desk clerk recommended to us to visit…

title: Nice Hotel, Good Location
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your extensive review of our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you such a great stay with us and especially happy to hear your nice words about our staff. I will make sure they read your words. They will be very happy! A lot of people don't know it but yes we have a beach in El Prat de Llobregat and it's very nice! I am happy that you got to experience it and that you enjoyed your meal at the beach side restaurant El Calamar.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very nice
review: My wife and I together with friends checked into the hotel then I left with one friend to return the rental vehicle to Avis at the airport. While searching around trying to find the rental car drop off area my mobile kept ringing. After 3 lots of calls I pulled over out of the traffic and answered it. It was wife in a distressed state phoning for help as she was trapped in 1 of the 2 lifts at the hotel and the lift emergency bell and phone were not working and despite banging on the lift door for 10 minutes no one was answering. I phoned reception who did not seem overly concerned about my wife predicament. Fortunately 2 cleaners heard her finally and eased open the lift doors and helped her climb down out of the lift - not sure if that was a safe thing for her to do? The…

title: NOT AS YOU SEE IN PICTURES
review: Hotel walls are thin like hell. You hear every single voice and can’t sleep at all. Breakfast is very weak. Tables are not clean in breakfast room. Water heat and power is not strong enough and cold and hot changes every 5 seconds. The wood bad is old like hell and makes crazy voice in every move. And this voice can be kill your sleep. Rooms are also very very small. Not see anything from your windows. Also air condition is not properly working, lots of voice but no cold. Finally bath is too old and not clean in total. I didn’t like it. I do not recommend. It does not worth for 120€ per night.

title: Has all the bases covered
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor.com.   I am sorry to hear that our hotel didn't live up to your expectatations. I have taken note of all your inputs and I will discuss them with my maintentance manager. Normally our hotel is very quiet and for this reason we work with many airline crews so they can get a good rest before their flight.  Again, I am sorry that you had such a bad experience and I hope that we will get a second chance in the future to show you the relaxing hotel with good services that are known for.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Free Shuttle - Nice Hotel
review: An airport hotel that knows it's role and executes it completely and professionally is what I experienced during my recent stay.  Airport pickup was reliable and on time from public parking terminal. If you have alot of baggage you may want to consider taking a taxi instead as it is a bit of walk through the terminal to the designated pick up points for all the transfer services including car rentals. Transfers both ways was free, tipping for the transfer driver who handles your luggage is optional.  Hotel itself is about a ten minute drive from the airport in a quiet and safe residential area. Featuring a modern architecture, the exterior of this seven story hotel has alot of eye appeal although one  of the glass panels had a large crack in it and needs to be replaced.  There…

title: Hotel offers free airport shuttle within 15-minute trip of airport. Comfortable but restaurant so-so.
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for writing such a detailed review about our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you had such a great stay with us.   Looking forward to see you back with us again in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great hotel!
review: They offer a free shuttle to and from the airport which runs about every 30 minutes. The hotel is in a good location, staff are friendly and helpful and the rooms clean and tidy. An excellent choice for an overnight

title: Over night
review: We stayed here on April 28 2018 We arrived earlier than check in time and they had a room already for us. Our room was clean, bed was very comfortable. We had drinks and a light bite to eat. Breakfast was delicious and a ride to our ship, in all a great place and nice people, I would stay there again.

title: Nice hotel near the airport with a good staff
review: Dear Rose Marie,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your comments about our hotel. It's great to hear that you had such a nice stay with us and we look forward to see you back with us in a near future.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Salles Hotel
review: Stayed in Barcelona for a night before a morning flight. Hotel staff was very helpful and the airport shuttle was efficient. Hotel is also a short walk(8-10mins) to train into Barcelona.  The hotel is what you would expect from an airport hotel. Rooms were clean and basic but for the price relative to the other airport hotels, this was a great choice. it is about a 10 minute trip to the airport, so if that suits your travel plans, it is worth the price and location.

title: OK for a one night stay
review: Dear David,  Thank you very much for your nice comments about our hotel and staff. I will make sure our staff reads your nice words. They will be very happy!  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Ok
review: Modern, clean hotel near Barcelona Airport with free airport shuttle service. Very friendly multi lingual front desk staff.  Nice rooms with large bathroom.  Will use again on future trips to Barcelona.

title: Great location for Barcelona Airport
review: We stayed at Salles Hotel Ciutat del Prat the night before we flew out of Barcelona. We arrived by rental car and the hotel allowed us to unload our suitcases, take them to our room, and gave us directions on where to find the return shuttle from the airport to the hotel. We returned the car and arrived back at the hotel. The room is beautifully furnished and it had our first king size bed since our travels in Spain. The next morning we took the shuttle back to the airport and arrived in less than 10 minutes! We would certainly use this hotel again when flying out of Barcelona.

title: Good for a short stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you had such nice stay with us.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon!  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: GREAT SHUTTLE SERVICE BETWEEN AIRPORT AND PORT
review: This hotel is great for a short stay if you are waiting for transit or have missed a flight. Very close to the airport and the staff are very professional and are happy to help you whenever. Rooms and bathrooms were very clean. One bonus is they have a free shuttle to take you to/from the airport.

title: Excels and Exceeds ! Sublime food !
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you had such nice stay with us and that you enjoyed our transfer service.  We look forward to see you back with us again soon!  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Ok hotel, great shuttle service
review: Stayed here night before cruise departure.  Close to airport, with free shuttle pickup (about 30 minute wait at airport shuttle departure point until shuttle arrived), also includes free shuttle to port on morning of departure.  Located a fair distance from centre of Barcelona.  Nice lounge where we had a late night meal and drink.  Check out on mornings of cruise departures can be slower due to number of people doing the same, so check out early.  Rooms quite adequate for overnight, in transit accommodation.  Will be using again.

title: Great Choice for an Early Flight
review: We checked into the hotel the afternoon before our early flight, to avoid traveling to the airport in the morning from the city center.  Check-in was prompt and courteous, and included a free drink because we had booked on-line.  We reserved an early shuttle time to the airport, which was the primary reason for booking this particular hotel.  In part because our four-night stay at an apartment in Barcelona had been less than pleasant due to a lack of heat, our room was extremely comfortable.  Yes, the bed was two twins pushed together, but it was not a problem.  Walking through the neighborhood that afternoon, we found several convenient groceries and restaurants.  Our shuttle time was too early to take advantage of the buffet, but we were able to see it on our way out, and it…

title: Wonderful, helpful staff!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you had such a great stay with us and we look forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Basic hotel, but acceptable for an overnight before a morning flight
review: Location is ideal for the Barcelona El Prat airport and runs a free shuttle to both terminals. Great spot to relax for a night after leaving cruise ship. Plenty of eating places within a short stroll and a decent breakfast. Staff simply could not have been more helpful. Although, we didn't have time to use it, pool area look inviting.

title: No complaints
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. I am happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and and our services. I will make sure that the staff will read your nice words. They will be very happy!  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great Hotel Arriving in Barcelona
review: The room was acceptable and functional, albeit fairly rudimentary. The beds in our room were two twins pushed together with minimalist bedding and the mattress was quite firm. Hard would be another description.  The breakfast, in a huge room setup for lots of guests, was ok. The shuttle service to the airport worked perfectly and was quick. Make sure when you check-in to reserve your space on the shuttle for the appropriate time.  I would recommend this hotel for an early morning flight, because it is so convenient to get to the airport. If you have an afternoon or later flight, I would suggest staying in the city.

title: Great airport hotel
review: Quick free shuttle from the airport but you might have to wait a bit, we did. Second time we have stayed as their cruise package is handy.  Includes the shuttle to your ship, about a 20 minute drive.  We stayed two nights this time so we could look around Barcelona.  The front desk staff were excellent, Imma helped me get wifi set up as well as getting online tickets to Sagrada Familia.  She explained how to find the train station (15 minute walk) and what train to take to get downtown.  The breakfast was good, hot and cold selections.  It was nice having a kettle for tea and coffee in our room as well as a fridge.  We ordered pizza from room service and it was good, arrived quickly too.  The room was ok, window opens so you can get fresh air, bathroom stocked with necessary…

title: Free airport shuttle for this nice hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and the attention given by our front desk staff. I will make sure Imma reads your nice comments. She will be very happy.   Regarding the problem with the cleanliness in your room, I can assure you it  has been taken care of. Cleanliness is the most important part in our hotel and to be able to keep a high standard we don't outsource any of our our staff but hire and train them ourselves.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: very good
review: Coming off a cruise on the MSC Meraviglia in Barcelona and deciding what flight to return to Miami, the only non stop was at 10:45 am Barcelona to Miami.  MSC printed schedule and follow up phone call advised the ship would dock in Barcelona at 9:00 am and we could expect an hour or more by the time we left the vessel.  This information proved false, as the ship docked at 7:30 AM, but nevertheless we had to book a hotel for an overnight stay in order to get the flight the next day.  Our research revealed that this hotel Salles Ciutat Del Prat Hotel was good and offered a free shuttle to the airport, so we booked it.  We checked in early and were happy to see they had a room immediately (10 AM) for us.  The room was very nice, clean, had wi fi and cable tv (not too many english…

title: Food allergy friendly!
review: Dear  Richard,  Thank you very much for taking your time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you had such a great stay with us and that you enjoyed our surrounding neighborhood El Prat De Llobregat.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Delightfully surprised
review: a very good hotel near the airport of barcelona with shuttle buss to the airport free wifi every where nice n polite stuff very good breakfast !!! little difficult parking around  they charge their on the basement

title: Nice hotel for our last night in Spain
review: Truly enjoyed our stay at this hotel prior to flying home.  Clean room, ample space in the nice clean room and great shower facility. Dinner at the hotel was equally good as we couldn't find any suitable place nearby the hotel. Nice, friendly staff.  Would stay again when traveling through Barcelona.

title: Excellent way to arrive in Barcelona!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave some comments on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you had such a nice stay with us and that you enjoyed a nice meal in our Simfony Restaurant!  We look forward to welcome you back with us again soon!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: I doubt I'd book a room here again.
review: We expected an 'okay' hotel in booking this hotel, but we walked off the plane into a hotel with beautiful marble floors and walls and spacious rooms. We were so comfortable and thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the hotel. It is a bit of a hike to the center of town, but completely doable if just for a day or two. We will be staying here if we return to Barcelona!

title: Pleasant surprise near airport
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave some comments on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you had such a nice stay with us and that you were so positively surprised about our hotel!  We look forward to welcome you back with us again soon!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Super Precruise Stay
review: Myself and my family booked an over night stay in this hotel before connecting with a cruise. The hotel was clean and modern and the rooms were well provisioned. Unfortunately that's the best I can say, the food on offer in the bar area was basic and the breakfast menu was poor. The food took time to arrive and the best I could say was it was mostly edible.  Some of us asked for a chicken salad sandwich and were presented with processed chicken which shocked us all. Others had asked for a beef burger well done and received meat that looked like it had been flash fried/grilled.   My sister accidentally left her iPad in the pool area, when she went back to get it, it had gone, I'd like to point out we were the only ones using the area at the time. When she approached reception to…

title: Quietest airport hotel I have ever stayed at
review: I used this hotel the night before a flight. I bussed from Valencia right to Prat Terminal 1 and caught the shuttle to the hotel from there. The instructions for where to get the bus were excelent including photos of key spots along the way. All interactions were professional and efficient. I requested a room on a high floor, quiet and away from elevators....which is what I got. There seemed to be a bit of ghostly plumbing or elevator noise but once closing the inner door, all was silent. No airplane noise, no traffic noise even though I faced a traffic circle. Blackout curtains were great. Windows open for fresh air. Heating was adequate, but not too hot. Big bathroom with tub.  Ask at the front desk for pool towels and robes.  Booking directly on their website entitles you to…

title: Very convenient for Sleep, Park and Fly at BCN airport!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are very happy to read that you had such a great stay with us and that you enjoyed a peaceful night sleep.   We look forward to see you back with us again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Modern Hotel, Close To The Airport; Easy Travel To Barcelona Centro
review: We've stayed at Ciutat del Prat a number of times over the years (I think the first time was in 2012) and we've always come back due to the great location and lovely service. The price has gone up for the offer of being able to leave your car there while on holiday but I suppose that should be expected after five years...! I feel more confident leaving the car in the safety of their underground car park than in a dirt lot near the airport. Plus, added bonus of a night in a comfortable room, friendly service from reception and bar staff, and a hassle free shuttle ride to the airport in the morning! Welcome cocktail for booking through their own website added bonus.  Looking forward to our stay again next month.

title: Great place to stay before cruise
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave some comments about your stay in our hotel. We are very happy to read to that you have visit us several times! It's true that the price of our parking offer has gone up a bit since 2012 but it's still a great deal! We look forward to see you back with us again next month!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Average to good hotel, convenient for airport
review: We stay here every time we come to Barcelona via plane. They have a free shuttle from the airport. It’s a modern Hotel. The staff is excellent. The rooms are clean and comfortable with refrigerators in the rooms. Walking a couple blocks brings you to the train station, where the R2 line brings you right into Barcelona Centro. The third stop is Passeig de García. You come out on the street and right across from Casa Batlló, one of Gaudi’s famous masterpieces of architecture. The hotel is a great place to stay.

title: Nice Hotel. Close to Airport.
review: Stayed here on our last night in Spain. Easy shuttle from Airport to hotel and back to Airport in the morning. Javier checked us in and was very nice and helpful. Room was nice and clean. Hotel is walking distance to neighborhood restaurants and bars. Would stay here again for quick stopover.

title: Airport hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your nice comments. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your short stay with us. I will make sure Javier will read your nice words. He will be very happy. Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good hotel for short staying
review: We stayed at Salles Hotel Ciutat del Prat as we had an early morning flight out.  It is an okay choice for Barcelona but not especially convenient as compared to airport hotels in other cities.  Our bed was comfortable, the bathroom was spacious and all was very clean.  The shuttle was at an inconvenient time for our flight, so we took a cab to the airport.  The hotel is not in a very nice neighborhood but is okay if you must be near the airport.  We enjoyed drinks and a bite in the rooftop bar.

title: Great hotel for a stopover
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your comments on tripadvisor. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed yourt stay with and our Sunset Bar. The airport in Barcelona do not have any hotel within walking distance from the terminals and the three closest hotels to the airport are all more or less at the same distance. What difference us from the others is that we are located in the village of El Prat de Llobregat which gives our guest an option to enjoy our small city center with several shops, cafés and small restaurants.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very clean.  Amazing breakfast.    Felt it was a safe area
review: I have been here few times as It is very convenient for a short staying. You need to call in for the Shuttle and the pickup at the airport is a little complicated due to constructions and few designated areas. Clean but a little old and noisy (guests speaking loudly at night). There are good restaurants around this area but generally closed on Monday & Tuesday for dinner. Very good breakfast.

title: Wake up call
review: The hotel exterior is nice and welcoming.It was a breeze when we checked in,the receptionists are accommodating and checked us in an hour earlier.The room is a little bit old looking probably because of the old furnishings but the bathroom is big and clean.  The only requests that we asked was a wake up call at 2am which was not done😳The graveyard shift receptionist is not friendly and I guessed he did not read the endorsement of the previous receptionist.I saw the log book that I requested a wake up call but he missed it.I was fully paid, but he's still asking us for some paper works when I asked for my receipt.But eventually,he read that We're all set to go.  May I suggests that weighing luggages be free of charge since we've been paying a big amount for a few hours of stay. …

title: A few problems for an airport hotel
review: Dear Rosalin,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. I am sorry we didn't live up to your expectations of our hotel and the lack of of service you experienced when checking out. On the other hand our breakfast buffet opens at 06:00 and we have a large variety of fruits, hold and cold food, different type of bread and much more. For the people that leaves on the early transfer when do don't have our breakfast buffet open we offer a complimentary small breakfast which consist in some pastries and tea & coffee.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Nice Hotel
review: We chose this hotel because of its proximity to the airport and good reviews.  There was a long line of people when we checked in, but the process seemed okay.  We asked for a wake up call in the morning as we had a very early flight to catch. There is nowhere to eat here, others than the hotel restaurant, which was also okay. The next morning, we did not get a wake up call.  Luckily my husband had set his watch, or we would have missed our flight.  When we asked about the wake up call at the desk, we were told that no one had ordered it.  Which seemed strange as we discussed it at length when we checked in. The hotel offers a shuttle to the airport.  Unfortunately, the driver had no idea of which terminal had which carriers.  He dropped us off somewhere in between the two…

title: Good stay, nice room
review: Dear Marsha,  Thank you for your comments about our hotel. I am sorry to hear that we didn't wake up you up in the morning. It's of course not acceptable that we didn't taken note of your request. I will follow this up with the recepction team to make sure it doesn't happen again.  In Barcelona airport the hotel transfers are only allowed to stop at designated spaces thus the walk to come into the terminal. Our shuttle drivers have been working with us for several years and they know where most of the check in desk of the carriers are located and try to help as much as they can. The two airport terminals at Barcelona Airport are 7km apart so I doubt that he left you in the middle. There are also screens when you come in to the terminals to let you know where your check in desk are.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Just what it seems.
review: Very nice, clean hotel. Several restaurants within walking distance. Rooftop bar/restaurant very nice. Helpful staff. Had problems printing boarding passes because business center was being repaired. Alberto was very helpful and guided me through it  right at the front desk using his computer.

title: Good hotel - would use again
review: I booked this hotel for 1 night due to travelling from Barcelona airport the next morning.   When checking in the first thing we were asked was if we needed he airport shuttle. I said yes we needed the very first shuttle of the morning. He went to put our names down but couldn´t seem to find our room number so carried on with the checkin procedure and took my credit card details very quickly.  After we went up to our room I said to my boyf that I didnt remember him putting our names on the shuttle list so when we went out for food I asked and I was right. He was very quick to take the payment details but had completely overlooked the shuttle and that first transfer was important for us not to miss. Not impressed but glad I checked.  The room allocated to us was clean and…

title: Great hotel for airport layover
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your great comments about our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. I am sorry that we forget to note your roomnumber correctly. We understand that our shuttle and the puntuality is very important for our guests and for we never leave anyone behind for the first shuttle. If needed we order extra taxis to make sure everyone gets to the airport.   We look forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Overpriced Lousy Service
review: We stayed overnight here on a layover from Mallorca to Athens.   The free ride from the airport on the hotel’s shuttle van was quick.  Our room on a high floor overlooking a main street was completely quiet.  The hotel was too far away from the center of Barcelona to go there for dinner after we checked in.  The receptionist recommended two restaurants in the neighborhood which were open on Monday nights (when most of the other restaurants in El Prat were closed).  After enjoying the free welcome cocktail, we set off to explore the neighborhood on our way to dinner.    Our arrangements booked directly with the hotel included a buffet breakfast which had an extensive variety of excellent food – highly recommended! We were delighted by the quality of the rooms (small) and interior…

title: Unbelievable
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your great comments about our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and our delicious breakfast. We look forward to see you back with us for your next visit or layover in Barcelona.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Would book again!
review: I booked two rooms in this Barcelona airport hotel on October 5th in Barcelona for a 6:00am flight to the USA.  Why did I choose this hotel?  First, they had a free shuttle leaving at 4:45 am, they spoke Englilsh, had good reviews, etc.  It was certainly pricey at 160 euros a night but after a long European trip I wanted my family to be able to relax before the flight and get a good rest.  The room was fine, and they had a nice pool, but that's where the good part ended.  The reception tried to charge one party for both rooms, reserved and pre charged separately.  They really had to really argue to each pay their own rooms.  The person at the reception really didn't know what he was doing.  They reserved the shuttle when they checked in but when they went down to get on the…

title: Nice hotel near the airport
review: About as close to BCN airport as you can get, but still a very comfortable hotel, too.  It's not close to all the touristy things you want to do in Barcelona, but that's okay because it is close to a train station and a subway station - AND the airport!  And we were able to walk to some decent restaurants nearby in the evening - bonus points because we dined with the locals.  Staff are super helpful and polite, even though they are really busy sometimes at the front desk (like when a tourbus pulled up).  The free airport shuttle was great - we dropped our rental car off and they picked us up, then took us in for our flight on our departure day - easy-peasy.  We had the nice indoor pool to ourselves one afternoon.  It's small, but just the right temperature to cool off and relax…

title: Good and clean hotel
review: Dear Tripadvisor member,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel so thoroughly. We are delighted that you enjpyed your stay with us and we are really looking forward to see you back with us in the near future!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Perfect
review: This is a very nice hotel for pre-cruise stay or for business. The hotel is located a short taxi ride from downtown Barcelona so if you are a tourist who want to stay in the middle of everything, this is not the right hotel for you. But, if you are in Barcelona pre-cruise or for business, this hotel is perfect. It is located in an industrial area but still it is very quiet. I stayed here in the middle of the week and even with a room against the street, I was not disturbed. A taxi down to the cruise ship terminal was 20 Euro so it would be slightly cheaper if you want to be dropped of at Las Ramblas instead.  The hotel itself is very nice, modern yet with a traditional look. the room was of decent size with a large bathroom. All areas was well cleaned. Good Wi-Fi signal thru the…

title: Ok
review: Dear Henrik,  Thank you very much for your nice comments regarding your stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and our services in the hotel.  We look forward to be able to welcome you back to our hotel soon. Then you have to try our food in the restaurants which is also delicious!  Yours sincerely,  MAgnus Haggreb General Manager

title: Lovely
review: Loved this hotel, we got in late and needed food and beer, the bar and restaurant looked after us well. Our room was just beautiful with lots of space and a huge luxurious bathroom. The bed was very comfy and they provide free airport shuttle service. We didn't't have breakfast but it looked wonderful. Would highly recommend it.

title: Friendly staff in music themed hotel
review: I'll start with the staff as they made the stay very enjoyable, very friendly and couldn't do enough for me during my stay. They were the highlight of the hotel. Not a huge amount to do around the hotel, although there are shops nearby that would have anything you would need. It is an easy 10-15 min walk to the train station to get into Barcelona. Plenty of amenities inside the hotel... there are two restaurants on the ground floor, a gym, swimming pool, sauna, rooftop bar, minibar in the room, and the internet was decent quality. I preferred the tapas restaurant over the restaurant Sinfonia, just personal taste really, the food in both is very good. They also run a bus to and from the airport that seems to run fairly often. The rooms were comfortable, clean and had everything I…

title: For That Barcelona overnight
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your extensive review about our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will make sure the staff read your nice words. They will be very happy!  We look forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Minimum bar limit just to sit at Sunset Bar🤔🤔🤔
review: Close to airport but aways from city,this is one terrific hotel. Large rooms,very good restaurant with outstanding food selection. The room was larger than most & being newish it had every appointment plus...it was a surprise choice but proved outstanding. The free shuttle to /from the airport was convenient and very much appreciated. No down side other than location which I am sure was purpose built.

title: Nice hotel, close to BCN airport
review: Dear David,  Thank you very much for your comments about our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Decent enough airport hotel
review: Overall,  the hotel is nice and with friendly staff.   However, I was asked to leave the Sunset Bar on the rooftop because they did not serve sangria and I could not bring the drink up from the lobby bar. Interesting because it was empty and this rule was not written nor stated anywhere. Bad customer service! Especially to a non-local hotel guest.

title: Nice Hotel conveniently Airport located.
review: We stayed at this hotel due to it being conveniently located close to airport and  the fact that it had a shuttle service, to and from the airport.  The stay totally met our expectations and more.  The room was spacious and the service at the desk was very appreciated.  The breakfast was included as well.  We also had drinks on the sunse terrace with wonderful views of the areas along with tapas.  Only downside was if you wanted to have more than just tapas you would have to go the the restaurant downstairs instead. Would of preferred more selection.   Would certainly recommend this hotel if you are looking for a place next to the airport.  The room also had a beautiful view of the sunrise.

title: Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your comments about our hotel. We are very happy to hear that you such a nice stay and that you enjoyed our new Sunset Roof top bar.  We have just opened it this summer so at the moment we only offers drinks and some Tapas. Maybe in the future we will serve a wider selection of food.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager
