title: Needs to offer better pillows and invest in modern beds and mattresses
review: Lovely stay very clean rooms yummy buffet breakfast  with plenty of choices very friendly staff helpful in planning sites to see around Barcelona we were able to book in early which was wonderful after a long flight fro Australia

title: Great airport hotel and roof bar
review: Dear Kim,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay and that you could relax after your long flight from Australia.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Made my trip special
review: We stayed for just a night, actually a few hours between flights. We didn't get to explore the hotel as we arrived late and left early but I do want to comment that the hotel's public areas look better than the rooms (more modern). The pillows were horrible, I still have pain in my neck several days after. It seems the price is high for the rooms but Barcelona is generally expensive and to be fair I didn't explore the hotel enough. But to be honest those horrible pillows will stay in my mind and I will not return.

title: So good!!
review: Travel! Enjoy your life! But seriously you must stay here if you need a rest before a flight.  Food incredible!  Shower pressure excellent!  Staff attitudes second to none!  So glad to have booked my final night here (and thank you to Ben for logistics)  I will be back!  Xxx

title: Fabulous option if you need to stay near the airport
review: Dear Tripadvisor member,  We are delighted to hear that you had such a great stay with us. It's also very ncie to read about your positive attitude to life and travel!  We really look forward to welcome you back!  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great airport hotel
review: Okay, the hotel is clean, it's comfortable, and it's super convenient. Prices are fairly reasonable as well. But that's not the reason I give it such a high recommendation. The location of Salles is fantastic - and I don't mean for its proximity to the airport.   You can stay here and actually have a very good time hanging out in Ciutat el Prat. We were going to take the train into Barcelona (which is pretty easy and not expensive) but decided to hang out here instead. We found a middle class neighbourhood filled with people, restaurants, shops, and bars. We went out during the day, that night, and for a really nice walk.   You really can't go wrong here.

title: Great hotel for staying near Barcelona airport
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a great comment about our hotel and neighbourhood.  We really look forward to welcome you back.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very Convenient for Short Stay
review: Great property with very friendly service.   I came in late and only spent 1 night here but the roof top bar was great and the rooms are nice.  They have a very convenient airport shuttle and offer special packages that include a shuttle.

title: Great comfortable stay
review: Stayed here during a visit to Barcelona in late June and was impressed with he front desk staff, both knowledgeable and very helpful.  Close to the airport and with a good shuttle service.  Close to the metro and trains making it very easy to get into Barcelona.  We enjoyed the local area and eating near the square.  The room was comfortable and very clean.  Was so happy with the service and hotel that for my return to Barcelona two weeks later I cancelled another hotel and stayed another two nights here.  Have to say again how good the front desk staff were.

title: Exceeded Expectations
review: Dear John,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience with the readers of Tripadvisor.  We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay so much and that you chose to come back to stay with us a second time.  I will make sure our front desk team will read your kind words. They will be very happy!  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good comfortable stay
review: The Salles Hotel was an excellent value and far exceeded our expectations.  The staff was friendly, helpful, and professional.  Our room was spacious and comfortable.  The shuttle service to the airport was efficient and very helpful.  We were able to enjoy a continental breakfast despite our very early departure.  Overall the Salles had the look and feel of a much more expensive hotel.  The only negative was we didn't have good internet service but we didn't try to resolve the issue due to our short stay.

title: Did the job!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much fot taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are thrilled to hear that our hotel exceeded your expectations. We have just changed all our cables and Wi-Fi antentas in the hotel and we can now offer a much faster and more stable internet connection throughout the hotel.  We look forward to see you back with us again real soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Airport hotel
review: We only stayed here one night as a stop over, but it was perfect hotel for that. There is a free shuttle service from Barcelona airport to the hotel and the driver dropped us to the nearest train station the next day. Reception where very friendly and helpful. Rooms are big and comfortable, with everything you need.

title: Nice hotel before cruise!
review: We stayed last October before a cruise and enjoyed it immensely. Will stay again next year before another cruise. How do we get a hold of the hotel management as I'm having difficulty booing a room for next May?  Thanks!!!

title: Good Airport Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your nice comments regarding your stay with us. We are delighted that you had such a great experience with us. Just contact me directly and I will make the reservation for you for May 2018.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: close to airport with free shettle service
review: Fine for one night, staff very helpful, shuttle to the airport very efficient every 30 mins. Location fine some decent restaurants about 500 meters from the hotel. Hotel restaurant a little expensive and so was room service.

title: Poor quality of dinner served
review: Dear Mark,  Thank you very much for your comments. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with and our great location in El Prat De Llobregat.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good for overnight airport stop.
review: Keyla checked us in for our final day of vacation. She was sweet and extremely helpful with regard to the hotel and surrounding neighborhood. The hotel was in a very cute neighborhood and had a very nice breakfast the next morning. The fact that the hotel had free shuttle service made it great for our less than 10 minute drive to the airport.

title: Nice hotel, a little far out!
review: The Hotel itself was really nice! Really helpful staff and rooms were perfect! The pool was nice and they have a lush rooftop bar which was so pretty and well done! When we were up there, a lady called Jennifer was working, she was on her own but did an amazing job! At the end of her shift, a manager or someone came up and was almost shouting at her...we thought this was really bad as, 1) it was in front of us, 2) the way he was talking to her wasn't how a manager/boss should talk to staff, and 3) she did an amazing job with 5 or 6 tables on her own doing food and drink! So I hope her boss sees this and knows she did a great job and we loved her! The man who was shouting at her made us feel unwelcome and awkward. (This was 17.06.17) Other than that, staff were great and the…

title: Excellent service, great for airport, delicious food
review: Dear Gracie,  Thank you very much for your comments about our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your overall stay with us and I can assure you that we are very fortunate to have Jennifer working with us. I will make sure she will read your nice comments. Our restaurant manager was not on duty this night but I will talk to him to sort out what has happened between the two waiters.   Regarding the deposit of the safe, it's not that we are renting the safe. It's free of charge. The reason why we ask for a deposit is because our guest otherwise forget to return the safe key.  Hope to see you back with us again in the near future.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very Comfortable
review: We corresponded with the hotel in advance for our group booking - they were exceptionally helpful and this excellent service continued during our stay - staff were very accommodating and patient.  The food was delicious and the roof top terrace was a real treat!  The rooms were very comfortable and clean.  The airport shuttle was ideal.  All in all, a fabulous stay, thank you!

title: Food to die for
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your comments of your recent stay with us.  It's wonderful to hear that you had such a great experience with us and your kind words about our staff. I will make sure they will read your comments!  Looking forward to see you back in the near future.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Nice but overpriced not-really-airport hotel
review: Nice, clean, modern and open lobby.  After a long trip across the ocean, it was nice to land at this hotel and in our very comfortable room. The hotel staff was very welcoming. The bathroom amenities are nice.  Appreciate the free wifi and free airport shuttle. The indoor pool is nice but small.  The bar area is small, but they offer a variety drinks and have great tap beers.  The train station is about a 10 minute walk through dark and strange streets.  We exchanged money at the hotel and it was rather expensive.

title: Very Quiet
review: I had expected this hotel to be nearer to the airport - but it was near enough - less than 15 minutes on the highway. The area is really non-descipt but there are small grocery stores where one can purchase fruits and bread. I did eat in the restaurant and it was quite good!!

title: Charming helpful staff
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you leaving your comments about your stay with us.  We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and you meal in the restaurant. We take great pride in the food in our restaurant and our chef Joan Figueras is a reference in El Prat De Llobregat and work with the local farmers around the area to always get the freshest products.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good Airport Hotel with access to the City
review: Charming staff, most helpful.  Free shuttle to airport, Rooms well appointed and decor is interesting. All very clean, all mod cons expected of a hotel of this type and more.  Great hot water and a bath - lovely. Quiet and well priced for being close to airport.  Has a garage also. `i have stayed a few times now, to and from airport and shall continue to do so.

title: Slow and difficult internet
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your nice review about our hotel. It's great to hear that you are happy with the attention of the staff which is really the heart and soul of this hotel and that you keep coming back to us!  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Overnight stay
review: Stayed for 3 nights in May with my 12 year old son to celebrate his 13th birthday by attending a match at the Nou Camp to see FC Barcelona. Arrived after midnight on the Friday/Saturday and walked to the Terminal 1 Hotel Bus stops. Called the hotel and the complimentary hotel mini bus arrived shortly after. The journey from the airport to the hotel was about 15 mins and upon arrival the hotel appeared nice and checking in easy with multi lingual staff. The room itself (306) was made of 2 single beds which suited our needs perfectly. The room was air conditioned and décor was sober but nice. The bathroom was well appointed with complimentary shaving, toothbrush/paste and shower gel/shampoo. The room had a mini bar and safe though no details of if and how to use the safe were…

title: Just average at best
review: Just ok, thankful that we only stayed a night. Seems a bit outdated. Cramped bathroom because of the bidet. Was awakened by the sound of some mechanical banging noise that went on for more than 15 minutes. They did not respond to my i question about the shuttle that I sent the day before arrival, so I took a taxi not realizing the built in fee of Eur20, making this very short ride very expensive. I won't stay here again.

title: This place is a gem!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments about your stay with us. I am sorry we didn't live up to your expectations.  We are aware of how important the shuttle is for our guest and we do send information how and where to pick up our shuttle to all our guest that we have the information to contact. We also have this information published on our website and on the main booking sites.  I am sorry to hear that this information didn't reach you and that you had to pay for a taxi.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren

title: Great stop over near the Barcelona airport
review: We had an overnight stopover and Salles Ciutat del Prat was the perfect place. The hotel is beautiful, the front desk staff friendly, capable and very accommodating. We ate dinner at Sinfonia, the hotel restaurant, and had an excellent gourmet meal for an extremely reasonable price. The airport shuttle was a major part of our decision to stay and it worked perfectly both ways. My only suggestion is that the hotel should have its phone number prominently displayed on its home page. We had difficulty with this with the poor airport wifi, but fortunately found a friendly taxi driver who knew the number and called for the shuttle for us.

title: Convenient shuttle, surprisingly good restaurant, but below average sleeping accommodations
review: Dear Kathleen,  Thank you for leaving your comments about your stay with us on Tripadvisor. It's great to hear that you enjoyed your experience in our hotel.  We will try to display our phone number in a clearer way on our webpage.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very nice accommodations close to airport
review: Rooms are lovely & comfortable. There's a sauna and a pool. I didn't use the restaurant, but I ate at the bar and it was fine. It's also a conference hotel and I'd be happy to attend a conference there. There are 2 metro stops near the hotel for getting into Barcelona. If you have a T-10 or a 3-4-or 5 day metro card (get at information window in the airport) it's easy. There's also a train, but the metro station is new and great. There's a charming "downtown" nearby. I landed in Barcelona T-2 about 8PM after traveling about 20 hours from the USA and I didn't want to wait for the shuttle so I took a taxi. 20 euros. Before flying home 3 weeks later, I stayed again and the shuttle to the airport for an early morning flight is especially great. Wonderful staff. They are dealing with…

title: Great airport hotel
review: If you are passing through to catch your flight or day before a cruise ship and you have visited Barcelona, this is a great stay. Staff is very accommodating. El Prat is the airport town and there is a cool plata, plaza to us, and a nice wander in the evening. 30 euros to Ramblas so if your done with that, we really  Ike this place.

title: Excellent location near airport with free shuttle service
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your nice comments.  It's great to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and the attention given by our staff.  Looking forward to see you back with us again in the future.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very nice airport hotel in decent area
review: This is an excellent hotel if you need to be close to the airport.  There is free shuttle service coming and going.  The included breakfast is delicious and plentiful—everything you could want.  Nice dining room and bar. Indoor (small but inviting) pool. Quiet and with all of the amenities you could want. We had some difficulty with the wi-fi but the staff was able to assist us to get it working.

title: Excellent place to stay before your morning flight
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your nice comments.  It's great to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and the attention given by our staff. We are currently upgrading all our cables in the hotel to be able to offer an even quicker and more stable internet access.  Looking forward to see you back with us again in the future.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Perfect for business travelers
review: Nicely appointed and featured hotel about 15 minutes from airport (shuttle provided).  This is in a small town that has some restaurant options so you aren't locked in an airport hotel with nothing around you.  Prices are very reasonable.  Pool is nice.  Breakfast was superb.  Rooms are large and baths are nice.  Really a nice place.

title: preflight hotel
review: Beautiful hotel,very large room with coffee maker, comfortable beds and large marble bathroom with all amenities. Located on a quiet street with lots of restaurants. Free Shuttle service to and from the airport [taxi runs about 30 euros each way]] Very pleasant staff. We would definitely stay there again.

title: Great Overnight For Cruise
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for reviewing our hotel on tripadvisor,com. It's great to hear that you such a pleasant stay with us!  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great potential
review: We ended out 14-day transatlantic cruise in Barcelona and chose the Salles Hotel to be close to the airport for an early next day departure. It was the right choice. Clean, comfortable and reasonably priced, you'll be pleasantly surprised at the superb breakfast.

title: Truly 4 star ****
review: Dear Tom,  Thank you for your wonderful review. It's great to hear that you had such a nice stay with us.  We look forward to see you back with us again soon!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Close to Airport!
review: Stayed one night in triple room prior to early morning flight. My wife did not like the room decor, website says classic, she felt dark and dated. We did not get one of the bright fresh looking rooms on the website. It was a warm day in April in Barcelona and the room was extremely hot, the ventilation controls produced neither cool air nor improved circulation, tried opening the window which helped a bit but was surprisingly noisy, result was very little sleep. All of which was a shame because we found the staff excellent, helped direct us to the shuttle stop, helped store our bags, good directions back to the city centre, pleasant bar for an evening drink; plus the shuttle was very efficient. One tip after coming off a cruise ship – establish with your taxi driver before…

title: Great hotel, close to airport
review: I spent one night in the hotel before my early flight from Barcelona, the hotel is approximately 10-15 minutes from the airport by taxi. I used the shuttle service as well, very convenient solution, unfortunately in the morning my flight was too early, but the hotel arranged a taxi waiting for me in front of the hotel. The room was clean, with all kinds of amenities, a spacious bathroom and a well-designed bedroom. I used the small pool and sauna as well, it was not crowded so it was perfectly fine to use.  The only downside was the restaurant, where we were provided with bad service. The food was nice, but our waiter did not pay attention to us and he acted rather superior towards me and my friend. He might have though that since we are young we are not the priority guests, but…

title: Very comfortable hotel, fairly convenient to airport and to city
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. I am glad you enjoyed your overall stay with us and our services. Our first transfer from the hotel leaves at 4:45 in the morning. Even though it was a bit late for you, I am happy to hear that we could arrange for a taxi to wait for you at the door.  I am sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with one of our waiters in the restaurant. I will talk to my restaurant manager to make sure that it will not happen to any future guests. We do not have any service charges in our hotel so I assume you refer to the VAT (Value Added Tax) which is something that is added to all the goods and services and which is for Food & Beverage products 10 %.   I am glad to hear that you have choosen to study hospitality and I wish you good look with your studies and your future career!  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good stay but room smelled of smoke
review: The room in this hotel was very comfortable and clean, the staff very pleasant, and the price reasonable. It was fairly convenient to the hotel, though at arrival we had to wait quite a while for the shuttle to arrive. Returning to the airport was better, of course, because they told us the schedule at the desk, so we knew when to be ready to go. There is nearby public transportation to the city, but it it does take some time - it is not the same experience as staying in the city. There is always a trade-off, if you are going to be visiting the city for several days. However, we are not sorry we did it this way. The neighborhood is nothing exciting - it's mostly industrial, but the street that it is on is pleasant enough, there is a pharmacy right near by, and a minimarket, and…

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Dear guest,  Thank you fora taking the time to leave your comments about our hotel. We are very happy that you enjoyed your overall stay with us and that you enjoyed our neighbourhood El Prat De Llobregat.   We do as you say have public transport close to the hotel. We have both metro, train and buses. The train however is the quickest option and leaves you in Barcelona centre in less than 15 minutes.  We are looking forward to see you back with us again soon!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren  General Manager

title: Great Hotel!
review: We called when we arrived at terminal 2 and once we got to the meeting point the shuttle showed up within minutes and it was a short ride to the hotel. Check-in was friendly with good enough English by the clerk checking us in.  When we got to the room it was nicely decorated with a large bathroom but there was a smell of smoke and we didn't think it was that bad at first so didn't switch rooms but definitely wasnt so pleasant as the night went on. I don't think that it was due to people smoking in the room but simply a room that was converted from smoking to non-smoking during a renovation and it is difficult to ever fully get the smell out. We ate at the bar for dinner and the food was average as was the service, not bad, just average. The prices were reasonable. Our room had…

title: Great last night near airport
review: Hotel was fine.  Location near airport was good.  The key was an exceptional desk clerk who helped us a lot!  We were tired and late arriving.  He was helpful & friendly.  Kindly pointed out that we were going to have a time change that night and needed to leave for the airport earlier than we expected.  Took time to ensure we understood & arranged for early morning calls to our rooms to ensure we caught the right shuttle.  Outstanding customer service.

title: Great Place to Stay Around the Airport- Free Shuttles To and From the Airport!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on tripadvisor. It's great to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and your wonderful words to our front desk staff. He will be very happy to read your words!  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Für Airport hotel gut
review: I booked the room through booking.com and it was super cheap! The room and the bathroom are both very big. You get free shuttle services to and from the airport. All you have to do is to call the front desk ahead of the time to make an appointment, but i will recommend you to wait at the place a little earlier since the driver sometimes come early and may leave right on time. so if you are late for like 2 minutes you might miss the shuttle. There is a train to the city that is about 10 minute walk from the hotel, and it only takes you about 20 minutes to get to the city. You also get room services, which are pretty good as well. The front desk is very friendly and will answer all of your questions.

title: Advertised as 4 star but........
review: Dear Viola,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave you comments about our hotel. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and and our free shuttle service to and from the airport. I will make sure our staff reads your nice words. They will be very happy!  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good base to explore Barcelona
review: We stay one day was for business in Barcelona with our Mongolisn Customer nice room but ir was cold in the evening  breakfast also good but swimming pool very small sauna not warm  it was empty normal in April   and Metro is near  and near same street pizzeria was very good and cheap

title: very convenient getting to and from airport
review: We chose this hotel due to the shuttle to/from the airport, which was very helpful. We used it both ways on our last day in Spain after arriving from the Costa Del Sol.  We very much enjoyed the indoor pool and sauna after much sightseeing.  The restaurant dinner and wine list was surprisingly good. I recommend the cod with brie and quince. We did not expect a gourmet meal and were delighted to find it so good. The front desk was helpful in giving us wake up calls because Daylight Savings started our night there and we were worried about making our flight on time.  The staff was friendly and helpful. My only recommendation to the hotel is that they provide tissues (e.g., kleenex) in the bathroom. This was something not offered, which seemed very unusual compared to other hotels…

title: Service ok
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for leaving a review on tripadvisor.com. It's wonderful to hear that enjoyed your stay with us and our services provided. I will make sure our staff reads your nice words. They will be very happy! I have taken note of comment about providing tissues in the bathroom.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: convenient, friendly staff, comfortable
review: Good airport hotel with reasonable prices and ok service. The bedrooms are not very comfortable and air conditioning weak. Wifi too slow But service  is friendly and breakfast ok. Perfect limousine transit to airport even no so fequently (every 30 minutes)

title: Old, cheap and tacky
review: Dear Angelo,  Thank you very much for taking some of your time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. We are very happy you enjoyed your recent stay with us. We are currently rewiring the whole hotel with new cables to be able to offer a faster and more stable internet connection.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Barcelona Before and After Cruise
review: My elderly sister stayed here, planning on one night before a flight to the states and then getting stuck her because of a snowstorm in New York. She was delighted with the comfort of the room and the very helpful staff who tried to make sense of her inability to communicate with family via her iPhone. She liked the place so much that she did not even venture into Barcelona on her extra day there. Thank you, Ciutat del Prat, for taking such good care of her!

title: Good for a overnight stay
review: A must for short stay over. Offers a free pick up and drop which is a great attraction for the hotel and justifies their regular price tag of around 79 Euros for a night.  Rooms are well appointed with a hugely large toilet and bath area and reasonable toilet amenities. Excellent transport and reception staffs and a very attractive lounge bar at the lobby. Restaurant, however, is quite disappointing with limited options.  For Airport pick up, please read their instructions carefully and if you are arriving at Terminal 1, follow their pick up map as it is slightly far away from the arrival gate.

title: One night before flight home
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. I am very happy you enjoyed your short stay with us! Our pick-up point at the airport Terminal 1 is Parking G where all the hotel transfers stop.  It's a few minutes walk from the luggage claim.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Pre cruise stay
review: Very nice room with large king size bed. Bathroom is large and newer fixtures. This location is a few minutes from the Metro station which was nice since the taxi drivers are on strike. The hotel is located in an industrial area and does not have shops or restaurants nearby.

title: Very Nice Hotel Near Airport
review: Dear Sue,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on tripadvisor. I am very happy you enjoyed your short stay with us. Our hotel is located  in the center of El Prat de Llobregat and even though we have an industrial zone close to us there are plenty of small shops and a few restaurants just a few minutes away from the hotel.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon!  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good airport hotel
review: Two couples stayed one night prior to cruise. Included in the price was airport pick up breakfast and transfer to the port. We followed the instructions and everything went very smoothly, The staff were very pleasant and helpful even letting us store our luggage on our return as we had a late flight back. The breakfast was of a good standard, The bedroom was a decent size with a extra large bathroom. We will stay again on our next cruise.

title: Great hotel 5minutes from the Barcelona airport
review: Convenient nice hotel with free street parking near the airport. There are a few local restaurants walking distance that are cheap and good and willgive you a true taste (not designed for turists). A convenient and practical place to stay before your departure particularly if youhave to return you hired car at the airport. Highly recommended for convenience and practicality. You will also get a true taste of real Spanish life if you take a stroll to the farmacy, supermarket or local restaurants, or gas station a couple of blocks away.

title: Convenient stay in authentic non-touristy neighborhood
review: Dear Carlos,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. It's wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and the great neighborhood where we are located.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great place to stay near Barcelona Airport
review: I chose this hotel based on good price and convenient location. The hotel was clean. The rooms were small but nice. The staff was friendly and very helpful. What I liked most was the neighborhood. Walking to the metro stop you pass by typical 5-8 story apartment buildings with shops on the first level. I ate dinner at several local bars where there were no tourists and little English spoken. I also found a good pastry shop and sandwich place. There are some nice fruit and vegetable markets too. The food was inexpensive and really fresh and well prepared. This is a nice, inexpensive place to experience a "regular" place and people in Barcelona, but with not too long of a walk you still have access to the metro and all the great spots in the city.

title: convenient
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. It's really wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our hotel, the services of our hard working staff and the great neighborhood where we are located in which offers many small nice restaurants, shops and cafés.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Decent Stay Near Airport
review: Desk clerks were friendly and extremely helpful.  Rooms are very large and clean.  Shuttle was convenient to airport. Great pool and sauna.  Area looks industrial but very nice village nearby with good restaurants.  Would highly recommend to anyone!

title: Good airport hotel
review: This hotel is near the airport and provides an airport shuttle. The room was larger than I had expected given its clientale seemed to be mostly airline passengers. The check-in was quick and pleasant. We did not eat in the hotel. However, the hotel is located in a nice suburb of Barcelona with several restaurant choices nearby.

title: Airport stayover
review: Dear Brigid,  Thank you for taking the time comment your recent stay with us. I am delighted you enjoyed your short stay with us. Our neighbourhood has plenty of small restaurants but next time you have to try the food in our great restaurant Sinfonia!  Hope to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great experience - tour of the city no problem
review: We just needed a place to sleep for a connecting flight. Upon arrival at the airport we called the hotel and the shuttle was there in 15 minutes. Return shuttle was organised at arrival to hotel. Room was relatively small - bathroom was large. All clean and functional. Breakfast was over average with good selection. Recommendable!

title: Mini break
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel on tripadvisor.com.  It's wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and our services.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great Hotel near the airport
review: The hotel is not very close to the airport. As the shuttle bus has to serve two airport terminals, there might be a considerable waiting time. But be sure: it comes! The hotel is situated in a quarter with shops and close to a train station. We enjoyed our stay - Reception was friendly and helpful. There were just two little shortages: The double bed was covered with just one thin sheet - like in summer - although the room was not extremely warm. And: the heating in the (large!) bathroom did not work. But otherwise, everything was fine and Reception gave us good advice how to get to the center of the town in about 20 minutes. Thus, it was not only a good stay at the hotel, it also allowed us an experience of Barcelona city.

title: Fine airport hotel
review: I was only in the hotel for about 9 hours, but it served its purpose just fine.  It was clean, staff was very friendly.  Free shuttle to and from the airport were very handy.  The restaurant was quite serviceable.

title: Nothing to complain, great hotel for traveller
review: Dear Guest,  Thank your reviewing our hotel on tripadvisor. We are very glad that you enjoyed your short but sweet stay with us! Looking forward to see you back soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Lovely hotel
review: We were allowed for a very early check in! That was wonderful. Check in and out very fast and professional. The staff very frienndly to us. Room service started at 8am - we arrived at 7:30am - so was excellent as well :) The hotel is very clean and provides an airport shuttle - very convenient!! If you have to stay a night before you fly I only can recommend this hotel. Close to airport, abt 2,5Km and take the shuttle whenever possible. The taxis charge EUR 20 as minimum price.

title: Excellent
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for reviewing our hotel on tripadvisor.  We are very glad that you enjoyed all our services. We always do out utmost to be able to let our guest check in early. Being a hotel close to the airport we understand that this is very important for our guests.  Looking forward to see you back soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great, modern hotel near the airport and metro
review: I stayed here on January 12th for one night and everything  was great.  I really enjoyed the comfortable bed and huge room that this hotel has to offer.  The breakfast was really good and fresh.  I would recommend this to anyone going to Barcelona if your just passing through, I think it maybe a bit far from everything but there are always cabs outside of the hotel.  I even had domino's delivered to my room while I was there.

title: Room was cold for me
review: The hotel is well located if you are in transit. I had to catch early flight and I stayed here instead of Barcelona. The night receptionist was very nice and polite and gave info about the hotel. The room was spacious and basic buy with everything you need. The bathroom was very big with amenities. I could not find heater in the room and I found it very cold at night. There isnt a duvet , only a think blanket that is more appropiate for summer. The breakfast was good, plenty of food and staff very attentive. They offer shuttle service to the airport.  Overall, I would stay again in this hotel but in summer :-)

title: Very convenient
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to comment about your stay with us. We are vey happy that you enjoyed your overall stay with us and our breakfast buffet.  I am sorry to hear that you found the room cold. We do have individual heating in all our rooms. The thermostat is on the wall as you come in to the bedroom.   Looking forward to see you back with us again soon   Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very Nice Hotel
review: This hotel is very convenient if you need to go to the airport early in the morning or arriving late like we did. The free shuttle is highly recommended. Confortable and on time. The room was clean. Because of the facility, I don't think however that it should be a 4 stars. Probably more a 3 stars. But the service was very pleasant and the breakfast was impressive.  Good value for money if you need to stay close to the airport.

title: Perfect
review: Dear Ponora,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on tripadvisor. I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and our services.  Regarding our facilities, we already offer a bar, restaurant, gym and a indoor swimming pool and we have this winter built an outside terrace with bar/restaurant which will be inaugurated in March 2017. We also are currently updating our gym to be able to offer more and better services to our guests.   Looking forward to see you back with us again real soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Nice and clean hotel
review: This was our second stay at the Ciutat del Prat so we knew what it was going to be like.  It is very comfortable and has tea and coffee making facilities in the rooms.  Staff were friendly and polite and the hotel was spotlessly clean.  We had a bar meal which was reasonably priced.  It is handy for the airport with a free shuttle.  If travelling to T1 the journey is about 10 minutes and to T2 about 20 minutes.  Taxis to Barcelona city centre are approximately 20 euros.

title: Great place for layover
review: We booked our stay at Salles Hotel Ciutat del Prat for overnight stay. Our flight was delayed & landed at 11.30 PM. As we got out of airport, the shuttle was ready at the pickup area & it was a 10 minute ride to the hotel. Check-in process of smooth & the room was pretty clean. We took a shuttle back to airport at 7.45 AM, so couldn't experience much. I would stay here again if the situation demands.

title: Holiday
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your comments.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We know the shuttle service is very important for our guests and we do our utmost to offer the best transfer service possible.  Looking forward to see you back soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Feeling ignore
review: Beautiful hotel .. Near the Barcelona Port & Airport. The hotel has pool & Sauna very reasonably priced.  Very clean & tidy. Well worth the stay . Staff very friendly Nice Cousy Restaurant & bar area for light meals

title: 5TH STAY AT THIS WONDERFUL HOTEL
review: Dear guest,  THank you very much for your nice comments about our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your holiday and our hotel. Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good choice for airport overnight stay
review: We had the unfortunate event that our plane was grounded for 3 days! The worst part it was over the Christmas holidays. So heading home for the holidays was not going to happen. We found this hotel, it is nice, clean and very much a boutique hotel at a really good price. However because it was Xmas, the hotel was busy with families celebrating Christmas dinner using all their banquet halls. We sat in the  bar area only to be completely ignore hoping to get a drink. We wanted a drink and got nothing! All the other bars and restaurants were closed in the area.The feeling of rejection hit hard especially  during the holidays was very clear here. You are a nobody and the management was so into themselves to not care about the 'other people' , the single customers that can't spend…

title: Good airport hotel
review: Close to airport. 10 mins in free shuttle bus. About 15 mins from Barcelona Sants train station. Nice size room, clean and comfortable. Breakfast was not included in my price so can't come nt if it was good or not. Free WiFi.  Restaurant in hotel was also good.

title: Nice overnight stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments about our hotel. I am glad you enjoyed your stay with us and next time you have to try our breakfast buffet which is delicious!  Looking forward to welcome you back soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Convenient Airport Hotel
review: This hotel is conveniently located near the Barcelona airport with a convenient shuttle. The rooms are nice and clean and it's convenient if you're staying overnight before flying.   The staff were friendly and helpful.   The hotel has a restaurant and bar but I did not use either of the facilities.

title: Exceeded expectations
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your nice comments about our hotel and our staff. Next time you stay with us you have to try our restaurant which serves great food!  Looking forward to see you back soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Great hotel close to airport but also close to trains
review: Stayed here 1 night and appreciated the free shuttle and excellent front desk service.  Definitely plan to add on the breakfast buffet, very good with lots of choices.  Would probably not be my choice for my whole visit to Barcelona, as it is not the most interesting neighborhood, in my opinion. Great choice for an airport hotel.  Clean and comfortable.

title: EXCELLENT/ rooms breakfast and food at the restaurant
review: excellent // the quality did not change in 8 years. we come every year in october/   prices are good . personal is very friendly. some agents at the reception recognized us  we have been coming the last 8 years.

title: Convenient to airport
review: Dear Sabine,  Thank you very much for your wonderful comments. It's really great to hear that you have chosen us 8 years in a row! Looking forward to see you back a ninth time!  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: excellent stopover between planes
review: Chose this hotel for the free airport shuttle and proximity to the airport.  It was a good choice.  The room was a step above the average European hotel.  The bathroom was large with amenities provided.  The staff was helpful and spoke English.  The location is about 700M from public transportation into the city.  The staff was helpful with train lines and stops for various sights in Barcelona.   Shuttle times were convenient and reliable.

title: Spanish Hospitality
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on tripadvisor. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and especially that you had a great experience with our hard working staff.  Looking forward to see you back with us soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Excellent Helpful and Efficient Staff, but Noisy Room
review: love this medium size hotel, elegant but without ostentation, confortable room, service efficent and kind, hotel shuttle very convenient. no big queue at breakfast quite a relieve. keep the souvenir of a plaisant stay, will recommand.

title: Stopover in Barcelona
review: Good hotel and it amazed us that the quality of the food in the hotel's restaurant was very good (which you normally do not expect).  Rooms are reasonable and beds are good. It is only that elderly people do not like to have the shower in the bath tube (chance of having accidents when leaving the bath).  Instead we would prefer an Italian shower.  Shuttle service to and from the airport is excellent.

title: Good for one or two nights
review: Dear Francesco,  Thank you for dedicating some of your time to review our hotel on tripadvisor. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and our delicious food that we serve in our hotel restuarant Simfonia. We work very hard to offer a great locale cousine to our guest and it's nice to hear that it's appreciated.  We have to plans to remove the bathtub and it will be done within the next few years when we are planning a full scale renovation of all our bed rooms.  Looking forward to see you back in the near future.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Surprisingly lovely modern well-priced hotel near the airport
review: Stayed here one night to catch a long direct fight to US. Check-in was quick & staff helpful & professional. Airport transport pickup took 45 mins. Room was simple w/ large bathroom. Room had dust in corners of walls and smelled a bit like a smoker's room. Breakfast buffet was well appointed with various items to eat. Would stay here a couple of nights only as it is not close to any attractions but business travelers may want to consider this location for proximity to airport, free airport transportation and breakfast buffet spread.

title: Great value and convenient to the airport.
review: Dear Emily,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on tripadvisor. I am glad you enjoyed your overall stay with us. I have taken note of your negative feedback as well and I will use it to improve our services. All our rooms are non smoking.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon!  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good place to stay convienient for the airport
review: Excellent shuttle service, friendly reception staff, delicious breakfast. Close to little restaurants and Metro. Clean room, lovely shower and bathroom. Overall wonderful for a one night's stay. Would definitely recommend!

title: A good place to use if you use the airport.
review: This is the third time I have used the Salles Hotel Ciutat del Prat when using Barcelona Airport. Apart from the long wait for the mini-bus the hotel provided the service I required, and we found a super little restaurant nearby.

title: Convenient
review: Dear Tom,  Thank you very much for the confidence in choosing us for your stay close to Barcelona Airport . We are aware that there are many hotels around the airport.  We are constantly doing all we can to keep improving our services and of course also our transfer service. At the moment our transfer pass the airport terminals every 30 minutes in the morning and evening and every 45 minutes betwwen 12:00 and 18:00.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Nice Hotel
review: We booked this hotel for one night only as we were coming from Italy and the following day we left for the United States. We arrived to the airport at 9:45 pm and the bus shuttle waits for guests at Terminal 1 Parking G. Look for the signs or ask for parking G don't go downstairs where the taxis are. We did not have to call the hotel just waited about 15 minutes and the bus arrived. The hotel is like 10 minute ride to the airport. Checking in was easy, rooms comfortable, satisfactory customer service. We had a late dinner at the restaurant, the food was good and friendly service. What I really enjoyed was the breakfast , wide selection of cold and hot food , fruits, yogurt, pastries, Cereal, coffee, milk, juices. Excellent buffet breakfast! The bus shuttle to take us back to the…

title: Good Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  THank you for taking the time to review our hotel on tripadvisor. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and our great transfer service that is free for all of our guests and run between 04:45 in the morning until 01:45 in the night.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Excellent customer service very helpful
review: We were able to check in really early, and we had 2 rooms. Our room was awesome. It's definitely not a chain hotel where every room was the same. It was very spacious and the bathroom was huge. The beds were not that great. There was free Wifi and it had a free shuttle to the airport. Plus for an up charge of $10 you get breakfast too. And the breakfast was a huge buffet. There's  everything within walking distance, but we were there on a Sunday and a lot was closed including every farmacia and I was sick.  There was a really nice pool and sauna although we didn't get to use it. The pool did not feel heated. But I really liked this hotel and definitely would recommend it.

title: Ideally suited for an overnight close to airport
review: Smart modern hotel in unattractive commercial area but very close to airport with option of a shuttle bus . This should be used if possible because the minimum price for a taxi from the airport is 29 Euros. The hotel is smart , efficient with pleasant staff. Bedrooms were modern and spotless. Breakfast was adequate in a sterile environment and the shuttle to the airport quick and easy

title: Great overall stay!
review: Dear Titus,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on tripadvisor.com I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and I hope to see you back real soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very enjoyable stay
review: A great place to stay near the airport in Barcelona!   The shuttle was hassle free, reception was warm and welcoming. The hotel is exceptionally clean and comfortable. Rooms were spotlessly, very well equipped. Overall very nice hotel, was very happy to stay here.   Only reason I did not give it 5 stars was due to the noise in the room. I could hear conversations in the room next to me, above me, and below me. The walls were very thin, as there was constant noise throughout the night, from all directions. A simple pair of ear plugs and noise canceling headphones solved all problems.

title: Outstanding service
review: Dear Cory,  Thank you for reviewing our hotel on Tripadvisor.  We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will let all our staff about your nice comments. They will be very happy! I have taken note of your comments about thin walls and we will keep it it mind for future improvements.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very Comfortable and Enjoyable Stay
review: I've heard mixed reviews of this hotel by I had a good overall experience.  From the moment I walked in the staff were very accommodating and welcoming.  The rooms may seem slightly older but I'd consider it more boutique!    Breakfast was very nice in the mornings.  Location wise it's obviously not super close to the city but with two train stations close by I had no problem getting in and out of Barcelona.

title: A single night stay I'd have easily prolonged
review: I booked this hotel because of the reasonable price and free airport shuttle bus. Nice interior and friendly staff :) only €99 for a night. The menu is interesting and perfect for those with allergies / food intolerances.

title: Lovely facility
review: Dear Catriona,  Thank you for your nice review about our hotel. I am glad you enjoyed your say and services with us and I hope to see you back soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Not quite 4-star hotel but good breafast
review: Friendly helpful staff, clean, bright room with modern, comfortable feel.  Could purchase good morning coffee from the bar and bring it to the room. (Room had only Nescafe packets.) Only suggestion would be to have better type of coffee in the room.

title: Fantastic airport hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your commetns on tripadvisor.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with and especially your comments about great staff. I will make sure they will get to read your nice words.  In all our rooms we have kettles and offer complimentary tea and coffee.  In order to offer better coffee we would need  another type of machine, like Nespresso, in all our rooms. As of today it's not in our plan to do so but I will keep your suggestion in mind for future improvements.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Layover
review: There is nothing wrong with this hotel but it is rated four-stars and not quite there.  The room was comfortable but for example the laminate flooring was disjointed.  Not a majot issue but it represents some of the wear and tear.  More concerning is that my wife could not readily use the free shuttle for an early morning flight because it does not run at such hours.  The breakfast was good and had plenty of choices.  Wifi was good.

title: Modern, friendly, clean and welcoming
review: Stayed here for one night at the end of my trip. This hotel was so helpful and friendly. I got a free shuttle from the airport ( be sure to stand on the right hand side of the road) The reception staff helped me print some documents and I enjoyed the free beverages that were in the fridge. The room was quiet and clean. Would definitely stay again.

title: nice hotel, near airport with free shuttle
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your nice review of our hotel. It's great to hear that you enjoyed our services and the friendliness of our staff.  Looking forward to see you back again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Nicest stopover in BCN
review: I found myself stranded in Barcelona and in need of a hotel for one night.  After calling several hotels that were close to the airport with no luck, I got the last available room here.  The hotel was clean, the bed comfortable, the air conditioner worked well and it has free wifi.  I walked several blocks around the hotel and I found the neighbor reminded me a lot of the Queens area around LGA.  I ate dinner at the hotel restaurant and found it quite good if, a little pricey.  Still, I would recommend this hotel if you need someplace to stay that is close to the airport and it has a free shuttle.

title: Great place to spend the night at BCN
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your comments about our hotel. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and that w could offer you our last room available.  Looking forward to see you back with us again soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very comfortable
review: Flying in the early morning from Barcelona airport means spending the night there around, and there are many such possibilities. I tried various, and I must say that the Salles outperforms all others.. They have a free shuttle from/to the airport, like others; shuttle rides are frequent and short, I just walked to the shuttle bus parking and found it... Then on the way back there's no problem of crowding with 1/2 hotel trying to grab a ride at the same time...  The hotel itself? More towards classic, nice but without exciting architectural style, and everything works just fine, the reception is as helpful as they get.. Minibar in the room is free, with water and soft drinks, plus a boiler with coffee, tea or herbal infusions for the morning, and this is a very, very nice thing.…

title: Not at all what I expected
review: Needs serious room updating, bed was hard and bath faucets worked but look like they were from the 50's.  Location: A couple of block down there is a blvd. about 4 block up there is a open space with the locals enjoying the evening. We were the only tourist around so it was a nice look at real local life.  They try to be classy but the room & bed just come felt old and worn out. I had to wait almost a half hour to get a ride to the hotel. Then the driver takes us on a tour of the industrial sites looking to pick up somebody who never showed, so it took another half hour to get to the hotel. The guy at the front desk asks what time our flight out is, 6:45, okay your shuttle will be at 4:45. He then tells me about the hotel serves for breakfast. I look at the room info and…

title: Great place to stay for early morning flight
review: Dear Tom,   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel.  I am sorry we didn't comply with your expectations of our hotel.   Regarding our shuttle it passes every 30 minutes most of the day. We collect people in both terminals, first Terminal 1 and then Terminal 2. Between them there is about 5 minutes and then another 5-10 minutes to the hotel. It's is true that our breakfast buffet starts first at 06:00 but for our "early bird" travellers we offer a complementary breakfast from 04:00. (Coffee, juice and pastries). That is what our front desk was saying.   I hope you will give us another chance and I will make sure your experience will be much better and that you can enjoy the same great services that so many of our guest has grown fond of.   Yours sincerely, Magnus Haggren  General Manager

title: Nice hotel great service
review: Stayed here with my family after a day in Barcelona. We found this hotel to be quite comfortable and conveniently close to the airport, which was handy since we had an early morning flight. Rooms and bathroom spacious by European standards. Very helpful staff. Loved having free airport transfer that made getting to the airport easy and quick.

title: Convenient for quick airport stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for leaving your comments about our hotel on tripadvisor.com. I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and your nice words about our staff and transfer service.  Looking forward to see you back,  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Perfect for stay before cruise
review: Booked because of pick up at airport and transfer to cruise ship. Bonus was hotel is good. Staff found us a place to do our laundry on a Sunday.  Enjoyed morning buffet. Everything went smoothly. Thankyou.

title: Convenient
review: Convenient for overnight before early am departure, but that's the only reason to stay here. Terrible food (since when are nachos a small bowl of stale chips?), even worse service. Best part is the free shuttle back to the airport.

title: A nice surprise!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am sorry our restaurant didn't meet your expectations. We take great pride in our food and our restaurant is one of the best restaurants in El Prat de Llobregat but it's obvious that in this case that we fell short.  I hope that you will give us another chance and we will make sure that you get to enjoy the experience that so many of our repetitive guest have grown so fond of.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren

title: Great Barcelona airport hotel.
review: The room was comfortable and pleasend, but a bit small. The bathroom has everything you need. The reception is very efficient and and very friendly. The foodquality of their main restaurant is very good. The breakfast buffet was of very high  international standard. You could not asked for more for an overnight stay in a airport hotel. Highly recommended!

title: Convenient to the airport, comfortable, friendly staff
review: Dear Corrina,  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on Tripadvisor. I am very happy that you enjoyed our hotel, our delicious food and our hard working staff.    I really look forward to see you back with us real soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Comfortable stay
review: I was with a group of 11 people who was flying home from a 3 week trip. We were flying back to Columbus, Ohio by way of Barcelona. I did some research on TripAdvisor on decided on The Hotel Ciutat because of the proximity to the airport and the free shuttle.   When we were in Tangier, I tried to confirm my reservation, but my phone kept cutting out. The staff was wonderful trying to get my message after about 8 tries.We arrived late the next night and I called for the shuttle. We only waited about 10 minutes and the shuttle arrived and took us on the  7 minute ride to the hotel.  Check in was a breeze and they already had things ready when we arrived. The staff was extremely friendly and efficient! It was 11;30 at night and we hadn't eaten in hours. Luckily, the bar was still…

title: Okay, could be better
review: We stayed for one night in two rooms. Overall it was a good stay. What I didn't like: we ordered two pizzas and lasagna. All the dishes were of really average quality. The shower head wouldn't stay in place due to broken wall hook. The mattress could have been better.

title: Simple y bueno
review: Dear Guest,  Thank your your review. I am glad you enjoyed your overall stay with us. I have taken note of your feedback and we will use it improve our installations.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Early connection
review: Thought I booked a 4* hotel but when i took a shower and there was shampoo and shower gel in the same container i said, mmm... maybe i was wrong, other than that this is a nice basic hotel to stay for one night. Staff is quite friendly, clean, medium size room, lots of german and english channel, not many options. I would come back to this hotel.

title: A welcoming and efficient hotel, good for an overnight stop, especially if access to the airport is important.
review: Dear Francisco,  Thank you for taking the time to leave your comments on tripadvisor.com. I am glad you enjoyed your overall stay with us and that you wish to come back to stay with us.  We are in a process to change our amenities in all our rooms and very soon we will offer amenities (Shampoo, shower gel and lotion)  in small individual bottles.  Again thank you and looking forward to see you back with us soon.  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Overnight stay
review: Excellent place for rest if you have a connection in Barcelona airport. Big rooms, fancy decoration an a big an clean WC. The beds so comfortable and the breakfast was excellent. The airport shuttle service was great.  The negative point, to far from center of Barcelona.

title: very convenient hotel
review: Stayed in Barcelona for 2 nights, picked this hotel because of its location about half way between airport and city. The hotel picked us up from the airport and although very early the room were ready. The room was spacious with everything you need and complimentary drinks in the mini bar. The train station was about 10 minute walk away with a very frequent service into Barcelona. We ate both nights in the hotel and enjoyed the food. There are various places to eat and drink around this hotel. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Would highly recommend this hotel.

title: Just ok - would look elsewhere next time
review: Dear Ann,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience with the rest of the tripadvisor community.  I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and especially your comments about our hard working staff. They will be very happy when I show them your comments.   Hope to see you back soon,  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Convenience at its best
review: Hotel was just ok.  Numerous complaints: wifi only worked if I went over to the bathroom/door, nonsmoking room smelled like musty/cleaned up smoke and when I called about it the front desk said that's what the rooms smell like, and shuttle service took 25 minutes for pick up and then 20 minutes to hotel and doesn't run before 445 I the morning which was a problem for our early morning flight.   Taxi cost us 23 euro!  Bed was ok, hard and playing furnishings (no comforter)  but standard for Europe.

title: A very functional hotel which is fine for the business traveller.
review: Dear Tripadvisor member,  Thank you for your comments about our hotel. Our rooms normally has a good smell but if that was not the case we should of course have offered you to change to another room.   Our transfer between our hotel and airport run every 30 minutes between 04:45 - 11:45 and 18:00 - 01:45. Between 12:00 and 18:00 it runs every 45 minutes.  I hope that you will give us a second chance and if you do, I will do my utmost to make sure you experience the hospitality and installations that so many of our repetitive guests has grown so fond of.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren

title: A great spot for an airport overnight
review: Overall The only convenient hotel if office is in industrial area of El Prat de Llobregat.  This hotel is near to railway station of El Prat de Llobregat and bus stop is just next to it.  -Cleanliness Excellent maintenance.  -Pricing No clues, as paid by company.  -Room quality Not that big, but sufficient for a couple only.  -Room facilities Basic facilities + TV + fridge. No balcony. But only 2 English channels.  -View from room Depends on the room  -View from Hotel Not for view  -Hotel facilities Swimming pool, small gym.  -Networking WiFi available in all rooms  -Staff nature Helping  -Payment methods Cash and card  -Food Excellent American breakfast is available, includes fresh cut fruits, juices, tea coffee, cookies, corn-flakes, milk etc. Even vegetarians can have a…

title: Pleasant Hotel for a night stop
review: Perfect for a night stop before or after a flight.  A bit difficult to find if you are driving yourself, but there is a shuttle bus to and from the airport which is available on request.  Small, but pleasant room, with free wifi.  Restaurant offered a good variety of food at a reasonable price for an airport hotel!

title: Overnight before Cruise
review: Dear Tripadvisor member,  Thank you very much your youre nice comments about our hotel. We are very glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you back soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Very nice hotel
review: Complimentary pick up from the airport with shuttle every 30 minutes. Very nice room on level 4 with complimentary bottles of water. Restaurant very good & opened at 20.00 hours Breakfast extremely good & overall service also good. Complimentary shuttle to Cruise port at 11.00 hours Overall a very good stay at an extremely good price which covered everything. I would certainly return whenever going to the Cruise port.

title: Not a 4 star hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about our hotel. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and our resturante which we take great pride in!  Looking forward to see you back next time you come to visit Barcelona.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Good for a night stop---Not so good for Expoloring Barcelona City or The Beach.
review: Stayed overnight after a cruise. Very nice hotel. Excellent employees. All friendly with a good command of several languages. Very clean. Large room on first floor. Open concept lobby, very clean with adequate seating areas. Situated in residential and commercial neighborhood with shops, cafes, and parks close by. Free shuttle to airport, just schedule ride when you check in. Nice pool, but very small workout room. Definitely on my list for my next stay in Barcelona.  Only complaint was 2 euros for a very small cup of instant coffee. (Free for those who purchase breakfast with room)

title: Great Value!
review: 15 minutes from the Airport.  Free shuttle.  Few blocks from train station.  This was a great value if you wanted to be near the airport but not pay the high prices.  Our room was great.  Comfy beds.  Nice bar and restaurant.  Friendly staff.  Highly recommend!

title: Great location and value for money near Barcelona Airport
review: Dear Noleman,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. We are very happy that you enjoyed our hotel and especially your nice comments about our staff that I will make sure to pass on.  Looking forward to see you back soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren dircdp@salleshotels.com

title: Near Barcelona Airport
review: It is the second time we have used this hotel when taking flights from Barcelona and needing to park our car for a number of days. The hotel is of a very good standard and in a nice location close to restaurants in a good neighborhood. The staff are very helpful and pleasant and with the special deals on parking the car it is a great choice of hotel.

title: Not a solution for Hotel near Barcelona Airport
review: Dear Bruce,  Thank you very much for your nice comments about our hotel. It's really great to hear that you enjoy our services and especially your wonderful comments about our staff.   Looking forward to see you back with us a third time.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager dircdp@salleshotels.com

title: Clean hotel with horrible food
review: Near the airport, with shuttle service it is very convenient if you download a cruise and the next day you return flight home. Room clean, comfortable, friendly staff, good breakfast.Recomendable by the proximity to the airport transfert more.

title: Ideal Hotel before a Cruise
review: If you are flying to Barcelona for a Cruise, this is the perfect Hotel if you want a peaceful night away from the Centre of Barcelona. Hotel is located reasonably close to Barcelona Airport and a free shuttle is operated by the Hotel leaving every 30 minutes from Airport and Hotel. We book and Cruise and stay package which included a transfer to the Cruise Port the next day on a luxury coach. The Hotel is very comfortable, offers excellent Customer Service and staff are all very friendly. Rooms are modern and of a high quality, general areas are spacious and modern. Offers a great range of tapas type snacks as well as a full restaurant. Breakfast was included in the package, offered a great choice with really fresh produce in a very pleasant environment. A great stay and would…

title: Thieves roam freely in reception/ lobby area ! Absolutely unsafe... BEWARE !!
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your wonderful comment about our hotel. We are very happy that you enjoyed our services and above all the customer service of our staff who are the ones that work very hard to make sure that all our guest has the best experience possible.  We look forward to see you back in the near future,  Magnus Haggren General Manager dircdp@salleshotels.com

title: Hard beds but acceptable for one night
review: My passport , wallet, credit card, money - were all stolen right under the eye of the receptionist-- from the lobby area, at the time of checking out.   The CCTV footage clearly showed that a thief came from the bar area, dropped his coat on my handbag and picked it up - right under the eye of the receptionist. The hotel management refused to show any responsibility, even though my belongings were stolen from their reception/ lobby area, while I was busy checking out.  I had to miss my flight, was left with no money and no travel document. What added to this harrowing experience is that the  hotel management refused to give me a room/ extend my stay as a basic courtesy gesture - the least you would expect of a 3-4 star hotel.  This was the treatment dealt to me, while I was a…

title: Convenient for Cruisers
review: Dear Gaurie,  First of all I am sorry for your terrible experience having your passport stolen. I have experienced this myself and I know how frustrating it can be especially when it happens outside your own country.   Barcelona as you are aware of has a problem with professional pick pockets that works all over Barcelona and many times in and around hotels. As hotels we feel that we have a responsibility, even though our lobby is a public place, and we of course do our utmost to ensure that there are no incidents of this type in our establishment. Sometime this can be very difficult as the thief many times camouflage themselves as visitors to the congress. Fortunately we have very few incidents of this type in our hotel.  We work very closely with the local police and during the week of the Mobile World Congress we had extra security hired during all the mornings and evenings.  As you could see for yourself in the CCTV footages the thief needed less than one minute to enter the lobby, steal the handbag that was left unattended and leave the hotel.    This scenario differs a lot with what you have described above as thief roaming around in the lobby. And your comments that the staff in any way should be part of the crime is of course not true and I think disrespectful to our staff who always try their best to make sure all our guest feel as comfortable as possible.   We of course take an incident as this very serious and we called for the local police straight away who came to see the footage and to communicate with their colleagues in order to do their best to recover the stolen items. Some of the police do not speak English so in order to make a report they normally direct you to the closest police station.  We do have free shuttles to and from the airport all day long and almost all night so I do not understand that we didn’t' arrange a shuttle back from the airport police station.   Again, I am very sorry for your terrible experience with these pick pockets and if you wish to discuss this further please do not hesitate to contact me on dircdp@salleshotels.com.   Yours sincerely,   Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Convenient and smart  though , in just an ordinary part of town
review: If you need somewhere to put your head down for an evening that is near to the airport then this hotel is fine. But the beds are extremely hard and the food in the hotel is poor. Free airport transfer works well.

title: Decent price, easy location
review: Used this hotel as a stopover whilst using the airport. It was a great price but at the same time I was expecting a little more after seeing some great photos via tripadvisor.   We stayed in January, so we're expecting a duvet on the bed but only had a couple of sheets. It was only after a cold nights sleep that I found the blankets in the cupboard. Even so I'd have expected a duvet on the bed, not an old blanket.   When we tried to come down in the morning the life refused to go to the ground floor, so we had to take it to the first and then walk down the remaining floor with our luggage.   Good point was that we had a free shuttle bus too and from the airport.

title: Good airport stopover
review: Dear Nathan,  Thank your leaving your comments about our hotel. We will take in consideration your comments about the duvet for future improvements of the hotel.   On the other hand, recently there was a button in the lift that didn't work. As soon as we found out we called the elevator company and later that very day it had been repaired. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused and that you had to carry your luggage down the stairs.  If you come back another time I will personally make sure that you enjoy all the services that our guest has grown so fond of.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager

title: Staff need some customer care training
review: I was here twice in September and convenient thing is that the hotel has shuttle bus service, though you need to ring them once you arrive. Shuttle bus departs from the small bus terminal at Terminal 1, Barcelona airport .The savings are obvious since taxi would take you at least 20 Euros in each direction. Once you pick up your luggage, it will take you at least 20 minutes to reach the small bus terminal outside the building of Terminal 1, so my suggestion is you only call them then. Driving distance is only 15 minutes app. The staff was very nice in this hotel and the rooms very large and freshly cleaned. The breakfast is separately paid and I found it little bit modest with great quality of food though and several choices. The bar is opened until late hours and the hotel…

title: Close to airport, ok rooms, not very good breakfast
review: Dear Tihi,  Thank you very much for sharing your experience with the rest of the Tripadvisor community.  We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you have already chosen our hotel twice in the month of September.  Looking forward to see you a third time with us,  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren

title: Perfect Stop  for travelling
review: Stayed at this hotel as we had an early flight.   The hotel is set in an industrial/residential area but this did not pose any problem.   Lovely hotel, very clean and well laid out.   Breakfast consisted of both continental and cooked.   It was very good in my opinion but, the young man who was working in the breakfast room did not clear any plates from the table until the customers left.   I found this quite off-putting having used cereal bowls etc laying around me.   However a very negative point was that I felt that the hotel is let down by its staff - from the top down.   The only exceptions were the pleasant cleaning lady on floor 3 and the very nice gentleman who drove the shuttle bus.  From the moment we checked in until leaving not one other member of staff gave a smile,…

title: Hotel cuitat del prat
review: Nice hotel, seems abit of a run down area. Spent the evening in small gym and pool, both small but adequate, restaurant was very reasonably priced, ie a meal about 12-14 euros. Nice bar situated in the reception/ lounge area. Free shuttle service too and from the airport,

title: Corporate Dry Dock but Good for Airport Early Morning Transfers
review: Dear Amanda,  Thank you for sharing your experience with the tripadvisor community. We are very glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and looking forward to welcome you back real soon.  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager dircdp@salleshotels.com

title: adequate
review: It turned out that my flight was so severely delayed that I didn't have to get to the Barcelona airport as early as I had anticipated, which made this stay seem a bit disappointing. I chose it for convenience, rather than luxury.   Here's what was good:   1. Great bed. Soft and big and wide. 2. Wifi worked well and made getting up and getting ready for my next city easy and painless. 3. Quiet, it's out in the middle of some kind of industrial business park wasteland  Here's what I didn't like:   1. It felt less like a hotel and more like a waystation for the corporate world 2.
