Rooms are small 3. Next to some kind of playground filled with graffiti and junkies 4. I felt like check-in process was an assembly line for flight attendants, people who didn't come to Barcelona for the…

title: Terrible Reception & Drunks
review: Dear Tripadvisor member,  Thank you your reviewing our hotel on tripadvisor.com.   Being located next to the airport we obviously receive many guest from the corporate world as well as cabin staff, pilots and guests like yourself catching an early flight.   Saying that, we also have many guest from other walks of life such as people who visit Barcelona for the art and culture.  Again, thank you for your review and looking forward to see you back with us soon,  Yours sincerely,  Magnus Haggren General Manager dircdp@salleshotels.com

title: Graet place to stay
review: For a one night stop over at the air port this hotel delivers the goods. I got an online deal from booking.com at 59 euro / night. I was welcomed by experienced staff who speak English and received an efficient and speedy check in, I asked for a room by the elevator and that's what I got. Dinner was ample and well priced, the house wine is good and value for money at 3 euros. However on the down side my room was on the top floor which probably accounted for low shower pressure. Apart from that very good all round.

title: Gluten free friendly
review: We were on a flight which was having technical problems and they transferred us to this hotel for the night. Close to the airport. Rooms are minimal. I wasn't impressed. Needs updating!!  But I was lucky, as I have celiac disease, I was scared that I might have a problem with food - but the restaurant Simfonia, on the ground level had gluten free options. For breakfast they had for me the GREATEST baguette gluten free!! What a treat!! The breakfast buffet was very good! I wouldn't recommend this hotel for a stay in Barcelona - but if you're stuck at the airport and with celiac disease- this is for you!

title: A handy place to stay close to the airport
review: Stayed for one short night on the way home to Norway from South America.  More than good.  Excellent location, short free bus ride from the airport.  The hotel and room was clean, bed comfortable ( although my room on the 6th floor was over due for a refurbishment).  Excellent breakfast which starts at 6am.  I didn't have a chance to try any of the other hotel facilities.

title: Very satisfactory hotel
review: We spent a night here while in transit and we were pleased with the hotel and the location.  In addition to the hotel's restaurant, there were several small cafes within a few blocks of the hotel where we could eat.  Our room was very nice and we were quite impressed with the little "hers" and "his" toiletries in the bathroom. Unlike the reviews of other travellers who indicated the staff were rude and/or unfriendly, that was not our experience with the reception and front desk staff.  We found them to be courteous and willing to engage in conversation and share information. We really appreciated the no cost airport transfer.  We have stayed at several hotels located close to  airports while in transit and this was certainly one of the better ones at a fair cost.

title: Nice room, not staff
review: We really appreciate your great review about your experience in hotel Ciutat del Prat. I am delighted that you enjoyed the stay and that our associates were to exceeded your expectations. Thank you so much for sharing your feedback and looking forward to welcome you back. Thanks once more.

title: Our last trip to Spain
review: Accommodation was pretty good. The bed wasn't particularly comfortable but did the job. The room was spacious and was quite clean. Bathroom/shower/tub were all quite neat! Good flowing water and a large tub. Breakfast was the usual. Cold cuts/pastries/ok coffee, yogurt. Though it held a hefty price tag at around 15€.   Only complaint I have is the staff. Not sure if every member I spoke with had just recently been chewed out by their boss, or they just weren't too thrilled about their jobs. They were not pleasant. Not a single one smiled at me and made me feel like a burden to be asking simple questions. (When's breakfast, how much is it, where are the stairs Etc.) I ordered room service one night and the lady who delivered my food almost seemed angry that I had ordered it. The…

title: Nice room, bad staff
review: I stayed at this hotel for four days and I found it to be nice and clean, and a really comfortable room HOWEVER the front desk staff was marginally helpful and had to be prompted to offer advice or help. I had just walked the Camino De Santiago and comfort was my main concern but the staff made me feel like they couldn't wait for me to leave. The restaurant staff was in class all their own though, the worst I have EVER encountered on my many years of travel. I am a friendly person and not ONE  person ever smiled at me , well once the guy in the office said hello, other than that I was invisible, I hated it. It's really to bad because the hotel itself is lovely butI I will never  go back. The young man serving me in the restaurant my last night there took the cake though for the…

title: Good hotel
review: I want to thank you for letting us know about your stay here at our hotel. I apologize for what occurred during your stay here at our property. As this is certainly not the standard in which we have set or aspire to exceed. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. This is a disappointment regarding the unacceptable experience that you had while you were a guest. I want to thank you for bringing this to our attention. Please know that I will review the information that you have provided here to our team, and I will make adjustments.

title: Good value with shuttles, breakfast
review: A good Comfortable bed great after a late night flight. Good shower & everything worked in the bathroom got a double bed when booked for single which was anice touch. Excellent buffet breakfast and friendly and helpful staff

title: Very dissappointing !!!!!
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. I am pleased to know that we meet all your expectations and that our staff took such good care of you. Also Salles Hotels are pleased to hear that we are so accommodating to your needs. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back

title: The worst hotel we stayed in Barcelona
review: Booked this hotel for one night after flying in from Canada and before going on a cruise. We were drawn because of the convenience and they did not disappoint. The shuttle was at the airport after we'd picked up our luggage, no wait at all. The room was comfortable and reasonably clean. The area did not look promising but in fact came alive in the evening with a nice reasonably priced restaurant just down the street and a convenience store across the street. Breakfast was good in an attractive breakfast room, coffee was good though no in room coffee. Shuttle to the port is included which made this a good, no hassle value. We would stay there again

title: Excellent Airport Hotel
review: Comfortable bed.  Blackout curtains.  Great AC.  Good shower & everything worked in the bathroom.  Free and reliable shuttle service to and from airport.  Charming and helpful staff in bar area and breakfast room.  I would definitely stay here again.

title: Great stay for a one night for an early a.m. flights, shuttle included clean room. Girl at check in was very nice.
review: We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed everything about your stay at the Ciutat del Prat. It is our priority to ensure that we exceed our guest's expectations and we are thrilled to hear that we were able to accomplish that with you. We hope that you will continue to choose Salles Hotels.

title: Near the airport
review: Not much around hotel other than eating places but we did meet people that took the train back to La Rambla for the day. We would have gone with them but didn't want to have to get more Euros as we had plenty had we not been ripped off. We had spent all our Euros thanks to a Taxi Driver overcharging us from the cruise port to the hotel. The people we met at the hotel had just gotten off the same ship as us and paid $27 Euros and our taxi driver charged us 49.40. The only taxi driver that screwed us, but I am sure he will pay for it at some point in his life. Once we got into the taxi, he added 10.40, they tend to grab all your bags even carry on to add charges. Wish I had taken a picture of him and his license to warn all tourists.

title: Good for business and fly
review: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent stay at our hotel. I apologize that taxi driver did not deliver a professional service. On the other hand, your review it is very helpfull in order to inform all small details with regard guest experience.

title: Nice hotel to stay over night!
review: The hotel is great for someone who wants to be close from the airport. They have tranfers shuttle and it helps you to take your flight if it early in the morning. The rooms are huge and the staff is helpful and multilingual. The room service is good but a little bit overpriced.

title: Quaint decorum
review: Stayed one night after 7 day cruise. For two ,the room is cute but small.Small twin beds pushed together.Bathroom is huge and luxurious.Free minibar items a plus.Airport shuttle is efficient and fast. Nice small pool with sauna. Very reasonably priced. The waitress was very friendly and made sure, we found the sauna area. Breakfast was more than adequate; however, dinner menu is limited. My friend and I both felt that the weekend staff was not friendly and not talkative. I said good morning before breakfast; staff member did not respond or look up from paperwork.Also, desk clerk hung up on my friend before she could place a room service order. Front desk was called  2 times  come and adjust the ac setting. That is why I gave it 3 stars. I will not stay there again when in…

title: Very nice hotel
review: If you have to go to Barcelona airport El Prat (BCN) look no further this is one of the nicest hotels I've been in Europe, it is comfortable, clean, nice cold AC, free airport shuttle ( only 15 min away), friendly staff, the only complaint are the beds, the beds in Spain are ridiculous, but for one night it was fine. The bathroom was good lots of treats. I travel to BCN often and I will use this hotel again for sure.

title: Very good hotel for flight window
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. I am pleased to know that we meet all your expectations. I’m see that we were so accommodating to your needs and our staff took great care of you. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back

title: overnight stay
review: We had around 15 hours window between flights and booked this hotel to spend the night. The room is very nice decorated, nice and comfy bed. Room was clean, bathroom was very nice with some soap, shampoo etc. A very nice place to rest between flights. Room had free wifi.

title: Thin walls
review: Dear Guest  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. I am pleased to know that we meet all your expectations. I see you took the opportunity to use our complimentary shuttle and WiFi, and I’m pleased to hear that we are so accommodating to your needs. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back.

title: Terrible.
review: I stayed there for 4 days in August. This is an airport hotel and one of the services is a weight balance for luggage, however they charge 1 euro per bag. Not really a service. They have a parking for 15 euros a day. However if you have anything large than a motorbike or a Smart car, it is almost unusable. But my biggest let down was that they charge me an extra 20 euro per day for my 9 year old daughter. Many search engine don't give you the option of specifying a kid vs. an adult, therefore I put only two adults.  They wanted to put an extra bed to justify the extra 20 euro but I asked them not to since that will be very uncomfortable. My daughter is tiny and could share a queen bed with us. It is important to clarify that we stayed at 9 different hotels over our vacation in…

title: Very Happy
review: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback on your experience. We truly value the voice of our guests. I want to apologize for what you experienced here at our hotel. I regret to hear that you were so disappointed with your stay. In this day and age, we know that our customers have many choices, and we rely on feedback from our guests in order to improve our delivery to future guests. Please know that I will review the information that you have provided here to our team, and we will make adjustments. However all the details provided on your feedback are correct and this property offers a third bed as your son is occupying a place in the room. With regard the parking the cost is 15 E per day as a regular parking around the area.   Many thanks

title: Convenient
review: We were very pleased with our stay. The free shuttle to and from the airport was great. Every person we met who worked for the hotel was courteous and professional, and the reception staff all spoke English. The rooms were clean and air conditioned with free non-alcoholic mini bar. Beds were firm but clean. Bathrooms spotless with free shampoo, toothpaste and razors. The pool looked pleasant but we didn't use it. Breakfast was wonderful, a full buffet with all kinds of meat, pastries, yogurts, juices, etc., and even some gluten-free products. Well worth the €13. We only ate once at the restaurant, at 9pm, and the food wasn't great. But room service food on another night was excellent. The WiFi was free but spotty. The computer in the lobby was not free and this was annoying when…

title: Wonderful place
review: Dear guest  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about our hotel. I am pleased to know that we meet all your expectations on your  visit. I’m pleased to hear that we were so accommodating to your needs and our staff took great care of you. Thank you again, and we look forward to welcoming you back

title: A means to an end
review: I booked the hotel only to sleep and take my flight the next day. They have a pool and fitness are and the breakfast is a nice buffet. they have the train and couple of local bus lines to get to Plaza Catalunya. It will be a 30 to 40 minutes trip so I don't know how convenient that is people that don't like to commute. Check out is at noon and late check out is charged 10 Euros an hour. Wi fi is free. They also welcome you with gifts in the minibar. It's a cool airport hotel for me.

title: Disappointed and not satisfied
review: My family stayed here for one night. We were in Barcelona to catch a cruise but decided to come one day early to explore Barcelona. Its near the airport in an industrial area and in the suburbs of Barcelona. I would not recommend staying here unless you don't plan on going into the city of Barcelona. So we had to take a commuter train into downtown Barcelona. The hotel was not very accommodating with room assignment. We asked to have our 2 rooms right next to each other and the guy at the front desk told us the rooms are right across from each other. They were not. One room was in like a secluded corner from the elevator and the other room was all the way at the other end of the hallway. As a woman I did not feel safe being so far from my parents' room. What if I was a minor…

title: Good as emergency airport layover but it's a thieves hangout and got robbed
review: Dear guest   Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback on your experience. We truly value the voice of our guests. I want to apologize for what you experienced here at our hotel. I regret to hear that you were so disappointed with your stay. In this day and age, we know that our customers have many choices, and we value the feedback that our guests give our hotel. Please know that I will review the information that you have provided here to our team, and we will make adjustments.

title: Good Hotel
review: I would normally give the hotel a 3 to 4 star review (that's what we gave it at our last review).  It's clean, quiet, fairly comfortable and convenient to get to the airport. Problem is that it is severely understaffed, long waits at check in, extremely long waits at the restaurant. The biggest problem is that it is well known to hotel staff that thieves hang out and steal from unsuspecting guests and THERE IS NO SECURITY, even though it's a known problem. As we were being checked in, the clerk told us to watch our luggage that was with our kids just feet away (including a teenager) as we checked we found that we had been robbed already after 5 min in the hotel!!!  It was recorded on camera, team effort, one was talking/distracting the teenager while the other took 2 bags just…

title: great hotel to stay if you need to stay over night while transfer in Barcelona airport
review: Dear Guest   I want to thank you for letting us know about your stay here at our hotel. I apologize for what occurred during your stay here at The Westin DFW. . While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. I apologize for the disappointment regarding the unacceptable experience that you had while you were a guest. I want to thank you for bringing this to our attention. On the other hand all hotels around work really hard in order to carry out all safety procedures in order to make your stay safe

title: Convenient to airport!
review: Good Hotel if you are going to stay overnight and get another flight the next day or in a couple of days. I found it Clean and Comfortable, No Frills Hotel and of course, with that FREE transport to & from the Airport, they have a real asset. It departs every 1/2 h to 45 min to and from the Airport. I found the bedrooms pretty comfortable & clean

title: Dirty, run-donw and ugly
review: We stayed there for a night because we had a layover. The only good thing is that it is close to the airport and that it has a shuttle service. But that's it. The hotel has definitely seen better days, is run-down, the beds are uncomfortable, our room and especially our bathroom was rather dirty with hair from the previous guests. The decoration is from the 80s, the rooms are very dark and the light is weak. Not recommendable unless you got a very early flight and don't have time to spend your night in Barcelona (which is only 20min further away).

title: Robbed in hotel lobby!!
review: Dear Guest,  If you could contact me at jreccdp@salleshotels.com telling me more information about the room number, days os stay  ...etc it will hlep us to clarify what happen with the cleanliness.  Regards

title: Night layover
review: My wife's purse was stolen in the hotel lobby while on our first night at this hotel. There was no security except for video cameras and no one watched the front door. The side door was left open for the thief. The hotel staff didn't help us in any way and they were rude to us acting like it was our fault. The breakfast was truly awful, the worst we have ever had. Avoid this hotel!!!!

title: A Bland Hotel in an Industrial Area
review: Dear Guest  We are terrebly sorry for the bad experience in our hotel. We expect taht the police will be able to recover your belongings quite soon.  We understand your frustration because we feel part of it. If there is somethingelse we can do please do not hesitate to contact us.  Regards

title: Ideal for airport hotel stay and exploring
review: Good option, for a layover near the airport. The transport from and to the airport is included you just go to parking G on the airport and give them a call. The breakfast was good, and the room was clean and nice. It even has a small pool if you want to chill out for a while. I asked for a one hour to make a late check out because my flight was delayed, and they charge 10EUR for each hour, I guess they could be more flexible, I'm sure one hour isn't a big deal to give away.

title: Never go Back
review: We visited this hotel for the second time in 10 days at the end of our holiday in Lanzarote. Our first stay was great but this time was dreadful due mainly to the attitude and inefficiency of the staff on reception. Despite a queue of increasingly restless customers the two girls on reception did everything to avoid dealing with the people in front of them and ultimately just upped and left, leaving one increasingly harassed lad to try and deal with everyone. I just wanted to print off some directions to get home the next day but the printer was not working and it took over an hour to do something that could have been done in 5 minutes, I asked to speak to the manager before I left but he was not available. Unless the management chooses to change the way the reception is…

title: Beware
review: Dear Geust,  Sorry if  this time you had a bad impression of our hotel.  Sometimes due to the arrival of flights at the same time, it brings  a lot of people waiting to check in. We try to be as effective as we can, if on this occasion did not manage we apologize for it.  We hope to count on your confidence for a new stay.  Regards

title: Once a 4 star hotel not any more
review: Not a 4 Star Hotel in terms of service received and quality.  Fitness equipment in poor shape and in some cases non working condition. At start of morning  Front desk reception was unable to make change for 50 euros ....sent me to the bar who also had minimal bills on hand. While hotel provides transportation to and from hotel at no charge, the instructions to locate the hotel shuttle pickup were not clear as the booking instructions received required  a phone call to the hotel upon arrival with subsequent instructions provided by hotel reception. Instructions were not clear as was the accent of reception.  Would suggest that the instructions detailing the shuttle pickup location be part of the booking process / invoice. Hotel had a worn look.

title: Good over-night stop near airport with kids
review: When you look the site for this hotel or hotels.com and you are booking this hotel, your impression is that you are getting the best deal, and a great hotel. WRONG- it's in a horrible neighborhood, AC very inefficient for the hot summer day, bathroom was simply dirty, and toilette took a long time to start work ( that's how long the room was out of use), the rooms were very small, not clean. The front desk service was ok, didn't make up for how bad and dirty the hotel was.

title: Very average
review: Dear guest  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your experience while visiting our hotel. I do appreciate that you have given me a detailed review of our hotel. I regret that your experience was not perfect, and I assure you that we take all guest feedback very seriously and work hard to improve our service. We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. I apologize for the disappointment regarding the hotel surroundings.

title: Very poor sercice
review: The room smelled like an ashtray and their concept of double bed seems to be putting two single beds together! Reasonably good breakfast with good variety of ingredients. Mediocre customer services on check-out as no effort was made to apologise about the poor standard of the hotel.

title: Nice basic hotel near the airport
review: Dear Customer  We value your opinion about our quality standards. We take into consideration your suggestions to further improve  day by day.  Thank you very much for your appreciation

title: Nice hotel , good beds near the airport
review: We stayed here for one night after visiting the Costa Brava, with a flight out of BCN at 6 am. We had a hard time finding the hotel with our GPS-- the address wouldn't register, but after parking our car, finding a cafe with wifi, and using Google Maps, we finally found the place. The hotel itself was just fine. Nothing fancy, but perfect for a quick overnight. Rooms were large and comfortable. There was a gym and a pool. Restaurant on the first floor looked nice. We had to leave at 4 am, and there were taxis already lined up outside the property, so we arrived at El Prat with plenty of time before our flight. If you're looking to get to Barcelona from here, I'd recommend taxi. We tried Renfe and found it thoroughly confusing, even though we were very comfortable with the…

title: Watch your bags!  Two of ours were stolen from the lobby!!
review: Dear Geust,  We are glad to know that you had an overall good stay with us.  Hope to see you again in Barcelona.  Regards

title: A great experience-Part 1
review: Everything worked well at this hotell, the staff,, nice rooms, good beds, ac and transport to  the airport. The breakfast could have been a little nore exciting bud dinner was Ok.there is really not much else to say to fill out all these 200 letters..

title: Exceeded expectations
review: We had reservations for one night before catching the plane at 8am and expected the standard hotel by the airport, but this hotel exceeded our expectations. hotel was much nicer than expected. checkin was fast and we were able to grab a bite before kitchen closed - nothing amazing, but still decent sandwich. The hotel offers complementary drinks in the room minibar (water, coke and juice) - very nice and new to us, never seen a hotel do that. room was nice and clean. the hotel offers a free shuttle to the airport.

title: Great stay at Salles
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments.  We are pleased to have been able to surprise you and you a had pleasant stay.  Kind regards

title: Average AirPort hotel
review: We were in Barcelona for a couple of days after a cruise.  Chose this hotel because price was good on Last Minute Travel, and it had a free airport shuttle, wifi and breakfast buffet.  It is a little outside of the city center (near the airport) in a residential area, near train stop El Prat de Llobregat.  We took the train into downtown Barcelona, and enjoyed walking around the city.  Was nice to come back to a slightly more quiet neighbourhood.  The breakfast buffet was one of the best I have ever had, and the rooms were nice.  My only small complaint would be that the staff were not all that friendly.

title: Lovely hotel that is spoiled by poor management
review: Dear Guest  Thank you for your kind comments. We are glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay.   We are really sorry to hear that you did not find our staff friendly. If you could send me more information at jreccdp@salleshotels.com it would be helpfull for future occacions.  Regards

title: Quiet, comfortable and clean
review: I choose this hotel because it was close to the airport. After arriving at the airport you can call the hotel for their shuttle bus. The check-in is a bit slow. The room is small and no shelf space is available to unpack your suitcase. The bed is good and the room gets cool when you start the airco (which only works if the key card is inserted in the slot that provides the electricity). The batch room is OK. The WiFi was quick enough for checking e-mails and some websurfing. The breakfast buffet is good but for 13€ overpriced. The hotel is a bit old fashioned but good enough to serve as an airport hotel.

title: Worst service at check in
review: Check in was a nightmare. Front desk girl was checking a person in for 25 minutes and then just left for her break without passing her line off to another clerk or even mentioning anything to the customers waiting in line.She simply walked away.  The other clerk was indifferent to the clientele waiting in all my years I've never seen such disregard for guests. The concept of customer service seems to have alluded the management and staff at the front desk. I would not recommend this Hotel under any circumstances.

title: Great hotel for a night or two
review: Dear Customer  Sorry for the inconvenience caused during your check in in our hotel; the waiting time and the treatment received.  Thanks to your comments, we have take note in order that such situations do not occur again.  Please accept our apologizes  Regards

title: For just one night, just OK
review: Stayed at Salles Hotel Ciutat upon my return from a 2 day trip to Paris. I had been in Barcelona earlier in the week, but needed a hotel close to the airport since I had an early flight the next morning.  The staff were supper accommodating and allowed me to leave my luggage there while I went to Paris. It was all there upon my return. My room was a nice size, clean and spacious. I ordered room service and my steak arrived cooked to perfection (medium rare). The location is definitely far from Barcelona, but it was a perfect place to stay if you were flying out in a day or two.  I can't remember the concierge's names, but once i do I will update this review. He was so friendly, nice, gave us tips, helped me with my luggage and ensured I had shuttle service for my early morning…

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your kind comments about staff and services.  We really appreciate it and we are glad to hear that you will recommen our hotel for future stays,  Kind regards

title: "Near airport, free transfer, free minibar, easy to reach Barcelona, what more do you need...."
review: We stayed at a great Airbnb flat while in Barcelona, but our plane got in late and we couldn't check in until the next day. So we spent the night at the near to the airport Hotel Cuitat del Prat. We were exhausted and just wanted to recharge our phones and get some sleep. But as soon as we plugged in our converter, the electricity went out for our entire floor. It took about 45 minutes for them to get the lights back on. Breakfast is not included with your stay, and the charge is 13 euros for their continental buffet. We just went down the street for some coffee and pastries. When we returned, a group of Americans all booked for a cruise, arrived to find that only one room was reserved for the group of four couples. Now honestly, that could have been their booking agent's fault,…

title: A better than average airport hotel
review: Have stayed at numerous airport hotels over the last 30+ years and this is one of the better ones. It is located close enough to the airport for a quick transfer but far enough away so as to get no noise. I arrived at 8:30am after a 24 hr flight from Australia, called the hotel for the shuttle and was pleasantly surprised to be advised that it was 2 mins away from the terminal. It duly arrived and immediately whisked me in a clean a/c minibus to the hotel. On checking in I was amazed to be told that my room was already available - I had expected to have to sit in the lobby for several hours. Whilst the room was relatively small, it was clean and comfortable - only negative, no tea / coffee facilities. Contrary to an earlier review, the hotel is situated on the edge of a…

title: Budget. Free shuttle service to and from airport .
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments.  Please if you can send me an e.mail at hotelcdp@salleshotels.com to meet you personally in August.  Regards Francisco

title: Clean Hotel, friendly and helpful staff
review: Chose this hotel for the free shuttle service they provide from airport to and from hotel. Average. In an industrial area so no restaurants nearby if you want to grab something to eat. Arrived around midnight and hotel bar was also closed so tough luck except for a few crackers I had in my purse that was it until morning.

title: Average Hotel too far from the city with very little options of public transport
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  We are located in the city centre of El Prat de Llobregat. Plenty of bars,restaurants and shoops 5 minutes walking from the hotel.  The bar closes at midnight, unfortunately we can not have at the moment 24 hours room service.  Regards

title: Not as good as it looks
review: very nice hotel, big rooms, clean, staff very friendly. Shuttle to and from airport included. Big and tasty breakfast with hot items such as scrambled eggs, sausages, bacon and even pastry deserts.    Not too much to do around the hotel since it is an industrial area, there are some restaurants and many tapas bars, we ate at a hole in the wall bar and they had the best HAMburgers and sandwiches at very low prices. the area bars close around 10:30 or 11:00 pm  I highly recomend.

title: Great Airport Location
review: Friendly staff check in. Really comfortable rooms and beds. Nice indoor pool and sauna and wifi. Free shuttle to airport so really great location by airport. Sits in a nice neighborhood with restaurants and Tapas bars. Hotel has a nice restaurant and bar also.

title: Great stopover between airport and cruise ship
review: Thank you very much for such a good rating and specially for such a good comments about staff and restaurant.  It is really appreciated!  Regards

title: Nice, clean and modern hotel close to the airport.
review: We were a group of 16 people that flew from Canada to Spain stopping here to get over the jetlag for a day or two before our 13 day cruise of the Mediterranean Sea. Very nice hotel. Located nearer to the airport than Barcelona but offered many bars, restaurants and shopping within a short walking distance. Staff was very cooperative. Breakfast was fantastic and it was included in our room fee as was transportation to the port on the morning of our cruise. I expected problems in getting to the cruise ship using their shuttle bus but they had organized a big bus that brought all of us at the same time. The only problem we had was getting picked up at the airport. That took over one hour before they came.

title: Great Cruise or Airport Location
review: Thank youvery much for your comments.  We are glad to hear that your group had a good stop over in Barcelona and you found our hotel convenient. Indeed it is much appreciated for cruise package.  Many thanks and regards

title: Good Hotel
review: This was a great hotel to stay in the night before flying out.  It has a nice indoor pool and sauna.  There is a nice restaurant in the hotel but it is also in an area where you can walk to a couple other restaurants.  The staff were very accommodating and attended to any requests we had immediately.  The best part was that they had a shuttle to and from the airport which made our choice easier.

title: A good average
review: Overall a very nice Hotel close to the airport. Free airport shuttle. Also only 700 metres from train station which is only one stop from the Airport and about 20-30 minutes to the centre of Barcelona or beach respectfully. The Hotel Foyer was clean and neat with a modern spacious feel due to it's layout. Also has a nice bar to relax in prior to going up to the room. The room itself was clean and tidy with comfortable beds and clean sheets. The on suite bathroom was a let down as the shower head was in the bath and the taps made the water either scalding hot or freezing cold if you didn't turn it precisely. We did not go to the swimming pool as it stated that we needed swimming caps however we did not ask whether these were supplied for our 1 night stay. We also din't use the…

title: Relaxing and close to airport
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments.  We are glad to hear that you found everything convenient.  Regards

title: Close to airport and easy access to Barcelona central
review: After reading some negative reviews thought i had to say how my experience was at this outstanding hotel. Very clean and immaculate. Staff very friendly from reception, room service and restaurant staff. Breakfast was excellent with plenty of variety to choose from. Evening meal was plentiful also. The Sangria was to die for. The only negative was the transfer from airport to hotel not very clear how to get there, would be a good idea if some information could be sent before with directions.  Would definitely visit again in the near future.

title: Worst experience in a hotel ever ! Rude and incompetent, no customer care at all...
review: Thank you so much for such a good review.  We are really happy to hear that you will recommend our hotel.  Regards

title: Ok for business
review: We chose this hotel due to how close it is to the airport and how easy it would be for us to make a very early flight without having to stress. This was a good choice! The stay was made even better by experiencing a large room, very clean, small mini bar with complimentary nonalcoholic drinks, indoor swimming pool (no, you do not have to have a swimming cap on even though all signs and instructions say that you do). Excellent breakfast, a large varied offering, the staff always attending to make sure that all is replenished and well presented.  Service at front desk very friendly and speak excellent English. Parking available at a cost. Train station a 10 minute walk and 3 stations later you are at Las Rambla. If you have to leave early and might have to miss breakfast, the…

title: El Prat - Barcelona
review: l was one of a group of ten people recently to visit El Prat de Llobregat as part of a short business trip. It wasn't the first time we had been there, it is an annual visit to meet with local government officials.   Each time we visit we stay in the Hotel Ciutat del Prat but this year is the first time I have decided to write a review of the hotel. The hotel reception has been refurbished in recent times and this has given it a nice contemporary look. The bar has not changed and the restaurant (breakfast room) has remained the same. Not a criticism, merely an observation.   I had booked the rooms for our party and received the confirmation email ahead of our departure from Dublin. The rooms cost €151 for the stay (Thurs & Fri nights) which wasn't too bad. There is also a…

title: Disorganized and Unprofessional.
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  We are sorry for any inconvenieces caused with your room key. We will try to sort it out.  Hoping to see you again next year.  Regards

title: Not impressed
review: I made the reservation with booking.com.  I arrived to the hotel half past midnight after waiting for 45 minutes for the shuttle bus.  At my arrival the reception desk  informs me that there was no reservation under my name.  I then take out my print out showing that I made the booking.  It takes the receptionist an additional 5 minutes to find the reservation.  He then tellls me that their reservation Office made a mistake with the date and that they were fully booked!!!  These are all lies in my opinion because they over sold that night. He apologizes and then tellls me he can make a reservation in a Hotel nearby the Airport.  Bottom line I accept because it was late night.  I ended in a Hotel below my expectations and had a bad night rest.

title: Very good airport hotel
review: Dear Guest,  We are really sorry for the inconveniences that you had with your booking.  Unfortunately due to an informatic error your booking was made for another day, and the hotel was fully booked for that night,  We did our best to find a solution; another hotel nearby.  Please accept our apologizes.

title: Very convenient
review: While the hotel by appearance seems to be a higher end place to stay near the airport the experience was lacking. The shuttle which we were told came every 20 minutes took 40 to arrive even after the group phoned the hotel. Again, the rooms appear to be the start of a nice place, but lack in follow through: paper thin drapes (no blackout drapes) despite a park with bright lights right outside the window, a couple of plastic cups in the bathroom, and two small rough towels to complete the room.  Overall just not a restful stay. Some higher end touches (and half decent curtains) would go along way.

title: Great place to stay near Barcelona Airport
review: We have now stayed at this hotel twice, when on a stop-over before a flight from Barcelona airport and we will continue to do so. Hotels in Barcelona are generally very expensive and in fact, you don't get much bang for your buck regardless on how much you spend. This place is different. The rooms are well priced, it's extremely close to the airport, you get free airport transfers, free wifi, free soft drinks in room, the people on the front desk are always friendly and knowledgeable around the area, there's a swimming pool, gym and the restaurant is OK. I definitely recommend this place for anyone who needs to be close to Barcelona Airport. El Prat is also fairly decent for food etc- we found an amazing restaurant near by called ONAnuit- food was absolutely delicious and it is…

title: Good interior but not the place to go solo
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments about staff and services.  We are glad to hear that you found El Prat a nice place and that you recommed our hotel for future stays !  Thank you

title: Great stopover before our cruise
review: The hotel was chosen for me, as I was attending a meeting.  The staff at reception were very friendly and helpful, especially the male receptionist.  I was on my own and wanted to spend an afternoon in Barcelona and find a good restaurant serving spanish cuisine.  I got some advice from the staff as to where to go, but they could only recommend restaurants in the tourist areas which served european dishes (not typically spanish).  I did find somewhere, but wasn't overly impressed.  The hotel's distance from the city centre made it very difficult and scary to find my way back afterwards if using the train. The room itself was fairly basic - no tea/coffee making facilities, no shampoo/bubble bath, the bathroom packs contained toothbrush and toothpaste, which you would not expect.…

title: Disappointing
review: Thank you for taking the time to review us.  We are happy to hear that your stay was pleasant and you found our hotel good.  Kind regards

title: Unique Chic and a Great Stay Between!
review: I chose this hotel in Barcelona as we flew in late for a cruise the next day. Phoned the hotel when we landed around midnight and they came to pick us up within 10 mins.  Quick journey to the hotel (approx 5 mins). Comfortable room. Water and soft drinks in the mini bar were complimentary (very welcome after travelling late). Nice breakfast and free transport to the port in the morning.  Excellent value. Would definitely recommend.

title: We stayed only one night but could come back some day!
review: We stayed there only one night beacause our flight was cancelled and we have to wait one more night in Barcelona. So, we haven't got any clue what kind of place this hotel is when we arrived. It was very nice suprice. Hotel was little bit old-fashioned, but still modern. Staff there was very friendly. We have a nice room on the 6th floor and there was great view (or at least it would be great without all the rain and darkness which were there during our stay). Hotel offers buffet dinner which were nice, not so many options, but enough to be content. We had to check out so early that breakfast wasn't started yet, but they still offered some juice, coffee and bisquits so we don't have to go travel hungry. Hotel had a shuttle bus, which took us to the airport right in time.   If we…

title: Verry happy with the hotel
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments.  Hope to see you soon in Barcelona, hope you will stay again with us.  Regards

title: Easy
review: Me and my two friends travelled to barcelona for the football, the hotel shuttle service was very quick and a taxi into town is around €20. Rooms good for the price and staff are all friendly. Dont really have any bad points to be fair.

title: Good Airport Hotel
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  Really happy to hear that you found everything fair enough.  Regards

title: Perfect for an early morning flight
review: The Hotel was very easy to deal with. We arrived to the airport, called and the picked us up immediately. We stayed for one night. And left early the next morning. They let us reserve our seat on shuttle the night before. The room was very comfortable but like most rooms in Spain do not turn turn of the cool air until after winter.

title: Noisy rooms, no answer from reception
review: I stayed at Ciutat del Prat while connecting at Barcelona Airport. The hotel is quite nice, in appearance. But the noisy are extremely noisy due to poor sound insulation and when I called the reception to ask for a wake-up call I got no answer (I called three times). All in all, I slept, but the hotel was far below my expectation.

title: Nice friendly hotel
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel.  In order to call reception just to dial number 9.  We have taken note of the problems you had with the noise. Thank you for let us know and we are really sorry for that.  Regards

title: Unexpected Luxury
review: Clean hotel.Clean room.Comfortable bed.Warm showers PLUS charming welcoming staff. Food is served until late in the evening.Breakfast available and served at appropriate times even for early risers.prices are reasonable. English speaking staff is available.Airport shuttle service offered.

title: never ever stay here (2 weeks stayer's comment)
review: Thank You very much for your kind comments about staff and services.  Many thanks for your good review and regards!

title: Stayed here 4 times
review: We needed a hotel close to the airport and close this hotel. It was very beautiful and the room was spacious. The check in process was slow as they only had on desk clerk when several guests arrived on the airport shuttle. The desk clerk spoke English and was very pleasant. We purchased the breakfast buffet with our room reservation and it was very reasonable and had hot and cold dishes. Our only complaint was shuttle service. We could not reach the hotel by phone to reserve a time for airport pick-up so we waited until we could get another shuttle service to call his friend who worked there to get word that we needed to be picked up.  When we finally got picked up an hour later. The driver then spent 20 minutes on having a few smokes and chatting up the pretty pilot he was…

title: Stayed only 6 hrs but got a good quality sleep
review: Had to stay at this hotel as the "connection" between flight from Barca to Madrid. The hotel is very close to the airport and offer free shuttle service. Had to check out at 4.30 am (checked in at around 11 pm the day before). The room was clean, had all the necessary amenities, would recommend!

title: great for an overnight stay when arriving or departing from airport
review: Thank you very much for your recommendation !  We are glad to hear that you found our hotel perfect.  Regards

title: good all round place to stay
review: We stayed at this hotel for one night prior to a cruise in October. We arrived at the airport around seven o'clock. in the evening. We had to ask around the terminal in a couple of places to find where to pick up the shuttle but once we found the spot to wait at, everything went smoothly. The hotel is in what appears to be an industrial park area at first glance, about a 15 min. drive from the airport. However, when we exited the hotel to stretch our legs, we found that if you turn right from the front door and walk up the street, you will find a childrens playground, a  school, pharmacy, some shops, apartment buildings etc. In other words, you are in a real neighbourhood. The morning of our departure  we had a couple of free hours and went for a stroll and a look round in the…

title: Great Transit Hotel
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to reivew us.  We are glad tio hear that you found our hotel nice and you had a pleasant stay  Regards

title: Good enough but nothing special
review: Stayed for a night with my girlfriend on july 15 2014 before setting off for Benicassim Festival. The hotel is well kept and classic yet luxurious feel with marble finishing through out. The Rooms are spacious with air condtioning and a feel of quality. Nice big sized bathroom . The Swimming pool is a fine size for a a quick dip but not for legnths of the pool. Great that the pool has a mini sauna, good to unwind and relax. The Restaurant had a small menu cooked to perfection.Definitely have breakfast the next morning as there is so much to choose from in the buffet.This hotel offers value for Money and a comfortable stay. A Big issue however is the Taxi pick up from the Airport that needs addressing. The hotel sent a driver that does not look out for his Guests and instead…

title: Great Hotel & very friendly
review: A great hotel, very close to the airport and only a train journey away from the city centre of Barcelona which can be quite nice to get away from the hustle and bustle. Shops and Supermarkets also close by with a small newsagent straight across the road that opens late, as well as some café bars.  If you take the hotel phone number with you and phone them when you land they will then advise you what pick up point is closest to you and what the eta of the next shuttle is which then saves you walking miles. we learned after our first trip as like fastpakker we walked miles and waited ages, but sussed it out for the next trip[ and worked a treat.  Breakfast is really good with a help yourself, eat as much as you like buffet and our Son loved it, who does not always eat breakfast…

title: Usefull, very close to the airport
review: Nice new hotel, close to airport. Hotel provides free transfer from/ to airport.  There is a train station close to hotel (about 10-15 minutes by foot) from where it is possible to get to the centre of Barcelona.

title: Free Air&Port Shuttle/Breakfast
review: Thank you very much for your comments and good rating in Tripadvisor.  Many thanks and hope to see you again.  Regards

title: salles hotel el prat de llobregat barcelona
review: very useful if you have the flight early in the morning, the hotel is very close to the airport, with the free bus, you just need to call the hotel as soon as you have picked up your luggage. nice rooms, with free wi-fi and some free drinks on the frigobar

title: CLEAN ,SAFE, HELPFUL FRIENDLY STAFF, HUGE ROOMS!
review: Hotel staff are amazing, genuine and friendly. Buffet breakfast wow, the choices from cold meats, bacon & eggs, fruit, cereals, coffee & lots of pastries. The rooms are HUGE! The windows are soundproof & they open. Two small bottles of water & two of soft drink for FREE every day. The pool is warm a soothing after a big day of sightseeing. The rooms all have bath tubs longer than my feet could touch the end by 30cm! Free his & hers toiletries. I've read reviews on this location which made it sound like there was nothing else but an industrial site, not completely true. There is a chemist across the road and lots of little shops to buy eats as well as places to eat, nothing fancy but local. Little pastry shops and a pizza place, bars, kebab shop. You can buy a stick of warm just…

review: Thank you very much for such a good review  We will be delighted to see you soon again !  Regards

title: Great Location, Terrible Service
review: We recenty stayed at the Salles Hotel Ciutat del Prat the night before leaving Barcelona -:(.  Our check in was handled by the beautiful and efficient Alba.  Our room was nicely decorated and very quiet.  The windows are double glazed - open the window major noise, close the window complete quiet - our room looked over a small park.  Breakfast - will eat elsewhere next time.  We so enjoyed opening the window and watching the locals. May sound silly but it was one of the highlights of our trip.

title: Nice convenient hotel near Barcelona Airport
review: Thank you very much for such a good review  We are gld to hear that you love our hotel  Regards

title: Just "OK-", disappointing and noisy
review: This hotel is near the airport and has a courtesy airport bus.  However, the service is poor.  They could not print our boarding pass without having it emailed to the hotel.  The staff was curt and not very helpful.  We went into the bar to have a drink and eat in the late afternoon.  The pizza served was very good, but the bartender was constantly bringing in more dirty glassware from the adjacent room, setting it on the bar adjacent to where I was eating and then constantly washing this glassware behind the bar.    Room 507 was clean but had an antiseptic smell so strong in the bathroom when we entered that we could not hardly stand the smell.  The room was noisy -- street noise, A/C heating unit switched on and off constantly and was noisy, plus the usual hotel sounds of…

title: Good but...
review: We had a single night before flying out of BCN and Ciutat del Prat was convenient and it did have a good price, clean quiet room and helpful staff.  But I am only giving it an average rating - though it is not really a fault of the hotel there is a very limited option for dining in the area and it took one-hour to get registered.  The staff seemed to be working hard but a tour arrived right before us and the 8 - 10 folks took the two staff a full hour!  I will say their free shuttle to the airport was nice and though we left at 5am an adjoining room was stirring, and loud, at 4am.

title: Hotel with good restaurant and airport shuttle
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review us.  Thank you for your kind comments about our staff members.  Regards

title: Clean, comfortable and great value for easy airport access.
review: Spacious hotel with good restaurant and 'park and fly package, which is very convenient and excellent value.  Quiet room, with comfortable bed.  Decor drab, so could benefit from updating. Location is not salubrious, so the shuttle service to and from the airport is convenient.  Restaurant staff were efficient and friendly.  The food was good and reasonably priced  Would stay again.

title: Adequate
review: Thank you very much for such a good feed back  Kind regards and hope to see you soon

title: Great for stay over before a cruise
review: I stayed at this hotel for one night, having arrived at the airport mid-evening. The free shuttle service was very convenient and the hotel is a short drive from the airport. The only small issue I experienced during my stay was that it took a long time to check-in as there was only one receptionist dealing with several guests. The room was comfortable, the complimentary wi-fi was excellent and the bar service for coffee in the morning and drinks in the evening was friendly and efficient (and English speaking). The free shuttle whisked me back to the airport on my departure.  The pool is tiny and not really suitable for proper swimming. I would recommend this hotel for any travelers wanting an inexpensive, comfortable airport hotel.

title: Great for airport access
review: We needed a place near the airport before an early flight.  This was perfect.  There is a free shuttle to/from the airport.  The room was pleasant-bathroom good and the breakfast was one of the best we've encountered.  Hotel staff was fine.  Very good value for price.

title: Good hotel mid-way between airport and cruise terminal
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our hotel.  Kind regards

title: Never expected qulity hotel near airport
review: As we flew into Barcelona a day ahead of our cruise we stayed at this hotel. Hotel was clean, room was good, breakfast was generous. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful. Price for the hotel fairly close to airport and cruise terminal was moderate.

title: Not very happy
review: Thank you so much for your kind comments.  We hope to see you soon in Barcelona.   Regards

title: As others have said, good hotel, bad service. Plus not that close to the airport.
review: The location of the hotel was originally our selection criteria because of late arrival and early morning flights.  Hotels near airports usually provide terrible services.  Hotel pick up at the airport was quick and efficient. Rooms are clean. Excellent breakfast.  Quick and friendly front services. The price was reasonable.  I would choose again if I am on business. However, due to the location I don't recommend for sightseeing travelers.

title: Good hotel near Barcelona airport
review: This hotel is very clean with comfortable rooms.  The breakfast is excellent.  Airport shuttle provided by a pleasant driver.  Shuttle to cruise port also available.  Very easy walk to train station for access to RENFRE train to Barcelona center.  Nice neighborhood to the right out of front door of hotel with many little cafés and shops.

title: Better than average.
review: Thank you very much for your kind review.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our hotel and services.  Regards

title: Ok hotel, bad customer service
review: If you're looking for a place near to the airport for a quick getaway, this is a good place to stay.  It's very clean and neat.  If you can't wait dinner until 9:30, they have a snack bar that prepares hot food.  The staff is reliable and friendly.

title: OK but arrange shuttle pick up
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments about staff and services.  We hope to see you soon in Barcelona!  Regards

title: Faux Luxury Trappings Hide Mediocre Hotel
review: I booked one night at this hotel before flying out of Barcelona purely for the convenience of being close to the airport.  The lady at reception was very unfriendly and even though I had two huge bags and was clearly struggling with them, there was no offer of assistance/bellboy…I would expect this from a 2-3 star hotel but not a 4 star hotel as it states.  The room looked completely different to the photo online but was comfortable although I was pretty disgusted to see the toilet had not been cleaned (dried urine drops on the seat). The only good thing this place has going for it is the room service meals which were quite tasty.

title: Rude, unhelpful reception staff
review: We stayed for one night before a flight out of Barcelona.  The front desk staff, particularly one woman named Alba (sp?) was perhaps the rudest and most unhelpful we have encountered at any hotel. She practically refused to help an older couple next to us needing to make a phone call to their airline. She was curt and unpleasant with us.  We asked for driving directions to the hotel which she refused to give us, stating we'd need to ask whoever was on duty when we needed to leave at 3:00am.  We asked for a map to the airport.  No map!  How can an airport hotel not have a printed map of the area?!?  The one open parking space in the parking garage ($15 per night) was so small that our friend had to crawl out of the back hatch of the car to escape.   Our room was perfectly fine. …

title: Fast booking and near the airport
review: Thank you for your comments.  I have spoken with Alba in order to clarify what happened.  Achieve the satisfaction  of our guests is our goal, so we are terrebly sorry if we did not get it this time.  Kind regards

title: Perfectly fine for overnight before morning flight
review: Arriving at 6:00 am after a long bus ride from Granada, we were so tired as we barely had a decent sleep.  With the free 15 minutes wifi we were able to quickly book this hotel.  Arriving at the hotel, the receptionist took pity on us and made a quick check-in so we can refresh and have a sleep.  There is a free airport shuttle as well.  It is the perfect place to stay.  It is also near the metro station as well so that it is easy to go to the city proper.

title: First trip to barcelona
review: Thank you very much for your review.  Nice to hear that you had a good sleep and enjoyed our hotel.  Regards

title: Just right for a short stay near El Prat Airport
review: Online reservation on hotel site was easy. Confirmation email and second email with excellent directions on how to get their free shuttle from the airport. You do need to call the hotel when you get your baggage. Shuttle arrived within 15 minutes and ten minutes later we were at the hotel. Quick check-in by attentive staff (Alba) (although not busy). Arranged free shuttle for the next morning to take us to the airport.  We are on fourth floor (406).  Room is completely fine, overlooking playground. Beds are comfortable, air conditioning and WIFI work well, and bathroom is clean. There is a minibar with complimentary sodas (no alcohol sorry). If you are just looking for a good overnight near the BCN airport, then I have no problems recommending this hotel.  The bar in the lobby…

title: perfect for a stop over
review: We used this hotel as a stop over from a late flight untill we could get our connection the following morning. We had to phone the hotel  when we had come out at arrivals at the airport.within 20 mins they were there to pick us up. the hotel room was clean and spacious and very warm (it was january)the only thing missing were there were no tea or coffee facilities in the room. We had supper in the bar,the food was very good. The whole staff were very helpful. we liked this hotel so much that we already have it booked for this winter stop over too.

title: Hotel stay
review: Thank you very much for your kind compliments !  We really hope to see you soon in Barcelona.  Regards

title: Air France Compliments Stay
review: Hotel room was clean and spacious. Hotel are was good since it had lots of small markets and restaurants. Train station was a 15min walk from hotel. The only thing was hotel offered transportation to and from airport every 20min. When we arrived at airport we waited for an 1hr and a half. When we asked at information they told us we had to call and let hotel know we were there. Being that we come from the other side of map we didn't have a way to call and there was no courtesy phones at airport. So we just stood at pick up area and prayed that they would pass.

title: great cruise package saved us lugging bags everywhere, a train journey away from Central Barcelona
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments.  We are sorry that you had to wait at the airport.  It is necessery to call us as soon as you arrive to BCN in order to pick you up. It is informed in all web sites and inside the Terminals you can find public phone boxes.  Thank you and regards

title: one night stop over
review: Due to the Air France pilot strike we were forced to stay an extra night in Barcelona because our flights were cancelled.  Air France provided vouchers for the hotel and meals for the extra day.  This is a very good 4 star airport hotel located in a fairly mixed residential, restaurant and shop area.  Shops are small and open at about 5pm.  This is not a hotel to stay in if you only have one day and want to see the gothic quarter and all that BCN has to offer.  The cab fare is approx. 50 Euros to the Catedral and central area and while there are buses close by, it will eat up your day and dollars travelling.  Also, the rooms offered to Air France passengers did not have free wifi, or have IPAD docks in the room.  They do have a computer in a private alcove near the lobby but it…

title: business stop over
review: close to airport , free shattle, clean , confortable , pool and solarium etc like their web site... Yes very professional staff complete this package at reasonable good price.  Ideal for a stop over with early take off

title: unhelpful and extremely unfriendly
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments about professional staff.  We are really glad to hear that you found everything perfect during your stay   Regards

title: Fit for purpose
review: we stayed at this hotel for two nights, on arrival the receptionist told us that we were in a very average hotel and therefore nothing good nearby.Further,the receptionist were so rude we actually cancelled our last booking to stay anywhere else. the hotel is overall not too bad, but definitely should get new staff.

title: A good hotel
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your opinions with us.  Probably it was a misunderstanding because we are located in El Prat de Llobregat, 5 minutes walking to the centre of El Prat.  El Prat de Llobregat offers a lot of facilities: restaurants, shops, supermarkets, beaches, Natural Park ... etc. A lot to do and to see. We are 20 minutes located to Barcelona city centre, easy accesible by train or bus.  We are really sorry if you could not enjoy our small city.  Regards

title: Decent hotel
review: This is not the hotel to stay in if you want to see the sights of downtown Barcelona but if you need a clean, comfortable place to stay overnight between flights, then this hotel serves the purpose. The breakfast was good and catered for both European and English/American tastes. I used the free shuttle to the airport for my flight out. The minimum fare for a taxi departing Barcelona Airport is €20 so the shuttle is a good idea. My room was comfortable but showing some signs of wear and I had a scenic view of the giant Estrella beer factory.

title: Close to the airport, good for transit
review: I chose this hotel as it was close to the airport and offered a free shuttle service. I arrived late in the evening and made the call for the pick up. I waited quite a while and was then greeted by a most unpleasant man who probably had a very bad day and was probably not too happy heading out to the airport at the time of night. The check in was smooth and efficient and the hotel was clean and had everything I needed for an overnight transit stop. The wifi worked great and the room was comfortable. The transfer to the airport the next day was smooth and hassle free. I'd stay here again if I had another transit stop to make but I just hope it's not the same driver picking me up again!

title: A huge surprise
review: Thank you for choosing us for future stays in Barcelona.  Nice to hear that you found our services efficient.  Regards

title: Value for money
review: Ciutat Del Prat was not in perhaps the most flash of neighbourhoods but we chose it because of its proximity to the airport and Port for our cruise.  However, it turned out to be the best surprise ever.   Beautiful clean room, lovely bathroom, helpful polite staff, nice breakfast, spotless pool and lovely friendly area around for eating places and shops.   Also close to the station which took us into Barcelona city in a matter of minutes.   We had a terrible flight mix up after they had taken us to the airport and they welcomed us back promptly with low rates to stay two more nights.

title: Very nice, clean hotel
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments and good rating.  We are really glad to hear that you found everything convenient.  Regards

title: Very rude and unhelpful staff
review: Stayed one night due to work, very close to Airport Not so much to do around though... Easy connection to go to the city center Nice swimming pool and sauna The reception staff is friendly and helpul (talking several languages) Only problem, the bar staff did not talk english and a bit confusing on how to get the shuttle from the airport to the hotel

title: Excellent, wouldn't hesitate to return
review: We stayed 2 nights and chose this hotel as it's close to the airport and our flight got in late. The location is great, very close to airport and only about 20 mins (if that) to centre of Barcelona by the metro which is about a 5 min walk. The staff were all very friendly and helpful, the rooms were perfectly clean, spacious and comfortable. The breakfast was really good, huge selection. The free mini bar (soft drinks) & free airport transfers added to the experience. If I really had to find a fault, all I could say is I did think the decor in the lobby was quite dated, the rooms are much nicer!

title: Convenient for airport
review: Thank you very much for your good rating !  We hope to see you soon in Barcelona.  Regards

title: Nice, Clean Rooms
review: This was a clean and well priced hotel with a free shuttle to the airport.   We knew the rooms would be small according to the reviews bit the large lobby was as very. Ice with an bar and small dining. Area which a we bed tapas.   The breakfast bar was excellent.   Would a stay again.

title: Awful customer service
review: Thank you for choosing us for future ocasions !  We are glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay.  Regards

title: Good hotel for airport and cruise port
review: The rooms were very clean as was the hotel overall. There is no swimming in the pool without a "cap", which, who carries a cap with them on vacation?  Service was a little slow but they were polite. Very close to the Barcelona Airport. I would probably stay there again.

title: Nice, convenient hotel
review: We stayed at this hotel after  a late flight & before heading to the coast, Vilassar de Mar. The shuttle service from the airport was great, reception helpful, and the room was spacious and clean. Complimentary mini bar soft drinks and wifi, plus a good breakfast. I'd definitely recommend.

title: Pleasant experience!
review: Thank you for recommending us for future stays in Barcelona.  We are glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay.  Regards

title: Excellent Stay as Always
review: Great experience!! Very pleasant gentleman working check-in desk, room was clean and comfortable with nice, cool air conditioning, bar/restaurant was good, shuttle to airport was convenient and on time (make sure you make a reservation for it when checking in). You cannot beat this hotel if you have an early flight out of BCN Airport!!! Good value for the price, also. Very pleasantly surprised and impressed by the entire experience!

title: Barcelona Cruise Stop Hotel
review: Thank you very much for your good rating and your kind comments.  We are really happy to hear that you found our services perfect !  Kind regards

title: Nice Hotel
review: The Hotel is excellent. It is a little outside of the centre of Barcelona, but it more than makes up for it with its Staff, its Service and its Standards. I would highly recommend to anyone. We first stayed in March last year, just the two of us, and this time we took the family.

title: great place
review: would stay again, the service was perfect, the hotel was clean, the shuttle to the airport worked. the wifi was great, no complaints, but the service at the front desk was just awesome, very helpful and very nice....

title: A first class hotel very close to the airport
review: We are happy to hear that you will choose us for future stays in Barcelona   Hope to see you soon back and thank you again for your kind comments about staff

title: Mediterranean Holiday
review: Just a 10 minute drive from the airport this hotel offers everything a traveller might need. The rooms are clean and spacious, with comfortable furnishings and fittings. Although close to the airport it is very quiet inside. On-site parking is available at €15 and there is plenty of street parking locally though it's in a residential area so don't expect to be able to park within 20 metres in the evening.

title: Nice hotel
review: Thank you so much for such a good rating on tripadvisor  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our hotel  Regards

title: A truly excellent airport hotel
review: The Salles Ciutat Del Prat Hotel is an excellent choice for a base in Barcelona if you want to escape the crowds of down town. The shuttle from the airport is a pleasant beginning the friendly staff are there to help you with any questions you may have.  Our room was very clean and comfortable, a bit small but you are only there to sleep.  Only 3 blocks from the subway that is 3 stops from the central square in Barcelona. Make sure you pay the extra for the breakfast as it is enough to keep you going until late in the afternoon.  There is a pool but it is not heated and is a bit on the chilly side.  I would recommend this property, the area around it has many cafes and bars with friendly locals serving low cost drinks and snacks.

title: Could have stayed here longer
review: This is an excellent hotel. A great value for the money. It is very conveniently located near the airport, but no so near you hear airplane traffic. It's in a quiet neighborhood setting. The room was spacious, clean, with a big marble and tile bathroom. I wish I could have stayed here longer, and if it was located closer to the center of Barcelona or a metro stop, could have stayed here the whole time. The staff were very friendly, and a great buffet breakfast.

title: Good for a short stopover
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments about staff and services.  Thank you for finding us a good value !  Regards

title: Great Overnite stay with Free Airport Shuttle
review: Free shuttle is fantastic for an overflight layover and rooms are more than adequate.  Free wifi.  Didn't venture out of the hotel since I arrived late and left early, so I can't  really comment on the neighborhood, but I highly recommend for a short stay!

title: Week holiday to barcelona
review: Thank you for recommending us for future stays in Barcelona   Regards

title: Noisy
review: We had one night here on our last nite of vacation. The service was excellent in providing a shuttle that picked us up at the airport, and taking us back the next morning. I e-mailed ahead of time, and the shuttle was waiting when we arrived at the shuttle stop.We were pleased with the hotel, the only complaint was the bed wasn't very comfortable, and walls very thin so didn't get the best nites sleep. The room was nice and clean, we checked out the pool, since we had most of the day, but being enclosed inside it was like a sauna....pool temp ok, but it was too hot to stay. Not much going on in the town, but we walked around a bit, and stopped for a drink and some tapas at a place that was open. We also watched part of the soccer game in the hotel bar , and found the tapas at…

title: Fine Choice for Early Flights
review: We stayed here in order to take an early flight out from Barcelona. We took the R2 train from Barcelona Sants to El Prat de Liobregat, only €2.15 each, leaves every 6-15 minutes. It’s an 11 minute trip.  The hotel is an easy 5 block walk from the station. At check-in we made reservations for the free shuttle to the airport for 6am the next day.  The 2nd floor room was a bit small, firm beds, nice shower with tub, tiled floors, refrigerator, working A/C and secure WiFi but we only found towels for one person. We showed at 5:50am for the shuttle and shared it with a family to the airport.  Great service!  We paid €86 including tax.

title: Staff excellent, bathroom a little shabby, resturant not available!
review: Thank you very much for finding us a great service and taking the time to give such a good information about our hotel and local area.  Kind regards

title: Furious
review: We used this for a short stop over on the way home from Southern France.  The staff on reception were excellent and very helpful.  The room was satisfactory but the bathroom was in need of redecoration - various repairs had been made to sealant and fixtures but these were poorly done, resulting in a shabby appearance.  On our last night (a Friday) we planned to eat in the hotel restaurant.  We were ready to eat at 6.30pm but as the restaurant didn't open until 8pm we waited (we had already eaten in the snack bar which is available for most of the day on the previous afternoon).  When we arrived at the restaurant the door was open but there was no one in sight.  We waited a while and then enquired at reception, to be told that the restaurant was unavailable - no reason was…

title: Great place for a transit and El Prat is a pleasant surprise
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments about reception staff. We help us to continue improving day by day.  We are terribly sorry if,due to a special event,you could not use our restaurant for dinner.  We hope that you found the snack good anyway  Regards

title: Very convenient to the airport
review: A friend and I stayed in the hotel on 16th June as we had an early flight from Barcelona airport the next morning.  We had got the last bus up from Lloret de Mar which had dropped us off at the airport T1. I called the hotel for a transit bus to pick us up when we arrived at 19.46 and they said it would be there shortly.  Half an hour later it still hadn't arrived and I called back and was told that it was on its way and that it was doing other pick-ups.  It finally arrived at 20.50!  When I got to the hotel to check-in and by this time we were furious, I explained what happened to a man in reception, and he said that it wasn't possible as the transit buses are running all the time, basically calling me a liar.  I explained we had been in Parking G for the whole of the time,…

title: Mostly good value and great location
review: I would have given this hotel a 5 star rating if not for the pick-up delay.  When we arrived at the airport, we called them at the luggage pickup, but they wanted us to wait until we get our luggage to call them back, which we thought was fair.  We called them after we got the luggage, and they told us where the bus would pick us up, and told us it would be "up to" 15-20 minutes.  We got to the sidewalk pick up spot, which was where all the other shuttle  buses pick up their passengers, 1 bus after another came and left, probably 15-20 came and went, closer to 30 minute went by before the van showed up. About 6-8 passengers climbed in.  My guess was that they were waiting for others to arrive to pick us up in one shot, but they should have been honest with how long it was going…

title: Takes around 10 mins to Airport by taxi
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review us.  Your comments help us to improve our services   Regards

title: Great stopover near Barcelona airport.
review: Nice, quite big hotel, closed to El Prat Aeroporto. We booked a room with free transfer to the airport, but unfortunately it's valid only if the time is after 5.30 am, whilst we had to leave the hotel by 3.30 am to catch our morning flight. Therefore, we needed a taxi. They helped us to make a taxi reservation, though. Please note your timing, otherwise the "free transfer to airport" won't valid.

title: Don't wait for the shuttle, take a taxi to the hotel!
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  Our shuttle runs from 04.45 am until 02.00 am every 30 minutes  Regards

title: Salles Hotel
review: We stayed one night at this hotel after a very long international flight, on our way to Mallorca. It is a five minute drive from the airport in their courtesy shuttle. Once you exit customs, it's better to call them, they will send the minivan right away. Then follow the signs to G parking area, where you will find all the courtesy buses.   The location is good, not a typical industrial area close to the airport, but very near from the center of a Catalunya town, full of life. From the front door of the hotel, walk 1 block to the right and then make it left on "Verge de Montserrat" boulevard, where you can find many restaurants and shops.   Francisco at the front desk was extremely helpful. When you check-in, ask for your safe deposit key, a 10 Euro refundable deposit is…
