title: Good Hotel but didnot deliver services
review: Friendly! Room was very good. Menu in restaurant very limited but good. When booked I understood this hotel was close to Cruise Piers and it was not. It was close airport and they did provide transportation however they would not provide the transportation to the piers as I had understood when booking?? We had to get a taxi that cost 50 Euros ($70). When booking I had specifically inquired about this service??  They also listed breakfast as included but when we got to hotel they said we had not paid for it?? Breakfast otherwise was good.  If using this Hotel ensure that you have it all in print and do not o by there descriptions.

title: A wonderful place to wind down after a cruise!
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  The hotel is 15 minutes from the airport and 25 minutes to the cruise terminal.  We offer a package cruise with transportation included and breakfast too. Just check on the web site!  Regards

title: Good Hotel.
review: The hotel was so nice, clean, and elegant, with many amenities.  We were thrilled to have the pool and sauna to ourselves for most of our visit.  Very laid-back atmosphere.  Formal dining room had already closed by the time we arrived, but there were other food options and a full bar available.  Very cozy neighborhood.  Right across the street was a little family-run coffee shop.  The Mom and other family members working the counter while the little girl played with her building blocks on a table nearby.  When we got out during the evening, the courtyard right next to the hotel was full of neighborhood folks and children playing.  Very homey.  About a block away there is a restaurant that serves dishes that are local favorites.  We met a young lady who was headed to do a…

title: A good hotel near the airport
review: We are really happy to hear that you found cozy and homey the area.  Indeed there are some restaurants and shops nearby  Regards

title: Great for a quick stay!
review: A friendly,well run and comfortable hotel.Everyone from the reception staff to the room cleaners where always very polite and courteous. The breakfast's were fine with fresh fruit, bread and butter, honey, yoghurt plentiful coffee + many types of teas & a smile! The pool and sauna were clean and obviously well run. All round a hotel that I would be pleased to return to.

title: Excellent option for an airport hotel
review: Stayed at the Salles Hotel for a few days in April as I was working in Barcelona and I was pleased with the overall product and service.  It should be noted that this hotel is not in Barcelona, and is located in the city of El Prat de Llobregat which is a suburb of metro Barcelona.  That said, getting into metro Barcelona is very easy and can be done either via taxi (approx. 20 euros) or via train which is a little less convenient as the station is a distance away.  Check in was quick and easy, the staff speak and understand English perfectly fine and the lobby is open and very spacious.  I will say however that a colleague made the mistake of leaving his suitcase unattended in the lobby whilst he used the restroom and a thief came along and stole it without being detected.  The…

title: Convenient
review: We are so sorry that your bag was stolen in the lobby.  However you have such a good recommendation of our hotel.It is really appreciate it.  Thank you so much!

title: First time
review: We stayed one night after a late flight. We appreciated the free pick up and the man on reception was friendly and efficient. The room was clean and comfortable with nice decor and we couldn't hear any street noise. We could, however hear a lot of what was going on in the rooms around us so the internal walls must be pretty thin. The late check-out is great, we really needed the sleep-in. The guy on the desk was a bit grumpy but he pointed us to the train station 10 minutes down the road from which it is easy to get to anywhere in Barcelona.  I wouldn't go here for a holiday but it works well as a convenient overnight stay.

title: Guest Service
review: Thank you for finding our hotel convenient for stays in Barcelona airport.  We take note of the noisy from the rooms beside.  Regards

title: Great for Airport Layovers
review: This is the first time at this hotel, shuttle service to and from excellent . Arrived early 9.25 am but was given a room Evan the booking said check in after 2pm excellent service. Room was large very clean on first floor next to pool

title: Nice airport hotel for early flight
review: We stayed here the night before an early flight home.  The large room easily accommodated 3 persons. We were charged extra for the 3rd person.  Furnishings were nice and included a small fridge.  The bathroom had a "bidet" as well as a tub, shower, and spacious sink counter.  We signed up for the shuttle to the airport the day we arrived and had no problems with the shuttle to the airport at the correct time.  We ate in the dining room and the waiter made sure our granddaughter received her pasta and sauce to order!  We had taken an "Aerobus" from downtown Barcelona to the airport and didn't realize we could've also used the free shuttle to get to the hotel, so paid for a taxi.

title: Don't count on quick Shuttle or front desk on those 7 hour overnighters
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review us.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed Barcelona   Regards

title: Very nice airport hotel
review: I've stayed here twice and the first time we waited for the hotel shuttle for 41 minutes.  Where you wait is not comfortoable - outside, no seating, etc.  When we finally got to the hotel there was a line 9 people long waiting for the single overwhelmed clerk.  The bar was nice while we waited.  This trip I waited for 12 minutes for the shuttle (called to let them know I was on my way to the shuttle stop and he said it would be there).  I saw the shuttle coming, he didn't stop and kept going.  It turns out they reconfigured the pick up area which is now somewhere else.  There are no signs about which shuttles stop where.  I called, he said he would turn the shuttle around, he didn't and I waited 10 minutes more before taking a 20Euro taxi and giving up on this hotel for the…

title: We would stay here again
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  The shuttle runs every 30 minutes and it is necessary to call us from parking  G located in terminal 1.

title: A place to avoid!!!
review: We had a very enjoyable stay at the hotel the evening before a flight.  The restaurants are quite good, the rooms are nicely appointed, the airport shuttle is dependable, and the service is friendly and professional.  The hotel is situated in a neighborhood; we had a wonderful time walking down the main esplanade.  There are kids playing soccer, families out for walks, and bars and restaurants with outdoor seating.  We spent several enjoyable hours just watching life going by.

title: We'd stay here again
review: for one night arriving or departing BCN. You do need to call the hotel for pickup, they don't run the shuttle automatically, they were there in 15 minutes. When you check in you need to let them know what time you need the shuttle back to the airport. The room was fine, the bed was comfortable, no bath toiletries, and the hallways are a little loud. Outside of the hotel to the right a few doors down is a small café where we had coffee and pastries for breakfast. If you walk past the café just past the roundabout there is a nice tapas bar across the street. People watched while having beer and croquettes. It's a neighborhood, so there are small markets, shops and bars. We wandered around on a Friday night and felt perfectly safe. The restaurant at the hotel was excellent. We had…

title: Convenient Location, Efficiently Run, Spotlessly Clean
review: Thank you so much for choosing us for future stays in Barcelona !  Regards

title: Great spot to stay the night before your flight
review: This hotel has everything that matters to travelers who want to be close to the airport. Its website descriptions are accurate; it took us only 12 minutes to walk from the bus station the evening before our flight and the next morning's free shuttle to the airport was prompt and had us at our terminal in 10 minutes. Our room was good-sized and very clean,                                                                                                                                                                           with a surprisingly large and elegant bathroom. We appreciated the bottled water and soda in the fridge. The only real negative was that the climate-control system had some sort of perfumed air freshener that really bothered us when we first arrived but we were…

title: Just for 1 night
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review us.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our hotel  Regards

title: Good standard Airport Hotel
review: Great spot for staying overnight before an early morning international flight.  Located about 10 minutes from the airport, with a free shuttle from and to the airport, staff with a good command of  English, and dining in the bar for light meal, or in their full service restaurant, this well meets the needs of the international traveler.  It is not the place to stay for visiting Barcelona!!

title: Hotel airport some way away
review: I choose this as 1 night stay between flights. It's not so close to airport- about 10 minutes drive and hustle to find where shuttle stops. You have to find parking G, and if you miss sign inside terminal you can go in circles. Hotel is placed in not-so-impressive town of El Prat de LLobregat. Not much to see or do there. It is build with some ambition but without consistency to be 4*. Marble floors and bathrooms coexist with plastic doors and cheap decorations. Maybe because of this it is overpriced (at least for me was). From my room I had view over some industrial landscape.  I would rate it as 3*, giving some bonus for good breakfast selection: tortilla, local bread and tomato, jamon, fruit. Free wi-fi.

title: Terrible Room
review: Thank you very much for your review.  Our decoration is much appreciate for international guest as well as locals.  We are sorry if you did not find it appropriate   Regards

title: Beside the airport
review: Went on a business trip to Barcelona, so the hotel was only for sleeping and breakfast. Booked it early, chose a standard room and did not pay attention to anything else.   Hotel seemed posh and clean; however got a room next to the pool. Maybe 9 m2 - super small - the windows faced the pool - well the pool's wall. So basically, my room smelled like a chloride, was super small, all the time someone was in the pool, so it was noisy, stuffed and moist. Bathroom very small.  The food was moderate compared to that of any other 4* hotel.   Will not come back to this hotel.

title: Do not stay at this hotel unlessyou are prepared to have your bag stolen in the foyer
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review us  We are sorry if you did not like the rooms facing the pool.  Please next time just say the reception staff to change it   Regards

title: Perfect for airport stopover
review: It's located beside the airport and offers a quick airport shuttle service. 15 minutes walk and you're at the train station with a direct line into Sants Station. The rooms are of a decent size with a nice sized bathroom. El Prat itself doesn't feel completely safe and if you're looking to have a good time in Barcelona you're probably better off staying in the city.

title: An okay airport hotel ... staff could use more training
review: We stayed at this hotel for 2 nights before departing from Barcelona Airport.  The hotel room was clean and the beds were comfortable and the only big issue we had was with the staff.  We booked this hotel at least 3 months in advance and requested a quiet room with 2 beds at the time I made my reservation.  The room had only a king size bed so I requested a different room with 2 beds.  The room was changed to one with 2 beds but we found that the room was fairly noisy.  We were told that there were no other rooms like this available so we settled on this one.  Later in the evening, we went to the bar to get a bucket of ice to take to our room.  The bartender pulled out a white plastic bag (like the supermarket ones) and started to fill it with ice and when I explained that it…

title: noise vs airlessness
review: Thank you very much for your comments  We have spoken with the bar's staff in order to improve our standards  Your comments helped us a lot  Regards

title: Interesting decor and fast WIFI but bed uncomfortable
review: This could have been a very good hotel stay. The problem:  the room windows opened onto a noisy street; with windows closed the fan only worked with the heater on; and with windows closed and the heater on (not cold enough for that) or off there was no fresh air.  We discovered this too late to do anything like change rooms.    Large clean room, 3 1/2 stars not 4.  Would we come back?  Yes in summer when the A/C would have to be on and would drown out the outside noise. Good hotel for catching 7AM flight.  Free shuttle was a definite plus.

title: useful airport hotel for Barcelona Airport
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  We are sorry for all the inconveniences caused with the ac.  We have already solved this problems   Regards

title: Loud and obnoxious party guests everywhere, inside and outside
review: Location Located in the town of El Prat around 10 minutes drive from BCN airport. There is a free shuttle bus but believe you have to call once you arrive at airport for it to pick you up. It also departs back to airport every 30 minutes at 15 & 45 minutes past each hour.  Within immediate area appears to be a small town of some shops but did not go exploring. Central Barcelona is not that far - around 20 minutes drive and will cost about 20 Euros.  Room Room is quite nicely decorated in traditional artistic old decor with massive wooden bed posts. The room has a dressing table and chair, glass top and large mirror. There is decent amount of EU plugs and cupboards including safe and a mini fridge with a few items but not hot drink making facilities. Lighting is adequate with a…

title: Below Average!
review: Stayed there just for a night but didn't find it all that great.. The room had a peculiar wierd smell and there weren't any blankets in the room.. It's really near the airport and the hotel has frequent shuttles to the airport.. So if you have a flight to catch, and just few hours to spend, you can consider it..

title: Convenient
review: We stayed here for our Barcelona stopover, a good choice for those not wanting to bother with the complications of finding your hotel in a big city. Pros: 1. Free airport shuttle, i read reviews complaining about the waiting time but if you call when you land then by the time you arrive at the pick-up point you don't wait to long. 2. Generous size room, we travelled with our 6 month old and after they put the cot in the room we were still comfortable. 3. Little free extras, refreshments in the mini bar, clever toiletries  4. Helpful and informative staff, although i would suggest they have more than one person at reception as i had to wait for two rooms to check in before i could ask a simple question. Cons: 1. Restaurant is quite expensive, we found a cheap bakery for breakfast…

title: Better Than Expected
review: Thank you very much for choosing us in your stay in El Prat.  We are glad to hear that you found us a good choice for your stay  Regards

title: a place to sleep
review: I was pleasantly surprised with this hotel. We stayed at the hotel while transferring between RyanAir flights.  The room was very nice, the location was better than I had hoped and the shuttle to and from the airport were convenient.  The only downside was that we were told that the shuttle bus would arrive in 15-20 minutes and it took longer than half an hour. Then when we arrived, there was only one person working reception and she was involved in a very long discussion with some who looked like a tour organizer. He kept her occupied for about 20 minutes and then the receptionist had to check in two other women who arrived on the shuttle with us. Since it was after midnight and we were traveling with a child and and we were all exhausted from our flight, these delays were…

title: Just 2 stops from city and 1 away from airport.
review: Thank you for choosing Salles Hotel Ciutat del Prat for your recent stay in El Prat de Llobregat.  We are sorry for the inconveniences caused during the check in. When there ar incidents at the airport takes longer for everything.  Regards

title: great place to stay near airport
review: Stayed here one night to break a long trip. Free pick up to and from airport, you ring the hotel and they direct you to a spot in the car park to be picked up, very quickly and efficiently. The hotel itself is clean, comfortable, and quiet, given that it s on a main road in a residential area.  The rooms are on the small side, but the bathrooms are massive!   There is a pool, snack bar, bar and restaurant, and if you turn right out of the hotel, half a block up is a great pizzeria called "la llamada".  or go a little further up, turn left at the crossroads, a few blocks down on the right hand side is a pedestrianised street with several bars and cafes. If you want to go into the city, the metro is a short walk, and its only 20/30 mins ride, all in all, a very good airport hotel.

title: An Elegant Hotel closer to the Airport
review: Thank you for your positive review. Regards

title: Great hotel if you plan to travel around Catalonia
review: good for short stays,closer to the airport and not very far from main city.The decor is impressive with nice furnising spacious enough with good hospitality. The good thing is the airport pick up timelyand the stay is value for money.

title: Great Hotel, Comfortable and Close to Barcellonas Airport
review: Thank you very much for your nice comments !  Kind regards

title: Great Hotel
review: Me and my wife booked 6 nights at the hotel for a winter break. The hotel made a very good impression on us with its level of cleanliness, very friendly staff, spacious rooms, massive, comfortable beds and stylish décor. After our experience with Spanish hotels we expected something completely different for the price we paid. In addition it's only 10 mins drive from the airport, so no stress before the departure, and to our surprise the shuttle from and to the airport was included in price of the room. Breakfast buffet was delicious and versatile.  It's definitely easy for budget and good option for those who plan to visit Barcelona (it's only about ten minutes on the train from El Prat to Barcelona Sants - the main hub station) and lovely and always sunny Catalunya.  We…

title: Convenient, efficient and reasonable cost @barcelona airport
review: Have stayed at Ciutat del Prat twice for the purpose of late night/early morning airport access. 5 reasons why excellent for this purpose: 1) within 10 mins. drive of airport 2) free shuttle from parking area G a 5-10 min walk from baggage claim 3) Renfe train into city center is 10-15 min. Walk from the hotel 4) departure is well-organized, with automated wake-up call and shuttle reservations 5) clean with decent his/hers amenities, incl. mini toothbrush/paste, shower sponge, razor. Note: if actually visiting the city of Barcelona stay anywhere near the metro as it is easy to navigate, trains every 2 mins. 2 Euro for 1-way ticket, or 10-entry pass for 10 Euro is a better deal.

title: Comfortable and close to the airport
review: Thank you very much for your good rating and the occurate information about our hotel.  Regards

title: More than 4 stars for me.
review: My husband, son, and I had an overnight layover in Barcelona and chose to go with that place. We had a very pleasant stay - the room was spacious, clean, and organized. Well equipped bathroom.  The staff was pleasant and helpfull, and breakfast was excellent with tons of options. We also got a complimentary ride from the airport and back.  It is definitely not within walking distance from the center, but there is a subway station nearby or you can catch a cab for about 12 euros.  I put average on the kids activities just because I didnt really have time to look into it.

title: Short stay on my way to next flight
review: Thank you very much for your five rating.  Hope to see you soon in the future.  Regards

title: Convenient airport hotel
review: Absolutely amazed with the condition of the room, cleanliness, hotel facilities and friendly staff. Checked in late as delayed at the airport, was hungry and the restaurant was closed but the bar which is just as good as the restaurant was open till midnight which worked perfect for us so very pleased with that. Close to the airport and the town centre this was the perfect location for the 2 days stay for us and to top things up i asked to book a taxi but no need as there was a free shuttle to the airport so all nicely done for us.

title: Best airport hotel for the money
review: We stayed here the last night before we left Europe and it was great! The free shuttle was prompt, the service was friendly, the room was very comfortable. We even ate at the restaurant there which we are usually loath to do because airport hotel restaurants are notoriously poor and expensive. This one was neither. All in all, a great experience and we would highly recommend it.

title: Near to the Barcelona Airport
review: Thank you very much for your five rating ! Nice to hear that you had a pleasant stay.  Regards

title: Adequate for overnight stay
review: The Hotel have  good location if you want to stay near to the   Airport (only 3km)  attention to TAXI, they asking about  € 24 x 3 km!    the hotel has a free shuttle bus connection between the airport / hotel.

title: Close to the airport, but dated
review: Thank you ! We are 10 / 15 mts located from Barcelona Airport.  We offer free shuttle from 04.45 am until 01.45 pm  Regards

title: Pleasant stay
review: Chose this hotel for overnight stay before cruise.  The shuttle from airport to hotel and again from hotel to port the following morning was included in the price.  We had problems getting through to the hotel when we landed which meant a long wait and arrival at the hotel 1.15 am.  The shuttle for the morning only goes once to the port, therefore you cannot choose a time.  We would have liked to have gone earlier to miss the queues at the terminal but the hotel couldn't do this which meant a long wait at to get on the ship. It would have been quicker for us to get a taxi. The hotel itself is very nice in the foyer and Reception staff were very pleasant. Had a little look at the indoor pool which looked very nice and clean. The room was rather dark and a bit on the small side,…

title: Comfortable and Convenient
review: I chose this hotel because it was close to the airport, and we ended up loving it.  Check-in was easy and the staff helped us with our several questions.  The public areas all well decorated and  our room was clean, roomy, and comfortable.  There is a restaurant on site, and a 'snack bar'.  The restaurant didn't open until 8pm, so we ate at the snack bar, which had plenty of good food. It was more like a casual restaurant, with both counter seating and table seating. It was comforable.   We tried a few things we knew and some we didn't, and liked everything.  The restaurant menu looked good, but we were just too tired to wait.  We took the free shuttle to the airport, which only took 10 minutes or so.  FYI - the shuttle starts running at 4:45am; that worked for us,  but it's…

title: Avoid getting up early for AM flight
review: Thank you very much for your kinf comments.  Many thanks and regards

title: Good place to stay in Barcelonia
review: Since our flight was at 10 am, staying here the night before we left was a smart choice.  No worries about getting up, having breakfast, and dealing with rush hour traffic.  The hotel was marble everything.  The restaurant served a nice dinner and breakfast was included.  The room was comfortable and clean.  The area is ok, but not convenient to go in and out of Barcelona.

title: Convenient for airport
review: Thank you very much for you kind comments.  Hope to see you soon in Barcelona  Regards

title: Airport hotel
review: Nice place to stay in Barcelonia if taking a cruise. Close to trains for downtown visit and access to port. Located in somewhat industrial area but safe for casual walking. Restaurants are somewhat limited but hotel Resturant is very good. Stayed twice and enjoyed each visit.

title: Not exactly near the airport
review: I booked this hotel because I wanted a near the airport facility as I was going to spend just one night in Barcelona, so I was looking convenience and low price. The hotel is not near the airport, it easily takes a 10 minute drive to get there. I waited for the shuttle at my arrival but decided to take a taxi after a 30 minutes wait. I guess you needed to contact the hotel but the thing is that all the other hotels shuttles kept arriving. The hotel is close to a train station but it takes a 10 to 15 minutes walk and you need to ask precise instructions in how to get there. The room is small and the facilities are like a cheap hotel in the US.  If you do not mind riding metro or train I would recommend staying at the city. For me the great thing about airport hotels is when you…

title: Very Nice Indeed!
review: Thank you very much for your commets.  The hotel is located 10/15 mts driving from the airport.   It is necessary to call us upon arrivals in order to get the shuttle at  0034 93 378 83 33

title: Very Pleased
review: My daughter and I spent one night here, having arrived early afternoon on the train from southern Spain.  The hotel is very close to the train station (within walking distance if you know the way) and, with the free shuttle, extremely convenient to the airport.  Our room was smallish, but extremely clean and certainly adequate.  We ate a late lunch in the hotel restaurant, then enjoyed tapas and a glass of wine later in the evening from the Lobby Bar.  The early buffet breakfast was very good at 6:30 a.m. the next morning.  The shuttle was completely "no hassle".  The neighborhood isn't great--not bad, just rather industrial--but the hotel has everything you might need.

title: pleasant surprise
review: Thank you very much for your kind review.  Regards

title: Budget Hotel
review: Perfect location if going to the airport with the free shuttle that is offered by the hotel. The rooms are pleasant, nicely furnished, clean and with all amenities needed. (Hair dryer, make-up mirror, refrigerator, bidet ) It is located near the train station so it is a quick trip into Barcelona Center or to Metro System. I would definitely stay here again. We left too early to purchase breakfast but it was available for a price.

title: Awesome and Well Placed
review: We've just come back from a great couple of days in Barleona and stopped at the Sallis. Located not far from the airport and with 2 free clean shuttles it was ideal for us. We were at a trade show so when we came back to the hotel there were plenty of cafe's and bars to pick from. Top notch all round,

title: Wonderful stay! Great bang for your buck
review: Thank you very much for your comments and your review !!  Regards

title: Excellent choice, close to airport
review: We stayed here the night before we had to fly out. Had had picked the hotel because if it's proximity to the airport. We were picked up and brought back to the airport by the free shuttle. I called from the airport and they arrived within 15-20 minutes. The hotel itself was more than expected- very nice! The room was a bit small but the bathroom was spacious. Certainly adequate for a nights stay. We even had dinner here and it was great as well and not over priced as most airport hotels.In the morning, they provided a complete breakfast buffet with everything one would need or want.  The staff was friendly and helpful. All in all, this was a wonderful hotel and the price was incredibly inexpensive! I think many airport hotels could benefit from what they do here. Apparently they…

title: Close to the airport
review: Thank you very much your five rating !  Nice to hear that you had a pleasant stay.  Regards

title: Could be a choice
review: Our last night in Barcelona before returning home, this hotel was an excellent choice for us. The service for check in and airport shuttle was convenient and quick. The staff were helpful and friendly. There is Wifi. The lobby is open and bright. Being an airport hotel, I was surprised to find that we were able to walk around the area. Usually, airport hotels, in our experience, are near to major highways. This was refreshing to be able to walk around the town. Would stay here again.

title: Perfect Location
review: We stayed here both coming and going so had two opportunites to enjoy this hotel. The location is perfect, close to airport with very convenient shuttle. Had no problems getting them to pick us up and drop off for our flight. It's only a couple of blocks from the train to take into the centre of Barcelona. This worked well for us as we had a few hours to kill and enjoyed them in Barcelona. The room is a good size for European hotels and the bed comfortable. Bathroom has all amenities. The breakfast is just exceptional, probably the best we have encountered in continental Europe. Free Wifi works well anywhere in the hotel. The only problem we had was with a very unfriendly receptionist on the front desk.

title: Airport shuttle overbooked
review: Thank you very much for your positive comments about our hotel.  Regards

title: Great Hotel if You Need to be close to the Airport
review: I stayed at this hotel b/c of the free airport shuttle.  When I arrived I found out that the shuttle was booked & the only time they could drop me off was 4.5 hours before my flight.   The rooms were nice and the staff was friendly but if you are staying here for the free shuttle, be cautious!

title: Good airport hotel
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  Our first shuttle leaves at 04.45 am from the hotel and we have one every 30 mts until 01.45  - latest from the airport to the hotel-  Regards

title: Great stay in a friendly neighborhood!
review: We stayed here for one night post-cruise and before an early a.m. flight home to the states.  I picked this hotel based upon others' positive reviews, and was not disappointed.  It was clean, modern-feeling, well-appointed, and they provided a free 4:45am shuttle to the airport. There was a swimming pool but it is unheated...too cold for me but just fine for my 8-year old! I didn't try the dining facilities there but we ate dinner at a very good and cheap pizza just place down the block from the hotel.  It seems to be a quiet residential neighborhood and safe enough to walk around in.  The hotel is also well-priced at under E100 per night at the time I stayed there.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to others.

title: Really nice hotel near the airport
review: We stayed here mainly for the convenience of being near the airport on our last night in Spain and were very pleasantly surprised by the quality of the place.  It is moderately priced, but everything that is offered is first class.  The rooms are nice and nicely furnished.  The restaurants are a bit pricey, but everything served is of the highest quality and well prepared.  The WiFi is free and works well in all areas.  They have both a swimming pool and a workout area.  Free shuttle service to the airport is fast and efficient. Not much reason to stay in the area other than proximity to the airport though.

title: Acceptable for cheap overnight stay near airport
review: Thank you very much for your 5 rating !  Nice to hear that you find everything perfect.  Regards

title: Good place near airport
review: Very basic room in an area near the airport but without many restaurants or any night life. The bed was average for a middle-tier hotel in Europe but below the level one would expect for an international business chain. The room smelled a bit smoky. I did not try the restaurant as the menu seemed a bit boring.

title: Poor Service Hurt This Stay
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  Regards

title: Great airport at Barcelona airport
review: We stayed at this hotel the night before flying home to Canada. Our flight was early, yet the hotel had a shuttle (service starts at 5:15) that took us promptly to Terminal 1. Our room was well appointed, with a comfortable bed, and a spacious, updated bathroom.  We ate in the hotel restaurant, and enjoyed a lovely meal. My only complaint is that, while most of the staff was friendly and helpful, the lady who was on the desk when we arrived in the afternoon definitely had a grump on. We also ate at a little diner style restaurant, family run, across the street. The tapas was very good.

title: Very nice, since the remodel
review: We had a great time here, the remodeling was done in a very tasteful job. They do need more people at the desk, for check in, but other then that we enjoyed our visit with them. We would recommend it and stay again

title: Secret  Treasure  in Barca
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments.  Regards

title: Nice pre flight or cruise hotel
review: The Salles in El Prad de LLobregat in Barcelona is beside the airport, 10 minutes exactly by train to P. G. Gracia, and 15 to station Francia. So you're never far from all the action, but still  can get away from it all and chill out. The hotel is very modern, has a lively little bar where all the regulars congregate for a night cap. The  staff are very friendly and cheerful,  the rooms spacious, the bathroom especially so, and the beds super comfortable. I didn't get to try their restaurant Simphonia (next time) but the buffet breakfast is excellent.  I loved the Prat itsellf. It is  very clean and safe, and as it is nearly  all Spanish you feel you're living in an authentic part of Spain (well Catalan actually). Hardly anyone speaks English which means you have to gesticulate…

title: Close to airport
review: Thank you very much for your 5 rating !!   Nice to heard that you enjoy our hotel.

title: Average but not in a bad way!
review: We had a one night pre cruise stay, once we phoned from the pick up point,  Luis picked us up at the airport, he was extremely friendly  and courteous. The hotel is 10 minutes from the airport and located in a small town next to an a Industrial area and a short way from the train station. Check in was a laborious process, considering we were pre booked and prepaid it still took about 10 minutes. Tip: make sure you ask for the key to the in room safe when you check in, otherwise you will be back at the end of the line asking for it 15 minutes later ( you need a 10 Euro deposit ). The rooms are clean, comfortable and perfectly acceptable for a short stay.the hotel has a large bar, restaurants, and a decent indoor pool. The train station is a 15 minute walk mostly across the…

title: Fine for a stop over
review: Called the hotel when we landed and the minibus arrived in 15 minutes.  The Hotel is not in Barcelona but in a residential area opposite a chemical works - there was a strange smell during our stay.Check in was efficient and they  pre booked our transfer to the Port for the following day Our room was clean and comfortable.  There is nothing whatsoever to do around the Hotel so we walked for 15 minutes to  the train station, we waited 30 minutes and caught the train into Barcelona.   We had tapas in the bar during the evening and the food was fine and a reasonable price.  There was a very good choice of food for breakfast and the minibus to the port was on time.  I would stay again if I needed a stop over.

title: Poor shuttle bus
review: Thank you very much for the good overall review.  Hope to see you soon in Barcelona.  Regards

title: Recommended for hotel transfer
review: They only have 1 van of 8 seats every 30min. This might be enough to write down that they have this service, but it's not a service for a 150 rooms hotel in el Prat, where it's expected that over 50% of their customers will use this service, especially early in the morning (otherwise, you go to some other hotel in BCN to enjoy the city or somewhere nicer).  So, if you are about to choose this hotel because of the free shuttle to the airport, bear in mind that probably they won't have availability (and you can't book until you check-in)

title: MEETS AVERAGE...BUT JUST BARELY
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  We have 3 minivans running every 30 mts and the hotel is 130 rooms.  We always have availability from/to the airport.  Thank you

title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review: This hotel is very convenient to Barcelona airport.  The staff was very helpful and we used the shuttle twice, after dropping our car and then for our flight.  Although the restaurant was closed when we arrived we ordered snacks (not quite tapas) from the bar and they were fresh and satisfying.

title: Very convenient to airport BCN
review: My wife had an overnight stay between flights. We were very tired from our trans-atlantic flights from Denver, Colorado. We were exhausted! We called from the airport for a ride. They had us at the hotel in 15 minutes. Then they delivered us to the airpot in the morning. A normally haggard experience reduced to a pleasure. Very reasonable price. Would do again.  Also, we slept well on their mattress. That IS A PREMIUM for us.

title: 30 Year Anniversary Trip
review: We are glad to hear that you find everything good.  Regards

title: I highly recommended
review: We stayed overnight here before catching our cruise.  The location was great the service was great. They took us to the cruiseline the next morning. Breakfast was wonderful they had everything you could imagine on the buffett.  The staff was very friendly and the bar staff was great as well. If we ever go back to Barcelona we would stay there again.  It was in a great location and the hotel was well kept. I would reccommend this hotel to anyone traveling on a cruise since it is close to the port and they will take you to the dock.

title: Perfect airport hotel
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments.  Regards

title: Good stop over location for Barcelona Airport
review: We stayed in this hotel because it was closer to the airport as well we experience the charm of the town. The hotel has exceptional service and has many amenities to enjoy during the staying, including pool and sauna if you want to relax indoor.

title: Lovely clean hotel, with all amenities required.
review: We had read lots of average reviews for this hotel, after we booked it so were really quite worried.  We are still staying in the hotel just now, here till Sunday, and so far have been very happy with everything.  Friendly staff and food is great, and we love the open roof swimming pool.  Hotel is not very modern but the rooms are smart and very clean and have a very large flat screen tv. We are travelling to and from the city each day, but a 10 ticket pass its less than €10 and can be used on train, metro and bus.  Train station 5 mins walk, about 10 mins on train to sants which is the main station and from there you can change to the metro to get where you need. We had lunch  simphonìa restaurant, service was pleasant and food was delicious, as was our room service dinner. …

title: The breakfast almost made up for the rest
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments ! We really appreciate it !  Regards

title: Not a bad place to stay
review: First impression was very poor. We received no information about the airport pick up (even though we had asked about this in the booking, without getting a reply), and had to contact the hotel to be told that we should call when we landed.  So, we called when we landed at the airport and were told that we would be picked up in 20 minutes. After 40 minutes we called to remind them, and the receptionist said that the driver were on the road and should be there any minute (probably not true, as the drive from the hotel to the airport is less than the 25 minutes it took from this seccond phone call until he eventually turned up). Finally, 65 min after we called the first time the driver turned up. It was by then past midnight and we were tired, hungry and angry. We do not appreciate…

title: Convenient and very pleasant
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  It is informed in all bookings that it is necessary to call the hotel upon arrival to schedule a pick up. It is not possible to reserve it in advance.  The pick up point in Teminal 1 is PARKING G, so if you call from inside the Terminal it will take some minutes to arrive there and the driver can not wait your you. So please you have to call us from PARKING G.  Thank you

title: Nice hotel - but one star deducted for the pool
review: We stayed there while on a hunting trip to Spain. The restaurant was very good and the room we had was quite nice and roomy.  We felt it was a very good value for the price at 80 Euros. The staff was very nice and accommodating.

title: Average hotel. Functional and fine for the price.
review: I'll begin by saying the images posted for this hotel are deceptive. It's depicted as a chic modern hotel, but is rather dated and old-fashioned. It's fine for the price (I paid 80 euro for one night), but that's as far as I'd go. It's 4 star because it has spa and pool facilities. I used the sauna and pool and they were fine. One gripe - the bar staff almost needed to be prodded awake to get some service, but that wasn't a major thing.

title: Convenient but wouldn't stay again
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review us.  Thank you for finding us a good value.  Regards

title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review: The only good thing about this hotel is it's proximity to the airport and the shuttle bus service. Nothing else. We used the shuttle service and it worked quite well. We got there quite late. They lost my reservation. I showed them a copy of their confirmation email which was smudged because I had spilled water on it and we couldn't see the price they had quoted for the room. She tells me that prices have changed and she wanted to see what price they had confirmed. I told her I'd check my emails once I got on wifi (which by the way was almost impossible to connect to and was very slow) and would send them a copy, which I did. Next day at check out they proceed to charge me more for the room. I had to show them the email again to get the lower rate. I wasn't impressed.   The room…

title: Quiete hotel  close to airport
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  Obviously we had some misunderstanding with your reservation. That is the reason why we asked you the confirmation number and rate.  We are sorry if this caused you any inconveniences.

title: Convenient but otherwise not great
review: Nice and clean airport-area hotel, convenient location, friendly staff, regular shuttle to both airport terminals. There is a nice coffee shop right across the street. I would definitely stay there again.

title: Good airport hotel
review: The hotel is located a few minutes driving from the airport. They have a convenient shuttle service to the airport. In order to get to the city center you have to walk 15 minutes and take a train. Rooms are clean and spacious, and breakfast is very good.

title: Typical airport hotel
review: We are glad to know that you like the variety of countryside around the hotel and the bird watching !  We have a Natural Park just 20 mts by car from the hotel.  Thank you as well for your kind comments and really hope to see you again in Barcelona !

title: Not serius.
review: We needed a hotel close to the Barcelona airport for an early morning flight.  We read previous reviews and chose this one due to others saying there were small restaurants and shops within walking distance.  Check in was efficient - however, as another reviewer stated, they converted the $77 euro rate to american dollars when I gave my credit card - at a 1.36 conversion rate - much higher than the going rate!  I was almost going to get mad, but decided it wasn't worth it - I would advise anyone from US to mention before giving a credit card to want it swiped for the stated euro rate!  So - we paid more than the stated rate, but got free shuttle from and to the airport.  Morning shuttle went great - there were many of us, but they had several shuttles to get us there.  We walked…

title: Good airport hotel
review: Thank you very for recommending us for future stays.  Regards

title: Great Place to Stay
review: The hotel is just 8min from the airport. We just had 5 hours between flights and after calling 4 times to be picked up at the airport we had to wait for 45 min at 12pm. The driver was so unpolite, did not help with our luggage, tried to make us wait even longer for some people and called us liers. At the end he banged the doors. Not serius. Not recommended.

title: not bad if you need to stay close to the airport
review: Salles Hotel is perfect if you're just looking for a place to stay for a night, close to the airport. We called the hotel once we arrived and the hotel shuttle bus picked us up from the "Parking G" area near Terminal 1. The rooms are on the small side but clean. The main reason I'm not giving it four stars is the shower. The showerhead in our room kept swiveling and spraying water to one side or the other, and the water temperature was really difficult to adjust properly. It's a minor thing but when you're exhausted after a 13 hour flight, the last thing you want to do is wrestle with a recalcitrant showerhead.  Anyhow, we skipped the hotel breakfast and went out for some coffee and sandwiches. If you turn right after leaving the hotel and keep walking a couple blocks, there's a…

title: Salles Hotel Ciutat del Prat
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments.  We have repaired the shower from your rooms. Thank you for let us know.

title: Hotel stay before cruise
review: Pleasant and helpful staff. Comfortable bed. Hot water. Very good restaurant. Overall very good value for money. Fair wine list and reasonable prices. Didn't have time to explore the area. Good choices at breakfast. Shuttle service on time but driver too fast.  Bar closed without telling me.

title: Best hotel near airport
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments about staff and facilities.  Thank you for taking the time to review us

title: Dishonest Practices and an all-around Crappy Hotel
review: This Hotel is not located in the center of Barcelona. However it does have a free shuttle service from the the Airport, but you must call when you land for them to pick you up. The following morning, this same shuttle dropped us off at our cruise ship. We were able to do an early check-in with no problems, lines, or hassle. There were several complementary sodas/water in our room. The breakfast was not complementary but was wonderful with lots of variety. You can walk to the metro and for a few Euros you will be walking La Rambla in no time!

title: Airport & Cruise Stop
review: Stayed here a night before a cruise from Barcelona. They have a pick up from the airport and a shuttle to the cruise terminal. The hotel is very well located is clean modern and has everything you need for a very comfortable stay. The staff are friendly and helpful and there are sufficient local amenities nearby in terms of shops eating places and things to do.

title: Convenience, comfort and a great experience
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments !  Nice to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us !  Regards

title: nice hotel, excellent value
review: What a find!!!  We arranged a booking, whereby the Hotel picked us up at Barcelona Airport, and, the following morning, dropped us off at our cruise ship - with a fine buffet breakfast in between. Everything was excellent. If you get a chance, go for a walk in the pleasant neighbourhood, where amongst other things, you will find many Korean souvenir shops (who knew!).

title: very convenient location for airport and to get to central Barcelona
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel.  Nice to hear that you found everything perfect !  Kind regards

title: Not worth the Money
review: Stayed here one nioghr before an early morning flight to the US.  Good corner room on the 6ht (top) floor - room was immaculate, well maintained, and very quite.  Heavy dity shades and drapes for room darkening. Front desk staff was very helpful and waived the parking charge.   Less than 10 minutes to the airport if there is no traffic, and a 20 ro 25 euto cab ride into central Barcelona on a Saturday night.  Excellent vaule for a one night stay efore  a flight..     Only negatives were (1) hotel is somewhat hard to find as few of the streets in the neioghborhood have road street signs and the name on the top of the hotel is not quite the current name (but their vans were parked in fornt) and (2) the parking garage in the basement is very tight for a suv or larger vehicle, was…

title: sleepless night
review: No reply to registered letter of complaint that I sent to manager in March. We stayed here in January 2013. Due to 4 star rating we expected a good night's sleep. We had room 418 at end of a corridor and room was pleasant enough. But the slamming type noise of doors (due to heavy card opening system attached to the doors) until the early hours, plus the very noisy air con coming on every 20 mins in our room made sleep impossible. We had planned to rise at 4 am to go to the airport but decided to go down to our car in the garage at 3am and bliss, cool fresher air and silence. We arrived at our holiday destination extremely tired due to lack of sleep. We are in our sixties and it's the first time I have written a letter of complaint.

title: Okay Hotel by BCN airport
review: First of all we are terribly sorry for the inconveniences during your stay.   Sorry if due to noisy on the corridor you could not have a good sleep night. It is the first time that we have that problem and definitely we try to solve out

title: OK place if must stay around the airport.
review: I arrived at this hotel a little late and the check-in process was fast. The room was nice, clean, and not too small. The hotel provides free wifi with fast connection and also free shuttle to the airport. Based on the location, service, and cleanness - I will return to this hotel if I have a long connection in Barcelona.

title: A travellers and business hotel, 10 minutes away from Barcellona  airport
review: Thank you for choosing us for future stays in Barcelona !  Nice to hear that you enjoyed your visit  Regards

title: Not good but at least quiet.
review: The place has a modern look from the outside (web pics) but it is actually a facade over an old refurbished 3 star hotel. The location is not recommended if you are here to visit Barcelona but it is OK if your are passing by and need to be near the airport with a few hours to visit the city. We weere here for a Barcelona game with a flight next AM. There is public rail trasportation to the city nearby (10 min walk) which links to the Barcelona subway system (3 stops away) and is available until 11PM. The hotel offers: FREE pick-up & delivery to the airport, FREE Internet, a couple of FREE non-alcoholic driks in the mini-bar, keyed safe in the room and it is a clean and presentable facility. The area is residential working class. There are a few bars around but the best food is…

title: Good quality (cheaper) 4 star near airport and easy access to downtown
review: Very clean hotel, good wifi, excellent room with comfy bed for sleeping.  Pool, too.  Stayed here as I was flying from Barcelona airport back to Paris and needed an overnight place to stay.  The hotel was a short 8 minute walking distance to a train station that takes you into the central tourist areas of central Barcelona in 15 minutes....in other words you can be taking in Gaudi architecture in less than 30 minutes without paying central Barcelona hotel prices.  Hotel staff were excellent in pointing out things to see in Barcelona.  Overall a very happy overnight stay.

title: Perfect place to stay before morning flight
review: Thank you very much for your comments. We hope to see you again in Barcelona soon.

title: Very very clean hotel with style
review: After shopping online (a lot) we got a great deal at this very nice hotel for our last night in Barcelona.  The hotel was so much nicer than we expected for the price and the staff could not have been more helpful.  After a busy week of traveling this was a perfect end to our trip. If using the hotel's airport shuttle to get to BCN remember to reserve your spot the night before.  It's about a 10-15 minute drive to the terminals and the shuttle only goes at pre-scheduled times.

title: Only good for early morning flight
review: Thank you very much for your 5 rating and your knod comments.  It is much appreciated it.  Regards

title: Reasonably priced, old-fashioned hotel close to the airport.
review: Very very clean hotel. Classy furniture. Friendly staff. Free transfer to airport which took off exactly on time. Walls are a bit thin, everything else very good. To check-in and out was smooth and efficient. +++++

title: Perfect airport location!
review: Sometimes you're just looking for the convenience of a close to the airport hotel and you find a friendly little gem like this.Convenient pick up and drop off airport shuttle. Front desk staff was courteous, fast, & friendly. Rooms were very comfortable & quiet.Large and plushly appointed beds. Really nice bath w/ nice deep tub. Nice toiletries. Restaurant was more then respectable and very fairly priced. Nice lite menu & tapas at the bar.Less then 10 min. to the airport.I would most definitely recommend & would definitely stay again!

title: If you need a good hotel near Barcelona Airport - this is it!
review: "friendly little gem like this"  Thank you very much indeed, in the name of all staff members.

title: Nice place to stay in Barcelona
review: I stayed in this hotel for two nights, needed a hotel near the Airport as I had a very early departure, and for the first time I stayed in a hotel in Barcelona that is not in touristy area. The Hotel is in Ciutat del Prat suburb, quite part of town. The town itself has it's own charm, here one can see how people live far away from highlights of Barcelona.  My room was small but clean and well appointed. It had everything a traveller needs. Comfortable bed, good and functional bathroom, nice TV. free internet (always important to me). Service was great, everyone is very friendly, this hotel is definitely service oriented and that covers few probable shortfalls. Shuttle to and from airport is free, one call was needed and they were there in ten minutes or so to pick me up.   Good…

title: Short stay convenience
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments, and for the 5 rating !  Regards

title: Great property location and service
review: I stayed at this hotel for a weekend back in April 2010, not 2013 but it wouldn't let me put the right year, it is within walking distance to the train station, they provide excellent shuttle service to the airport, the rooms are clean, the bathroom is beautiful, all marble, I stayed without the breakfast included but I remember that there was a kebab restaurant right across the street and I had breakfast there, the beds are very comfortable and the staff are highly knowledgable about what to do in Barcelona, it was my first time visiting and I had a blast.

title: Convenient Hotel near Barcelona Airport
review: I spent a night at the hotel before my return home. The closeness to the airport and the free shuttle service made it easy to catch the bus from the terminal into town for a few hours sightseeing. Shuttles to the airport run at the appointed time (..:45 and ..:15) only if there are passengers to be transported. However, if you want to be picked up from the airport, you need to call the hotel, when at the airport. Staff at check in was pleasant and helpful. Requests regarding the room were met. The room was on the small side but comfortable enough for one night. The bathroom was spacious but the amenities available were geared towards male guests only. I would have wished for some body lotion in order not to have to unpack my suitcase. Everything was very clean and outside noise…

title: Old hotel, not friendly
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments about our hotel.   Kind regards

title: Convenient hotel for Transit through Barcelona
review: Old hotel, smelled not fresh or clean, same with the rooms.  During the night I've got to kill different musquitos, I don't know where they kept comming from..  They said there was free wifi, but didn't work in my room.   During breakfast they were nit friendly, apparently I was not on the list if guest to come and eat, I needed to pay directly, not really service.. Breakfast was poor, fruit from cans, warm eggs were not warm, bread was not fres (hard sides), ..  Free ride to the airport

title: Charm near BCN
review: We are really sorry to hear that you did not like our hotel. Our breakfast is not included in the rate. The buffet ist 12 € and has a variety of products, from cold to hot, fruits, breads .. etc Is is really aprreciated it

title: Railway connection to Barcelona
review: An average hotel good for transiting passengers wanting to stay close to the airport. They also have a convenient free shuttle service from and to airport. They dont have much to offer by way of meals and if you are looking for a good meal you need to get into the city which is 20 minutes away in a cab.

title: one nighter
review: we stayed here two nights we were going on a cruise.we were picked up at the airport by the hotel free shuttle bus stayed the night then they left us to our cruise ship.when we returned we had a few hours to spare so we took the metro into the centre of barcelona the metro is only 10 min walk from the hotel the friendly staff will give you all the info you need..we also had a good meal at the hotel at a reasonable price.rooms are large with comfy beds only thing missing is tea and coffee facilitys in the rooms.

title: Excellent
review: Thank you very much for your good review about the hotel.  We hope to see you soon in Barcelona

title: Great Stopover \hotel
review: We used this hotel as a stopover on the way and coming back from visiting our son in Tenerife. Ideal location for the airport and with a excellent shuttle service. Hotel was excellent and the reception staff were very welcoming and very pleasant. Will certainly use this hotel again without any shadow of doubt. Only one down point was on our 1st night we waited at the bar foe a good 15 mins and still noone came to see what we wanted. But that certainly wouldn't put us off staying again.

title: Nice accomodations but far from City Center
review: Thank you very much for your commets ! We hope to see you again soon

title: Ok hotel but don't eat in the resaturant...
review: We stayed here twice, firstly on the way from the airport and back again the night before our return flight. The airport shuttle was free and was bookable from the hotel running every 15 minutes. From the airport the very friendly people on the info desk rang the hotel for us and arranged the shuttle. The rooms were good value, clean and comfortable. Free mini bar with soft drinks, multi channel TV in lots of different languages, wake up alarm call and a decent bathroom.  Didn't try the pool or restaurant.  Went out for meals and there were a few reasonable places to eat just down the road from the hotel but they did't start serving until well after 8.00pm but food was okay and fairly cheap. Free wifi, good  service, but then we stayed at a quiet time. Would definitely use this…

title: Solid airport hotel
review: Webstayed there a number of times with kids on the way out of Spain.  Good overall quality, with slightly sluggish and unfocused reception.  However, hotel is clean, well located and with very good shuttle service.  If you manage to get a booking at a good rate, this one is hard to beat.  Restaurant also surprisingly good for an airport hotel. Dinner prices are very reasonable and food quite good.  This is important because the hotel is in a district where looking for a restaurant may be challenging.  Good hub for 70-80 eur if convenience and comfort are important.

title: Very nice place but understaffed
review: Thank you very much for your positive comments !

title: Great!
review: This a very nice hotel. High quality throughout. A top choice for travelers in and out of BCN airport. One of few airport hotels with a free airport shuttle. I wouldn't recommend staying in the area just for tourism. The neighborhood is a bit scruffy. The restaurant in the hotel is highly rated but we didn't eat there. 12 euros extra for each of us for breakfast seemed excessive too. The bar mixed up a great sangria for us, though! We enjoyed it while the lone receptionist labored to check in dozens of overnight guests. The rooms are very cute and comfy. Great beds. The extra blanket provided was filthy & it took two hours to get a replacement. This hotel is about a half mile away from the local El Prat de Llobregat train station. Good value the night we stayed.

title: Very nice hotel
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel.

title: Great, Clean, and Comfortable. Horrible Reception!
review: We stayed one night in the hotel, because our flight departed next day at 7am. The transfer service is amazing, very functional, thank you! And the reception too. The room was big and clean, also the bathroom.

title: Functional grandiosity.
review: OK, I'm going to go with overall **** for this excellent, functional hotel, super convenient for the airport.  Shop around for good rates - we used booking.com   Rooms confortable and quiet with enormous bathroom.  On the down side, the restaurant was only average - I had a gorgeous bit of ox 'sirloin' with anchovy butter but nothing else.  In fairness, this is a common failing with Spanish menus; they're not big on 'meat and 2 veg'.  There doesn't seem to be much in the El Prat area except a pizzaria 'La Llamerada' of which we heard quite good things from Victoria Parking.

title: Wonderful Staff
review: Thank you very much for your nice comments about our hotel !

title: best choice near the airport
review: The best part of this hotel is the staff who are extremely accommodating. VERY clean, good sized rooms for a European hotel, near by shops and beautiful lobby. Restaurant was a little pricey but on vacation you want to splurge a little! Food was excellent. Airport shuttle service and cruise ship service super and you really save using that. Only downside is if you don't want to use public transportation you do need to call for a cab. About 10 Eurs to Las Ramblas. All in all a great stay.

title: Awful airport hotel
review: Thank you very much for your kind comments about our staff !

title: Something To Do
review: We stayed here only one night as part of a long layover in Barcelona. The room was definitively Spanish in decor. The room was spacious enough, clean and comfortable. Walk to the train station to visit downtown, and the free airport shuttle is great and truly where the value for this hotel lies. Price was fair for the quality offered, not exceptional but fair. When compared to the hotel prices downtown is may even be cheap, and the breakfast was plentiful too. I think it is a solidly safe choice of airport hotel.

title: A good place to stay near the airport
review: Public areas are nice and clean and spacious with pleasant staff. Room was a standard double for single use on the 1st floor. Room was nice and clean with plenty of wardrobe space and safe inside the wardrobe. Furnished well with comfortable bed. Heating was working well also. Breakfast was adequate with a reasonable choice. Did not use the restaurant but did have a snack in the bar which was enjoyable. There is a free shuttle to and from the airport which takes approx 15 minutes and seems to run every 30 minutes which is good as the taxi fare is around 20 euros (extortionate in my opinion)  All in all a good experience

title: Good airport hotel
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your experience ! And thank you for comments about the heating !

title: Would stay only if I need to fly out of Barcelona Airport
review: We stayed here the last night of a 2 week trip because we had a very early flight the next morning. We were able to check in early, made our reservations for the airport shuttle the next morning, and then we went into the city for a last walkabout and dinner. The room and bathroom were very large, clean and comfortable. The staff was pleasant and helpful. The wake-up call came on time; the shuttle to the airport was on time. I'd recommend it if you want to be close to the airport.

title: Ideal for a couple of nights stay
review: Thank you very much for your comments !! We hope to see you again in Salles Ciutat del Prat

title: Great value and wonderful experience
review: Good hotel only if used as base for flying out of Barcelona Airport.  Hotel is clean and basic and it has a shuttle for the airport. I also used the Renaissance Barcelona Airport and if I had to choose between the 2 the Renaissance is fancier. The Salles hotel is in a better neighborhood for restaurants and a few supermarkets while there is nothing for the Renaissance Hotel.  do not use the Salles hotel for visiting Barcelona, it is way too far and inconvenient. Overall, it's good for a quick 1 night stay and it is slightly cheaper than the Renaissance Hotel.

title: This hotel is a FRAUD!
review: The reason I picked this hotel was that it was supposed to be a four star hotel. No way this hotel can be ranked so high! I've stayed at many four star hotels around the globe, and by international standards this hotel would be two starts at most. Here is why:  - No Air Conditioning unlike advertised. The temperature in winter is about 30 degrees Celsius. The hotel staff doesn't warn that the ACs aren't working, so when you try to set the temperature to lowest possible, it's still blowing hot air. According to the staff at the reception desk, the ACs are turned off in the entire building. The receptionist recommended to sit and wait for the room to cool down.   - No manager on duty on the weekends. The manager on weekdays doesn't speak English.   - Rude, unprofessional,…

title: Okay airport hotel.
review: Dear Madam,  I have sent you an e.mail with my personal apologies and with all explationas about your experience in our hotel. As you well know, we have talen steps in relation with staff and malfunction of the air conditioned. You have my telephone you anything you need.

title: Convenient
review: This hotel is clean, has nicely sized accommodations, a nice bathroom, and is close to the airport. However, upon arrival at the airport we called the hotel repeatedly for the shuttle but never had a person answer. Ended up taking a cab which cost 20EUR. Also, the temperature in the room was insufferably hot and the wall thermostat didn't adjust it. Was told later that the wall thermostat only adjusts the air conditioning which is shut off for winter. Also, the bed was very uncomfortable-it was two twin beds, not a single larger bed. This didn't make for a decent nights sleep prior to our early morning flight back to the US.

title: Good value w/cruise package.
review: Thank you very much for your comments.  We are sorry for the inconveniences caused. We have taken note in order to improve our services.  Regards

title: Very good for a night between flights.
review: We only spent one night in this hotel when we first got to Barcelona. It is close to the airport, but there is nothing really particular about this place. I didn't walk in and say "Wow, we're in Spain", but the staff was courteous and friendly. Breakfast was expensive but the selection was really nice as they had a bit of everything not just the continental style buffet. The rooms are a bit on the small side but well furnished and nice. The bar looked inviting but we didn't try it. Overall, it is convenient, clean, safe and reasonably priced. We ended up moving to another hotel the next day that was walking distance to the Las Ramblas and the town center.

title: Good choice for a port stay
review: We chose this hotel because it offered airport-port shuttle before our cruise. The price was hard to beat and we only used it for one night. Not a four stars but it worked well for us. Breakfast was good and it was close to the metro, seven minute walk if you go to your left when leaving the hotel. If you walk to your right you'll find several small cafes/ restaurants. The area is industrial, so after 6:00 pm looks deserted. The shuttle was on time for our cruise and we only needed a place to shower and sleep while having a day of sightseeing in beautiful Barcelona.

title: Cheap, cheap, cheap - Do not stay here if you can afford elsewhere
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our hotel. It is nice to hear that you have a good stay with us.

title: Great Airport Hotel
review: Please do not stay in this hotel unless you cannot affort any other place.  The hotel looks cheap, feels cheap and is indeed cheap. You get what you pay for.  The bathroom was moldy too!  I was very disappointed with my stay in this hotel.  Based on other review, I thought this was a good deal because it is close to the airport and offers free shuttles to the airport.  However, their shuttle is from 4:45 and if you have an earlier flight the taxi is not cheap.  I was surprised that the taxi fare from the hotel to the airport is 20 euros when it is supposed to be a airport hotel.  That price is not much cheaper that staying in town.  The hotel staff also seem to be in sync with the taxi guys.  They called for me a taxi and apparently the taxi charges a fee for being called. …

title: Good for an airport stay
review: Thank you for your comments.  Our first shuttle leaves at 04.45 am.  Regarding the taxi fare, the receptionists just call a taxi in case of need, any taxi.  The rate is usually 20 euros

title: Visitor
review: Ideal location for one-night stays close to Barcelona Airport/El Prat (BCN). We stayed just one night, had an early morning flight next day. Staff was friendly and efficient. The hotel is just about 10 minutes from BCN. Rooms were comfortable and surprisingly large (we were in 511). Tastefully furnished. The local neighborhood offers a variety of low-end and low-cost restaurants and shops.  If you drive you definitely need a GPS to find it, else it can be hard. We came from out-of-town and found it after some challenging turns. If you just come from the airport, the airport shuttle is free and pretty fast - I recommend you call the hotel upon arrival. When taking the airport shuttle back to the airport, do make a reservation the day before to ensure a seat. Taking a taxi can be…

title: Close to airport and easy transportation from Port of Barcelona
review: I would definitely stay again since the hotel is close to the airport and offers easy public transportation from the cruise line to the hotel.  Room was a nice size, bed was firm, no American outlets, no alarm clock but they offer wakeup, safe, LCD TV, urinal available for men and a really good local restaurant onsite.  **NOTE: Let the front desk know at check-in what time to drop you off at the airport.  The lines at the airport are awful so give yourself plenty.**  Port of Barcelona:  Exit the port and head toward the “Blue Bus – public transportation” (2.50 € exact change only); follow Metro line L3 (green line -“Drassanes” 2.00 €) and exit at Sants Estacio; change and take to Metro to “El Prat de Llobregat”.  When you exit station head to your right and keep straight as…

title: I wish all airport hotels were such good value
review: Thank you very much for your comments ! Your tips are great !

title: In my limited airport hotel experience this is way above average
review: This was a very good choice for Barcelona airport. The shuttle buses were free and prompt, our room generally very good and breakfast excellent. We also had a good dinner there. The rate of £67 for B&B was very reasonable for the quality and service. The only adverse comment I can think of was that the bathtub was rather slippery for taking a shower although roomy and comfortable for using as a bath.

title: Shuttle bus unreliable
review: Thank you very much for your positive comments. !

title: Yuck...not four stars
review: Salles Hotel Ciutat del Prat is a few minutes from the airport in a neighborhood that was more residential (apartment-lined streets) than I expected.  When we went looking for a place to eat, we saw young professionals at sidewalk tables enjoying a beer and families taking their evening "paseo."   Several merchants (and a few of their customers) volunteered dining suggestions and directions.  At the hotel, our "standard" room was bright and clean. Courteous and helpful desk staff anticipated the needs of an overnight, in-transit guest. We found a couple (courtesy) waters and soft drinks in the minibar and a toothbrush, razor, etc. in the bathroom.  Wi-fi worked.  Wake-up call was right on the dot. I probably shouldn't tell, but I was able to get coffee at 4 a.m. (before the…

title: Close to the airport and train into town.
review: My husband & I just returned from a 12 night cruise and stayed at this hotel 1 night before and 1 night after we liked it . The front desk staff were very nice and helpful inspite of the language difference. We had transportation from the airport, breakfast before we left for the cruise and shuttle to the airport for an early morning flight home. There is a bar and restaurant in the hotel, also right down the street is a very nice place ( El Caliu ) it's friendly, good food and good prices. The hotel is not near anything but the train is not far if you do want to go to town. You have free Wi Fi, a nice pool we would stay there again if we ever get back to Barcelona. We liked the quiet and not being near the town centre.

title: absolutely not a 4* hotel, neither on quality of the services nor on the premisses
review: Thank you very much for you comments and good review ! It is much appreciate it !

title: Good airport hotel
review: Deplorable service at the reception desk. After waiting for 15', the person at the desk office answered the phone a couple of times before taking care about myself. Afterwards, he did not find my booking number and just suggest to me to pay for a internet connection and find it myself on my side. Absolutely unacceptable. Rooms not having the pretented level of quality

title: Excellent location for airport connections
review: We are sorry for the waiting time at the check in.  We try to cater  everyone as quickly as possible

title: Excellent for cruise purposes
review: When you have to get up at 4:30  in the morning to make the flight, this is a solid value, business hotel with good service and amenities, including free coffee in the hotel lobby while you wait for the free shuttle to the airport, which was packed at 5:15. It was quiet enough to go bed about 7 PM with the black out curtains shut.

title: Had a pleasant stay in this hotel.
review: The hotel has a free shuttle bus to and from airport. Really helpful staff and very accommodating. Cleanliness and comfort is never a problem. The problem is when I book my stay I personally asked for a non-smoking floor and it wasn't when we arrived. Also, the internet does not a a good connection in our room, only in the lobby. The rate was reasonable. The food is a hit and miss. I personally like the scrumptious duck confit. Located in a nice and quiet area, away from the pollution and noise. About 30 mins train ride from Barcelona.

title: Expected fore from 4 stars
review: Thank you very much for your comments ! We have removed all the smoking rooms, so the whole hotel is not smoking know. Thank you !

title: Stay at Salles Hotel
review: Well, I believe the hotel which proudly displays four stars on the facade could be a bit more comfortable, so I was disappointed.  + Location is good for those who is traveling on business, free shuttle service will get you to the airport and back if required, the staff is courteous, also complimentary WiFi in the room was fast.  - The bed in my room was uncomfortable, I don't like small pillows and there was no blanket, only bed cover. I had a very tight schedule during my stay in Barcelona and was very exhausted at the end of each day, but still couldn't sleep well. Also there was plenty to choose from during breakfast but unexpectedly a problem occured. I don't eat cheese and cheese-related products because of allergy but staff couldn't tell me if any of the dishes contain it…

title: Pleasant place close to airport
review: Thank you for taking the time to write your comments about our hotel. We are really glad to hear that you found a fast WIFI and a pleasant staff. Regarding the sleep quality we can provide extra blanquest and pillows on request. Thank you

title: MAKE SURE THAT YOU SELECT THE ¨NO SHOW  NO PAY BOOKING OPTION¨ AND THE RESTAURANT MENU AND SERVICE NEEDS ACOMPLETE RETHI
review: We chose this hotel for the shuttle service to the airport. Location was convenient. It was satsifactory, clean and courteous staff. However, the mattress was very uncomfortable and felt like we were sleeping on a box spring. Very basic linens, but clean. I would recommend it in general.

title: I NEED TO GET BACK TO THIS HOTEL!
review: Unfortunately for us, we only stayed here one day because we needed to be in Barcrlona to fly to Rome the following morning before dawn. The hotel is gorgeous (5 Star).  The rooms are exquisite.  They are a bit slow @ the desk but it was worth the wait.   The only negatives were the fact that it's far from town so you'll need transportation to be best the 'action.'  The hotel also gas no pool. We ate tapas  there & they were outstanding.  If you don't mind being 15-20mins outside of town, I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Unpleasant place
review: Thank you for the 5 stars review and definetly we hope to see you back again ! Thank you

title: Very convenient
review: We stayed here for a night because this hotel is close to the airport. I have never seen such a bad hotel - the towels in the bathroom could only be used as rags for cleaning a dirty floor. I am not sure how a hotel could be run with such dirty, worn out, old towels. I started itching on using the bed linen. I am not sure what kind of water/detergent they use to clean their bed sheets. Please don't stay here and spoil your vacation.

title: Nice hotel
review: Sorry for any inconvenience that you had with  your rooms towels.  Our laundry supplier will take appropriate actions.

title: good location
review: We got exactly what we wanted at an excellent price.
