That is to say: Comfy bed Clean bathroom with good shower Quiet room Free shuttle to airport (a huge saving on using taxis) Friendly service  We didn't go there for a luxury holiday, and I imagine you would be disappointed if you made this your base for visiting Barcelona (due to out of town location), but for one or two nights I don't think you could want for anything more.   Incidentally the shuttle runs every half an hour between about 4.30am and midnight.  It is very easy to book and to contact them for pick up when you are at the airport.

title: Salles Hotel Ciutat del Prat
review: Coming back from a cruise, our party of four needed a hotel close to the airport for an early morning flight out of Barcelona.  The price quoted online was excellent and the big draw for me was the complimentary shuttle to the airport.  My e-mails to the hotel prior to our trip were always promptly answered.  We arrived at the hotel in the morning soon after we disembarked from the ship. Since we could not check in at that time of the day, the staff was kind to let us drop off our bags (kept in a locked room by the reception desk) so we could go and do some sightseeing in Barcelona.  We truly appreciated that service!  The hotel's facilities were  impressive.  The train station was only a short walk away.  When we returned for the night, check-in was easy and reservations were…

title: Good Value
review: Thank you very much for your good review. Really nice to hear that you found everything perfect ! Thank you

title: Great Price, Close to the Airport, Decent and Clean Rooms.
review: We stayed a night at Salles at the end of a 12 night Mediterranean cruise since our flight to the U.S. was the next day.  The hotel is very clean, comfortable and attractive. The marble-floored bathroom was roomy and very clean. (Good shower!)  The bedroom was roomy and the king-sized bed was very comfortable.  Employees at the front desk were very accommodating.  They recommended a SUPER, INEXPENSIVE restaurant you should try!  It's a family-run  restaurant called "El Caliu", specializing in good Spanish dishes and great pizza!  (Try the one with an egg in the middle--delicious!)  Great beer in iced mugs!  Very enjoyable family.  Close to the hotel; out the front door, a block to your right.  Salles also offers an efficient, free shuttle to the airport.  We recommend this hotel…

title: conveniently close to airport
review: Thank you veryu much for such a good comments. We are heartily delighted to hear it.

title: Convenient to Airport and Cruise Port
review: I rented this room because of its great price and proximity to the airport. When we arrived at the Barcelona airport, we called the hotel and the shuttle picked us up 20-ish minutes later. The room was great - finely decorated, clean, and comfortable.  We tried to book a shuttle back to the airport for the next morning and the receptionist said that we were only allowed 2 spaces on a shuttle (there were 3 of us) -- which I thought was really strange and rude.  Other than that, this hotel was wonderful.  A rail station was very close -- less than 10 minute walk from the hotel. We bought 3 round trip tickets from the hotel to downtown/city center of Barcelona for 10 euro. The train took around 15 or 20 minutes, pretty fast.  There aren't too many restaurants nearby - although we…

title: Lovely stay
review: Hotel is a lovely building.  Food is lovely, especially breakfast.  Hotel is clean, staff are helpful and friendly.  About 5 minute walk to the little town.  Close to the airport and about a 15 minute taxi ride to the city center.  Worth a trip, if you have time.      Make sure you set an alarm clock, as the blackout blinds will make your room pitch black even half way through the day!  Your guaranteed to have a great night sleep!!

title: Repeat Customer
review: I am delighted to read that you had a lovely stay and a pretty good night sleep ! Thank you

title: Convenient airport hotel
review: I have stayed before at the Salles Hotel Ciutat del Prat, and each time found it to be a wonderful night of lodging before taking off from the airport to fly home.  The people who manage the desk always are exceptionally friendly and helpful, with excellent English spoken.  The rooms are very clean and quiet  plus the bed is comfortable.  There's a good pizza place just a few blocks down from the hotel.  I will be back as a repeat customer!

title: Excellent airport hotel
review: Thank you very very much for choosing us for your stays in Barcelona and for being one of ours repeat customers

title: "Old times" airport hotel for one night stay
review: We stayed here for one night on two separate occasions, flying in and out of Barcelona. The rooms were spacious, comfortable and clean. With the free airport shuttle only taking 10 minutes to/from the airport it's a great place to stay when transiting Barcelona. The staff were friendly, helpful and efficient. There are lots of shops, bars and restaurants within 5 minutes walk of the hotel. We also ate in the hotel and the food and service were both good.

title: Very convenient for a night stopover
review: We chose this hotel mainly because it was close to the airport and had free shuttle service that is running very late at night and very early in the morning. It was not very easy to find the place where the shuttle stops, it's parking "G" across the road from the exit. Hotel itself is ok, very spacious room and bathroom. Decor is a bit retro but not bad. In the fridge there is complimentary water and soft drinks which was a nice touch. Overall would definitely recommend it for a stopover.

title: I agree, great airport hotel
review: Thank you very much for recommend us for a stopover. The hotel is really convenient in transits  to/from the Airport. Thank you !

title: Fabulous stopover hotel
review: We chose this hotel because of its location between the airport and the port.  The hotel offers a free shuttle service to/from the airport but not to the port.  The taxis have a minimum charge of 20 euros (about $28) even though the distance between the hotel and airport is minimal so taking the shuttle saves a nice chunk of change that could be spent elsewhere.  The beds were comfortable and we liked the fact that there was an inner door within the room that could contain hallway noise.  Hurray after a long overnight flight for a comfortable bed and a quiet night!  We slept 11 blessed hours.  This hotel also has complimentary toiletry bags containing the essentials for men and women.  We really appreciated this as the airline had lost our luggage and it made a world of…

title: Great airport hotel
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your review. We are delighted to heard that you have a pleasant stay with us. Thank you !

title: Excellent hotel near the airport!
review: Stayed for one night before joining our cruise ship. Free shuttle service from airport to hotel which is a bonus. We took the cruise package using the hotel minibus to get us to the port next morning. Hotel and rooms were lovely and clean.  Staff very friendly. Had a lovely evening meal in restaurant. Next morning breakfast was excellent - so much choice and all very fresh. Lots of shops and restaurants in the vicinity. I would certainly recommend this hotel and would not hesitate to stop here again.

title: Enjoyable stay
review: Booked this hotel pre/post cruise.  Shuttle from/to airport and cruise terminal.  Located near airport in suburban neighborhood.   Restaurants, pharmacy, grocery store within two blocks walk.  Restaurant in hotel excellent food and service.  Breakfast served by hotel excellent.  Check-in/check-out quick.  Staff excellent.

title: Aircrew staying 6 times a month.
review: Thank you very much for your positive reviews about staff and services. We are delighted to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us.

title: Fine for airport access
review: Stay in this hotel every week never had any issues with service or the rooms! Always use the pool, gym and sauna. The breakfast is very good compared to lots of other hotels! Free WIFI and the train station is 4 minutes walk! Some people must have strange understanding of distance!!! Looking forward to another relaxing stay tomorrow!

title: Exactly 'What it says on the tin'
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to write about your stays with us. We are really pleased to have crew member in our hotel. Thank you !

title: Far off in industrial area
review: We stayed in this hotel overnight after arriving in Barcelona airport and then leaving from Barcelona airport on the following day! The shuttle service was very slow. We rang when we arrived and waited 45 minutes for the shuttle bus to arrive. No apology was made for the delay! The Hotel is only 5 mins from the airport and about  a quarter of an hour from Barcelona city. You have to take a taxi to the city. The hotel room was small but adequate, clean and simple. The bathroom had hairdryer and other stuff you may need like razor, toothbrush etc... There was no coffee or tea in the room which I really missed. The hotel is rather impersonal, not over friendly although when the staff changed in the morning the other receptionist was friendly and helpful. The wifi worked in the…

title: Great hotel for a nights stay
review: We stayed at this hotel en route to our Mediterranean cruise out of Barcelona. The room was very large, by the European standard. The breakfast was great, the bar had cold drinks, and the staff was very friendly and helpful. The hotel is not in the best area, from first glance, but in the hotel by dark you should be ok. Free shuttle service to and from the airport/ cruise port was fantastic!

title: Great airport hotel!
review: Thank you very much for your good  review about your stay. We are glad to hear that you have a great time in Barcelona !

title: Free Airport Shuttle
review: We spent the night here before flying back to the States and could not have made a better choice.  The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful in every way, making sure that our luggage was whisked to our room, and giving excellent suggestions for returning our rental car and getting back to the hotel.  The dinner at their restaurant was very good for a hotel, and the breakfast was unusually good in terms of both choices and quality.

title: It's pretty! But shuttle situation needs some major adjustments!
review: Thank you very much for your great comments about staff and services !

title: Nice comfy room, slow check in
review: Not a bad hotel overall, free airport shuttle and location were the deciding factors. Shuttle driver could do with a recap on customer service skills. In summary, this a typical European hotel, rooms were clean, although my room was very small. Unusually for Spain they had access to irons in the room! Reception staff were friendly and the 'lounge' and bar area was nice with a reasonable bar menu, some veggie stuff. Some of the bar staff were a little unfriendly and should be careful about making assumptions - some overseas guests DO actually speak Spanish fluently!!

title: Superb dinner
review: We stayed here on our way out to England and again on our way back home to Girona. The first night we enjoyed a first class meal at a reasonable price. The staff in the dining room were friendly and curteous, the bar staff were also friendly and efficient and the receptionist was friendly and helpful. All the staff were smartly dressed and the lounge and the dining room were nicely furnished and relaxing. The pool was small but fun and the gym was very small but at least there was one there to use. The shuttle service was first class and the driver helpful. It was a splendid start and finsh to our holiday. Thank you.  Pam Cooper Girona.

title: Really nice experience
review: Thank you for your kind comments !.  We really appreciate that you found our staff splendid and you enjoyed your stay. Thank you

title: From confusion to more confusion
review: Stayed here night of May 3rd after 5 day cruise from Port of Barcelona -  knowing we were flying back home May 4th.  It is close to the airport and they have a great no charge  shuttle service (Picked us up at the Port at the end of our cruise and took us to the airport the next day). Don't be cheap about tipping the driver!  The hotel staff are well trained and motivated. All spoke English from excellent to good. Rooms are smallish but that is normal for Europe. Hotel is very clean, beautiful lobby with solid marble floors throughout. Nice coffee/cocktail bar.  We had excellent buffet breakfast included (you need to check if that will be true for you). The town of Del Prat is not very exciting. We spent an hour or two (daytime) walking around.   There are small cafes where you…

title: Fine for an overnight stay
review: Thank you very much for your comments about " well trained and motivated staff".

title: Unbelievable hassle with bill and incredibly poor customer service!!!
review: Just be careful when you ring this hotel for their free shuttlebus with the directions they give you.  I told the receptionist where I was ringing from in the airport, but she said that she did not know where this was to just find Parking G and the shuttle would be there.  Unfortunately, when you go down to parking it only goes to F, everyone ther seems to have a different idea where to go, so after an hour of searching I rang the hotel again, to be told that its in arrivals level. The signage to find parking g in arrivals is nearly non existant, and finally a cleaning lady directed me to this long walk to find the shuttle stop.  45 minutes later, still no shuttle, one of the other hotel drivers rang them, and they informed me that it would be another 20 minutes. 15.00 arrival…

title: Unreliable airport shuttle service!
review: The hotel appears to have only two shuttles and each carry only 6-7 passengers. We waited 45 minutes in the rain for the shuttle at the airport. The (male) manager is totally indifferent to any reasonable request. This is NOTfour star hotel service and the staff's attitude is unfriendly and unhelpful. If you have a plane to catch.......good luck! (And taxi fare from this distant hotel is 60 Euros!

title: "A Four Star Dump"
review: Thank you for your comments. We are sorry if due to the rain the pick up time increased. Our vans can carry at to 16 people.

title: Perfect spot near BCN
review: Situated at least 15 minutes from BCN Airport in a sad industrial, isolated area that matches the hotel perfectly. Small rooms with  some of the worst furniture I have ever seen in a hotel room. This is low end garage sell furnishings. They advertise WiFi but it was only working on the Lobby. Can't comment on the restaurant but will be forced to eat their tonight since the area is pretty devoid of civilization. Look elsewhere, this is a "dump".

title: HOT!  DAMMN HOT!!  To hot to sleep.
review: We deeply regret that you did not like the furniture of our hotel. We are really sorry

title: Hotel near the airport
review: The hotel is not far from the airport and offers free shuttle service.  You can take public transit from Barcelona and upon departing the RENFE train station, take a hard right and after maybe five minutes of walking, you're there.  It's surrounded by a pretty plain suburban neighborhood with some simple restaurants and shops nearby.  Free WiFi.  It's clean and common areas are spacious.  The decor must have been created by a person associated with 18th century royalty and country kitsch.  Odd.   Good staff.

title: Looks nice, but hat's about it.
review: Thank you very much for your comments about our staff and hotel. It is much appreciated !

title: Beyond Belief Frustrating Experience Here!
review: I booked this hotel so that I could use the gym sauna, and because of the hotel pickup. It took 35 minutes for the shuttle to arrive from the time we called. Once we arrived at the hotel, it took another 30 minutes to check in at the front desk. We got to our room, and the key didn't work. By the time we actually got into our room, it was 90 minutes after we had called the shuttle.   We found out when we arrived that he gym/sauna were only open from 9 am to 9 pm ( what?! A business/airport hotel??) therefore, we couldn't use it. Further, the food was plentiful but terrible and there was no  shampoo or body cream provided.

title: Great  hotel for stay near airport
review: We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the waiting time to get to your room. We have take note to futher improve our service, as many amenities as body cream in the room.

title: Very good  but new from outside and ancient from inside !!!
review: Hotel uses deceptive business practices on the internet!  Buyer Beware!    Emailed what I thought was the hotel early in the morning to get the airport shuttle's pickup location and instructions for my late afternoon arrival.  Hotel did not respond for about 8 hours and as of yet still have not received a response.  Arrived at the airport hotel shuttle bus stop and waited for a long period of time thinking it was due any moment.  Finally had to take a taxi to the nearby hotel and paid the minimum charge of 20 euros for 6.40 euros of actual service!  The front desk, who spoke english, was not at all accommodative to my extra expense and inconvenience as well as did not offer any hotel concession.  I explained that I had emailed the hotel in the morning asking for this information…

title: Quite satisfied
review: This hotel is easy to reach from the airport and their shuttle service is very practical. The bedroom had a very good price/quality ratio and I even took advantage of the small swimmingpool they have on the... third floor (I think). We had a problem with the air conditioning that was only blowing hot air out, but we managed to sleep very well despite the 22°C early evening (it could have been summer :-)  ) Very quiet and brilliant breakfast buffet in the morning. (better than the evening dinner in the restaurant, which did not have a very satisfying price/quality ratio) I do not see why we should not stay in this hotel anytime we fly to Barcelona  and particularly if we need to use the advantage of proximity to the airport. (not so sure about the restaurant... probably we will,…

title: Better than average airport hotel
review: Thank you very much for choosing us for future stays in Barcelona. We are glad to hear that you had a pleasant stay with us.

title: Perfect for late arrival or early departure
review: For a one night stay near the airport and port, the Ciutat del Prat was much better than expected.  The property is clean and well maintained, and aside from the flowery odor of disinfectant that seems to permeate the building, our stay was very pleasant and comfortable.  The hotel is in a rather strange location of mixed industrial and residential, but very little commercial activity nearby in the way of shops or restaurants.  Taxis will charge a 20 Euro minimum for the 10 minute ride from the airport, but the return trip on the free shuttle is very convenient.  I wouldn't count on trying to locate or call for the shuttle for pickup at the airport.  Recommended for an overnight stay, but for anything more I would look for a hotel in the city proper.

title: Excellent!
review: Thank you for finding our hotel a good choice for stop over Barcelona Airport.

title: Nice Hotel handy for airport and port
review: Reason for stay was late arrival, 20.00, and we decided to book this hotel. Perfect, clean hotel free shuttle bus from/to airport. NB! Shuttle from terminal 2 is exactly between buildings B and C. There is special stop for shuttle buses. Very easy to find.

title: Good hotel near to the airport - ideal for a one or two night stay
review: We stayed here post cruise so we could have a day in Barcelona and then be close to the airport for our departure the following day. The shuttle service was excellent and as many reviews on this site had said - make sure you reserve it the day/night before. Another good feature is the close proximity to the Barcelona metro - just a 7 minute walk away from the hotel. There is a good breakfast buffet with a fine range of items to choose from. The room and bathroom were spacious and clean and there was no noise from the street below.  The area is a mix of commercial and residential development and apart from a few cafe/bars - there is nothing to test the taste buds - my tip -  eat out in Barcelona. the hotel does have a restaurant and snack bar. We had a snack which was adequate. …

title: Great Choice!
review: Thank you very much for recommending our hotel for future cruisers. The shuttle have to be booked the day before leaving. Regards

title: Expectations fulfilled.
review: My husband and I stayed here 1 night after our cruise. The hotel picked us up from the ship and offered us a room for early check-in. The greeted us with coffee and croissant since the breakfast room closes at 10AM. Our room was small but nicley appointed with marble bath and very comfortable bed. There is a pool and sauna as well as fitness room. The breakfast buffet had something for everybody and selections  were great. Luis at the reception took good care of us and answered all our questions. There are stores in walking distance and the train is a few minutes away. We reserved the shuttle for the next morning and were brought to the nearby airport on time.

title: Convenient Location near to the Airport and priced about right
review: We are delighted to hear that you had a pleasant stay. Thank you for your kind comments about Luis and staff.

title: Return from Cruise
review: As it was to be the last night of the trip, we wanted a comfortable place close to the airport. And this hotel met the expectations. Nice clean room, fridge, good wi-fi signal, large bathroom. The staff at the desk was friendly. The girl that took care of us even spoke French. They also have a free shuttle to the airport which we took advantage of.   We had a drink at the bar which is curiously installed right across the entrance desk. The decor is impressive with high ceilings, marble all around and comfy leather couches. However the service was rather indifferent, the atmosphere cold and the beer cost twice the price.  That is about the only small critic we can make about this place. We did not try the restaurant. As there are quite a few cafés and cervecerias close-by, we…

title: convenient and functional
review: we stayed at this hotel for one night pre cruise.we did not use the airport shuttle as we did not want to have to wait for any time.the taxi rank outside is very efficient and we were on our way within 5 mins. the fare was 20 eurothe reception staff were friendly and efficient and we were able to book the shuttle to the port for the next morning.the cost was 17.50 euro each. the room was clean comfortable and had everything needed for a one night stay. there was a large bar area where we had a snack before retiring to bed. i found the hotel adequate if a little lacking in any atmosphere but perfect for a one night stay. I would not recommend it for a long stay. Just one little quibble.there are no coffee or tea making facilities. we didn't mind too much but a fellow traveller…

title: Experience at the Barcelona Location - AWFUL!!!!
review: Thank you for you comments. Our breakfast buffet opens at 06.00 am. However we have an early breakfast from 05.00 to 06.00 am in the bar ( coffe, pastries, juices. ..) in order to eat something begore your flight.

title: A very convenient transit hotel
review: I had read numerous reviews online with regards to this hotel and had felt confident that I was making a good choice. Upon arrival at the Barcelona Airport, we had to wait 45 minutes after a 7 hr flight for the shuttle bus to arrive. While we were waiting we did notice that the Renaissance shuttle bus made an appearance every 5 min. Needless to say we weren't impressed with Ciutat Del Prat especially seeing that the hotel is only 15 min away. After staying 2 nights at the hotel (and coming back to the hotel for a 3rd night) we asked to arrange for shuttle service to pick us up after our cruise, we were told they could not do that and we would have to call from the ship the day before we needed to be picked up. On the boat, we were told that we could not get picked up until…

title: Good hotel, but service was appalling
review: Sorry for any inconvenience caused by the tranfers. Once you are in BCN Airport it is necessary to call us to schedule a pick up. I undestand that you did not call us, so that is the reason why it took so long. Regarding the pick up at the harbour we do not have this service. We do only have transfers form the hotel to the port, not from the port to the hotel, unless that day at that day threre is a transfer programmed that you can use it the way back.

title: Good for staying near BCN airport
review: If you are on your way through Barcelona, either to board a cruise or on your way to the airport, this is a very convenient location and the hotel's free shuttle service is excellent!  Do not stay there if you want to be in the middle of all the action of the city, although that is only a short ride away.

title: This is a nice hotel
review: We stayed here one night post-cruise. It is a very nice hotel. Very clean, spacious, and the staff spoke perfect english and were very helpful.  Even though this hotel is outside of Barcelona there is a train station about a ten minute walk away and the buses run past here as well. It is only a short train ride to the main hub as well.  It is a quiet area with a few stores and restaurants around. Even at night it was very pleasant with lots of people walking their dogs in the area.  I thought the rooms were a nice size, very well kept, and the bathroom was quite large and all marble.  Overall I thought this was a very nice hotel and would definitely recommend it to anyone passing through Barcelona.

title: Clean Environment, Nice and Helpful Staff
review: Thank you very much for your comments about our staff and facilities.

title: Left us feeling a bit stung...
review: We stayed there from 9/22 to 9/24 before we board a cruise.  After we arrived the airport, we call the hotel, the shuttle arrived quickly, actually before we get to the hotel shuttle waiting place.  Because we got there around 9am in the morning, the rooms are not ready.  My 76 year old mother did not feel well so she decide not to go out with us.  I talked to the hotel staff request them to put her in the room when the room is ready.  Later after we return at night, my mom told me the staff very politely let her in the room at 11am.  The hotel is very clean, a bit walking to the train station though.  The breakfast (9 euro) food is good, dinner is 20 euro for three course menu and is a good price in Barcelona standard.  The only thing I can complain about is the shuttle driver…

title: The hotel website was misleading
review: Thank you very much for your review. I gave the room to your mother as soon as I could. Thank you !

title: Decent but that's all
review: As close to the airport as one can get in Barcelona, but still a fast 20 minute shuttle ride. The neighborhood did not look inviting to explore. The rooms are small and the smell of perfume or disinfectant had us opening the windows and gasping for fresh air. Honor bar was empty. Very high priced, and the buffet, which is extra but  a good deal, should be included at these prices. The lobby and eating areas are over lit lending a harsh look to the interior. The front desk staff were great. The bar/pub had the best food. Comfy bed, clean. Decor is nondescript. Good shuttle service to the airport. The key to the safe required a deposit, and they even wanted a deposit for a voltage converter to charge my phone for an hour. We would return if we had to, but next time may stay in…

title: Ok for short stay, out of town but close to airport
review: 1. Close to airport, 10 minute drive. Be patient with the shuttle service, takes half an hour at least for them to come, so ring once you exit the plane (know which terminal you are in 1 or 2 as they are a 5 minute drive apart). Book the service the day before you leave and make sure that you are early down in the lobby to get in. 2. Transportation to the center is ok, a 10 minute walk to the metro and a half an hour ride for 5 euro or simply a taxi from the hotel for 10-15. Prefer the taxi. 3. Can't judge the breakfast as it was not in the room price +12 euro. The coffee and croissant though cost only 2. 4. Very friendly staff, polite and helpful.  5. Views? Hello it's an industrial area, just commute to the center by train or taxi and sleep at the hotel. 6. Clean rooms, big…

title: Layover stay
review: thank you very much for the information provide on the side. It is accurate but please guests must call when they are in pick up area, Parking G in Terminal 1 but before. Otherwise the time to pick you up increase. Thank you

title: Pleasantly Surprised
review: I stayed here for a layover, and it was perfect. The free shuttle service worked just fine, they were at the airport when we got there and dropped us off early in the morning. The rooms and bathroom are clean, the pool is relaxing, there are restaurants nearby. We were coming from Ibiza where we stayed at a pretty terrible hotel and this was def. needed. The bathrooms are great! Definitely lives up to its 4 stars

title: Nice choice
review: Thank you so much for your positive review about  our hotel and services.

title: Good, comfortable and convenient hotel
review: We arrived around nine in the morning after a cruise and were able to check in. I had requested an early check-in and also a room in a quiet location. Both requests were met. I think we were at the end of a corridor. We didn't hear any other guests at all, nor street noise. The bathroom was quite large and spotlessly clean. The bedroom was fairly large, for European standards, and also was extremely clean. The bed was comfortable, but I'd have like more pillows. There are shops and restaurants basically right outside the hotel. It was pleasant to stroll about and buy bread, cold meats, wine and water. If you wanted, you take the train to Barcelona as the train station is very close by. We had tapas for our dinner which we ordered from the bar. They were quite tasty, except for a…

title: Would not recommend their transfer service
review: We booked this hotel as they offered complimentary airport transfers and also transfers to the cruise ships.  On the website it sates "(they) provide all you need for a successful business trip, a relaxing break in Barcelona".    To cut a long story short the pick up at the airport was awful, we waited (with a group of other hotel guests) for almost 2 hours to get picked up.  The driver was stressed and unhelpful.  At one point he arrived at the airport and took just the airplane crew and refused to take the hotel guests!  He said he had had not instruction from the hotel to take us?!  We were all left stranded and furious.  It took us less time to fly from Ireland to Barcelona than it did to get to the hotel.  People were ringing the hotel to complain and either getting cut off…

title: Relaxing end to our vacation
review: Thank you very much for leaving your comments about our hotel. Your comments helps us to improve our services.   I am surprised about your comments about our transfer service as we in general get very good feedback from our guests. -please see comments below-   Guests should contact the hotel by telephone upon arrival at Barcelona Airport, in order not to be waiting there. Maybe you did not.  However I would like to express my appologises for inconveniences caused and we hope that you will come back soon.

title: Nice hotel very convenient to the airport
review: We stayed at this hotel because it was close to the airport for our early morning departure.  It was very nice, clean, and well-priced.   The front desk staff was very cordial.   Free shuttle to and from the airport was available, but we chose to keep our car, so parking was an additional fee. But it was a secure underground parking lot.  There is not much to do around the hotel.  We walked a bit, but would not recommend it after dark.   The a/c worked very well, cable TV was nice, the bed was comfortable, and the bathroom was large.  We would definitely stay here again before leaving Barcelona.

title: Conveniently located near the airport, friendly staff
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to write such a good review about us !  We are glad that you found everything perfect. Hope to see you again in Barcelona !

title: Great airport package!
review: We stayed at this hotel when we disembarked from a cruise.  We needed to be near the airport for one night and needed a hotel with a free shuttle to the airport.  We also wanted it to have a pool.    The rooms were comfortable, though not very large.  We realized this is typical of many hotels in Europe.  The front desk staff were very, very helpful and friendly.  We did not expect our rooms to be ready because we were arriving before 10 a.m., but the hotel staff were able to get us into one of our rooms right then, with the other ready 30 minutes later.  This was such a great benefit to us.  We were about a 10 minute walk to the light-rail train station which made it very convenient for a 1/2 day trip into the city to visit Casa Batllo.   We did not use the hotel bar or…

title: Good place for an overnight stay on the way elsewhere
review: The Hotel Ciutat del Prat was quite nice and served as a good stopover before an early flight the next day.  The two advantages to the hotel are its proximity to the airport and its nice rooms.  I would definitely suggest this hotel while waiting for a flight, but little else.  The location is poor with respect to the city and there is not much to do nearby.  The room I stayed in was spacious and had a clean bathroom although the lack of portable shampoo and soap was odd (they had one of those soap dispensers mounted on the wall which tends to make a room feel cheap).  Room service was not the best.  I ordered a tuna sandwich and a glass of wine and waited an hour for it to be delivered-- I'm guessing it was not because the fish was freshly caught, cooked and prepped...  Parking…

title: Great Hotel for Early Morning Flights from Barcelona
review: We are glad to hear that you had a good stopover before your flight and you would suggest our hotel for future stays. Thank you

title: Very handy for airport
review: We booked this hotel for one night at the end of a 10 day cruise since our flight was very early in the morning the next day and it has free shuttle service to the airport starting at 4:45 am.  The hotel is very nicely appointed and in a pretty quiet area (although it is kind of an industrial area).  We checked in fairly early and our rooms were not ready yet (10 am) so we left our luggage and got directions for the train into downtown Barcelona.  The train station was a little hard to locate (go to second roundabout, go right, jog left at the end and then the station is on the far left in a steel and glass building that is not clearly labeled) but only a 10 to 15 minute walk, and then a 15 minute ride to downtown.  We didn't get to try the breakfast in the morning since we left…

title: Nice stay bang for the buck!
review: Thank you very much for your nice comments about our property. It is very important for us to continue improving our services. Hoping to see you soon again in Barcelona. Many thanks"

title: Airport Transit Hotel
review: We stayed here for one nite at the tail end of our Spain trip, then flew to Germany.  Turned in our rental car at La Prat (the Barcelona airport) and had the hotel shuttle pick us up.  It's only ten minutes from the airport.  On the wall, at the registration desk is a framed Trip Advisor Recommendation.  Made me laugh.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Room was spacious, rather plushly decorated and the large bathroom had marble walls and ceiling. Beautiful. This last feature, I erroneously attributed to a different hotel in Spain.  Oh well.  Very clean room and bath.  Large magnifying mirror. Good WiFi for our laptop.  Nice "green" door key circuit breaker feature.  Quiet room with good bed.  Didn't eat at the hotel, but my rental car driver (my bride) had 2 shots of tequila at…

title: Great Stay
review: We stayed in this hotel for one night for easy access to the airport and in and out of the city center. We couldn't have been happier.  When we arrived at the airport on a flight from Venice I called for the free shuttle to the hotel. The clerk told me where we should go to meet it and she would radio the driver to come and get us. The driver showed up in about ten minutes (which I think was really fast) in a clean comfortable van and we arrived  at the hotel in less than fifteen minutes. The clerk was very friendly and checked us in quickly, it was about 4:00pm so there wasn't any line. The lobby of the hotel was clean, but had a dated look to it. The large room however was furnished nicely, very clean, and did not have the dated look of the lobby.  The bathroom was also a good…

title: Avoid the hotel restaurant
review: Dear Sirs,  We are glad to heard that you have a pleasant stay between us. Thank you very much for your nice comments in Tryp Advisor. Hoping you choose us for a next time in Barcelona.   Best Regards

title: good airport hotel
review: Front desk staff: excellent, Airport Transfer: excellent  The hotel restaurant staff were plain rude. He had a smug, sly attitude as though the world owed him something huge for being the waiter at Ciutat del Prat. This more or less ruined my otherwise good impression of the staff at the hotel. I was charged a small fortune for a glass of still water at dinner. The restaurant food was absolutely vile - the worst microwave food (and I'm quite sure that is exactly what it was). Bad water pressure. Bed too soft. Poor bathroom amenities. Small pool. Poor gym.

title: Fit For Purpose (Pre-Cruise)
review: We are sorry that your impression of the restaurant service was not satisfactory., as it was your good review of the reception ans shuttle service "excellent". Hopefully you will stay with us in the near future to show you that our service and food in the restaurant is good.

title: fab review for airport stays
review: We chose this hotel for its convenience to the Barcelona airport and an early morning flight. The shuttle worked very well.  Check-in was very slow with only one person at reception and several people in line.  Rooms were nice.  We played cards and dined lightly at the bar across from reception.  We were very frustrated with their supposed wifi as we were never able to log on.  The man at reception attempted to help us, but we never did succeed.  We also tried to put a couple of euros into a computer for public use in the lobby.  It was so slow, we never even got to the site we needed before our time was up.  Do not rely on having internet access.  Other than that, I would recommend the hotel.

title: Convenient to the Airport
review: We chose this hotel because of it's convenience to the Barcelona airport.  We arrived in Barcelona at midnight from a flight from Granada and had tickets to fly to the USA at 11 am the next morning.  The front desk reception was curteous, the room was clean and in good condition,  and the bed was comfortable.   The bathroom was very clean.  The breakfast buffet had an extensive assortment of breads, meats, cheese, fruits and hot breakfast selection.  The hotel has shuttle service to the airport.  It was an excellent value and met our needs perfectly.  I would not select this hotel if wanting to tour Barcelona - it's not convenient to the sites most tourists want to visit.

title: Right Price - Excellent Standards
review: Thank you very much for your positive comments about or staff and the value rate. It is much appreciate

title: Just what I needed
review: My husband and I along with two children stayed here overnight en-route to the cruise ships at Barcelona. The hotel had a shuttle service from Barcelona airport (c. 10 min drive) and arranged a taxi for us the following morning. The rooms are stunning  and oversized. Free water and soda provided in the room. Unfortunately they do not have interconnecting rooms and we had to book two rooms but the total price was only €150.00.

title: Average Hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on tripadvisor. We are glad to heard that your familie  have a good time between us. Thank you

title: This place was a great finale to our honeymoon
review: Perfect place to stay. I stayed here for one night on a stay over to catch a connecting flight the next morning. Room was big, clean and comfortable. The bathroom was also big and clean with a great shower. Staff was helpfull, the free transfer to and from the airport is a great extra. All in all an example for lots of hotels on how a hotel should/can be.

title: Good value near the Barcelona Airport
review: We chose to stay at this hotel at the end of our visit to Barcelona because we had an early morning flight home to the U.S. and wanted to stay somewhere near  the airport with a shuttle.   This hotel was perfect for that.  It was clean and comfortable, nice queen  bed, TV, good bath and shower, nice bar and restaurant downstairs  and the price was right.  If you need the airport shuttle, make sure you go to the front desk and reserve a place  the day before your flight, or you might not get a seat.   Also make sure you know which airport terminal your flight uses,  because the terminals are quite far apart.     This is probably not a hotel you'd want to use for sightseeing or nightlife;  there's not much to do or see in the immediate neighborhood.   The breakfast in the hotel …

title: Lovely hotel, interesting stay
review: Thank you very much for your positive review. The information you provide about transportaion and facilities on site is accurate. Thank you

title: Great value near BCN
review: We rang the shuttle bus for this hotel upon arriving in BCN. After waiting....... and waiting...... we got a taxi. Be warned Barcelona Airport taxis set a minimum of 20 Eur fare for any trip.   Arrived at hotel and went to check in. This took ages as we answered questions regarding what kind of bed(s), smoking or non - everything we had answered on the booking form already. Got the code for WIFI and went up to the room.   The room was beautiful, spacious and clean. Same for the bathroom. There were handy little travel kits left in the bathrooms for guests, lovely touch. Excellent water pressure and plenty of info on Barcelona available for guests. One criticism would be that the air con gauge didn't work so the room was like a sauna.   The waiter was let's say a character... He…

title: Needs refurbishment
review: Thank you very much for your review on tripadvisor.   We have recently changed our Restaurant' menu and we hope to see you back soon.

title: Rude Clerks trump everything else
review: If you need to stay near Barcelona airport, this 4 star hotel is a great value. Rooms are clean and good size. Convenient shuttle to the airport.

title: Beware of shuttle from airport
review: Stayed here on our last night in Spain for convenience to airport.  When we arrived from Seville the evening before our early morning flight out, we called the hotel shuttle and were told it would be 15-20 minutes.  45 minutes later, it finally showed up and although we were the first ones there, about a dozen people came rushing in from around the corner and filled the van by the time we had loaded our luggage.  The van driver didn't seem to care and left before we could grab our 3rd and last piece off the van!  Called the hotel to ask them if they could get that piece and although he said he would,  when they came around again 20 minutes later, it was still there...guess that's better than losing it.  After finally arriving at the hotel- obviously no tip for that driver- we…

title: Excellent Airport Hotel
review: We stayed here the night before our early morning flight home. The staff were excellent & very helpful, the breakfast room opened at 6am & had a great choice of hot food. Our double room was a good size & good value for the price. The shuttle bus to the airport ran on time & everything went without a hitch. We used the pizza place just 100m down the road from the Hotel, & on the same side of the road for dinner which was excellent.  This Hotel is a good choice for anyone arriving or departing Barcelona.

title: Good choice if you need a hotel close to BCN airport
review: As I had to catch a flight at Barcelona Airport early morning, I was looking for a good deal in the El Prat area. The hotel is in walking distance from El Prat train station (from where you can get to Barcelona city centre within 15 min) and in close proximity to the terminals (the free shuttle takes you there in about 10 min). The hotel itself is of average quality with relatively small rooms and breakfast which is alright. Good value for money.

title: This is a hidden gem
review: You will not be sorry if you stay here. It is just a couple of minutes from the airport and only a short train ride to Barcelona city center. It is very clean and staffed by nice and helpful employees. I was pleasantly surprised.

title: Best choice near Barcelona's airport
review: Another TripAdvisor success story!  After reading reviews on this and a few other hotels near the Barcelona airport, we decided to stay at Salles Ciutat del Prat for our flight transfer overnighter.  We'd been concerned about noise, cleanliness, and shuttle service, based on the reviews for all the hotels in the airport area.  Happily, we found Salles to be perfectly clean, and the room had an extra inner door that isolated the sleeping area from the entryway, so it was very quiet.  And for a bonus, the hotel's restaurant had an exceptional offer: large appetizer, entree, and dessert all for just 20 euros.  My wife and I both enjoyed our meals, especially the amazing desserts (best flan in a long time, and the chocolate roses were out of this world).  Hard to beat, though the…

title: Perfect for airport transfer
review: The hotel runs a free airport minibus service from 4 am (you must book in advance). Good value for money compared to prices in central Barcelona and you avoid all the problems and cost of trying to get to the airport. I wouldn't especially recommend this hotel if you are planning a sightseeing trip to Barcelona; there would be better options in other locations - although there is a train and bus service near. The rooms/bathrooms are OK - furnishings are pretty dated and the bathroom facilities clean but minimal. Prat de Llobregat is not a particularly attractive place but to spend a night before catching an early-morning flight it is ideal.

title: Pleasant surprise for our last night in Spain
review: As with many others, this was our 1-night stopover in Barcelona before flying home. The shuttle system worked fine for us, by the time we got out of the airport building the van was waiting, and got us back to the airport in the morning. However, we had a European cell phone to call with, without that it could have been pretty inconvenient.  The facility is standard business hotel, staff helpful and efficient, large comfortable room. I think we expected something more sketchy from some of the reviews ..  It is true this is no place to stay to be among the central sights of Barcelona, but we walked 10 minutes to the Renfe train station and another 20 minute ride and we were at the Ramblas for dinner for a 2.40 Euro fare. There is a guest computer, but it is not free.  Actually,…

title: Service Average - Airport Pickup: Don´t count on it
review: Me and my wife stayed at the Sales Ciutat del Prat in mid April 2010. The hotel lobby and common areas are nice, though the rooms feel a bit "late 80´s" and could use some  remodelling and better decor. In general you will get what you need for a good night´s sleep. No more, no less. Don´t think about this hotel if you want to enjoy the property (pool, gardens, or relaxing in your room won´t be an enjoyable experience  here).   However, one area where the hotel truly FAILS is the airport shuttle service. Although their webpage indicates an airport shuttle is available, you have to call the hotel for the shuttle to arrive. There is no direct phone at the airport and although the airport shuttle station has the hotel´s logo, it is absolutely useless if you just wait there, as the…

title: Convinient and great value
review: I couldn't be happier with this choice. The staff is very friendly. The rooms are quite large for European standdards. The bathroom is probably the biggest bathroom I've seen in Europe and bigger than hotels in the US. Rooms are nicely decorated. Excellent hotel when you need to stay near the airport. Free wi-fi if you take your laptop, if you use their computers, there's a charge of 6 Euros for an hours. Restaurants, grocery stores and shopping centers nearby. I wouldn't find such a nice hotel in the US for the price. Would definetly recommend it and would certainly stay there again. Free shuttle to airport

title: Excellent value, great staff!
review: As mentioned earlier, in a bit of an industrial area, so don't expect to sightsee around the hotel. 10 minute walk to train to get downtown, free airport shuttle, close to port and airport. 20 Euros (plus tip) for a taxi downtown. Nice pool and rooms, and free wireless internet. Staff went out of their way to accomodate, whether storing bags after checkout, or letting us check back in early. Front desk people were all excellent! The bottles of pop and water in the fridge are complimentary, not just a way to nail you for minibar charges. Nice TVs, though only one or two with English-speaking channels. DO NOT MISS the pizza/ice cream place on the opposite side of the street (out the front door, and make a right, you will pass another pizza place on same side as the hotel. At the…

title: Convenient airport hotel
review: We needed to come back from Rome the night before our return flight back to the states and decided to grab a nearby hotel close to the airport. This ended up being the nicest place out of our 3 city tour... Too bad we only stayed over night. The hotel isn't close to anything else but the airport so don't expect to stay here and see the sites in Barcelona easily but if you need to access the airport, this is a good place to stay. They had a free shuttle running to the airport which was great. The person working the front desk was very nice despite being really busy with calls and checking in the people in front of us. Very pleased with our stay here.

title: Comfortable, clean and good value for money
review: We stayed at this hotel for one night before a cruise.  It is very close to the airport and about a 10 minute drive to the cruise terminal.  When we arrived at the airport quite late we phoned the hotel and they came to pick us up.  The shuttle bus is free of charge.  On arrival at the hotel we were greeted by a friendly receptionist who promptly checked us in then  we had a drink and a sandwich at the bar.  The room was very clean and the bathroom in particular was very nice.  We had a good nights sleep and in the morning had breakfast which was included in the room rate.  The breakfast was ok.  Nothing special but adequate.  I think this hotel is very good value for money.  We booked using Travel Republic.

title: No hot shower!
review: We chose this hotel because we had to fly out of Barcelona airport early next morning. We had a good stay until the day of the departure. We had to leave the hotel at 6:45am, so we woke up at 5am to get ready. We wanted to take a shower before our long flight back to San Francisco. We turned on the shower, waited for 10 minutes or so, but no hot water. We called the front desk and they sent a lady to check the shower. For some reason, our shower doesn't get warm. They gave us a different room to take a shower. We went to the room but still... no hot water. The time was running out and we really had to get ready and go to the airport. We had no choice, so we had to take a quick cold shower... That was very miserable and so cold...  They had a free shuttle to the airport every 30…

title: Good Overnight Hotel at BCN
review: Ciutat del Prat is a great choice for overnight stays at the Barcelona Airport.  The rooms are nice, and the marble bathroom and entry even nicer.  The room size is on the smaller size for this type of hotel, and the bed not the best; there are two or three floors that are non-smoking.  Free shuttle service is available from the airport, but you must call for pick-up (have the number and terminal ready) and make a reservation on their schedule for a return; the van is marked with a yellow “S”.   There is free wireless Internet in the room, but you need the security code from the friendly front office staff.  There were no English channels on the TV, which is a large LCD. Bathroom amenities are minimal so bring your own shampoo and things.  It is a fifteen minute walk to the rail…

title: No shuttle! No pool!
review: i stay in this hotel for one night. i select this hotel because only this hotel have shuttle for all time, and i need a pool. But! No pool after 21:00, and no shuttle before 6:00. And if you have more than one bag, forget about shuttle too. Never visit this hotel from 20:00 until 6:00. And finally it was very noisy. Window in my room was closed, but i heard a cars noise, noise of suitcase wheels, like it was opened. No shuttle, no pool and no sleep....

title: Very nice hotel!
review: The trick when driving to the hotel is to follow the signs for the airport, and then the signs for El prat de llobregat (de neighborhood where the hotel is located). Don't try to map your own route from one highway to the next, as this might not get you to the hotel as fast as you could have. The hotel is a very nice one, located conveniently close to the airport when you need to fly out the next day. The room was big with a very very nice bed and a large bathroom and there is free wireless internet if you want to use it.

title: Ideal airport hotel
review: After reading a mix of reviews, we booked this hotel for a one night stay pre cruise. We stayed in this hotel on  november 14th 2009, in rooms 320 and 321, we were going on a cruise the next day so needed to be close to the port. In our opinion this hotel more than met our expectations, the rooms were spacious, they had amenities in the bathroom, It has a pool and a restaurant and serves bar meals, The lobby area was very nice and bright. The only gripe was the air con was useless, and being November was still needed so I dread to think what it would have been like in the height of summer. The area is not the best for shopping , but there is a piza place a couple of mins away. There is a free airport transfer that was quick so on the whole we rate this hotel as excellent and…

title: Acceptable airport hotel
review: My wife and I stayed at the hotel for one night to accommodate an early flight. The taxi from the marina area of Barcelona was just under €20 including the luggage supplement.  The hotel itself looks relatively modern with a light (but pretty fussy) lobby. The check-in was painless, the receptionist spoke good English and we booked the shuttle for the following morning as we checked in.  The rooms are average, decent sized even by American standards with a large bathroom containing a sink with large vanity for storing toiletries, toilet, bidet, bathtub with in-tub shower. The water was hot and  had good pressure. The bathroom was clean.  The complimentary WiFi worked but it was pretty slow, one wouldn't want to try and perform anything complicated with it. The TV had numerous…

title: Close to the airport, but was it worth it?
review: We stayed here for one night post cruise. We thought it would be easier (or at least cheaper) to get to the airport VERY early the next morning, but it turned out that we ended up paying just as much for a cab to the airport as we would have from the Old Town area (where we had stayed pre-cruise.) The lobby of the Salles Ciutat del Prat was nice, and they let us check in VERY early (around 8:00am) which was convenient. But the room was just OK. And it was very hot but they had the AC turned off for the season. We slept with the window open, but the mosquitos ate us alive! There were also doors slamming all night long. Since we had to get up at 3:00am for an early flight, we really didn't end up getting any sleep. We wished we had just stayed at out first hotel (Hotel Colon) in…

title: Reasonable Place to Stay Near Airport
review: We booked this hotel last minute -- we landed in Barcelona around 9PM and had a 6AM flight out the next morning.  It is about 15 minutes from the airport.  The number we had for the hotel was just a booking service so we were unable to call for the shuttle and took a taxi.  It is apparently city policy in Barcelona that all trips from the airport are charged at a minimum of 20 euros -- so even though this hotel is very close it is still a marginally expensive taxi ride.  Check-in was the low point of the hotel.  The guy at the front desk, Tico, was not very welcoming and quite short with his comments.   The check-in process also seemed quite involved with scanning of passports, typing in a great many details, printing this and that, and so on.   I would never want to arrive when…

title: OK, but not overwhelmed
review: Our original plan for staying at this hotel was in order to catch an early morning flight and because they had a free shuttle.  We ended up having to stay longer because my mother broke her knee on our trip leading up to our stay here.  She arrived in an ambulance and was brought in on a stretcher to the foyer.  I checked us in and decided to lug the luggage to the room first to get everything in place.  They gave us a room about as far away from the elevator as you possibly could get.  Considering my mom could hardly move with a cast up to her thigh and broken ribs, I asked if we could get a room closer to the elevator.  They were nice enough to give us a handicap room -- still a trek from the elevator but with much wider doors and with a handicap bathroom.  That made a huge…

title: great for a night before an early flight
review: We stayed in the hotel for one night before an early flight back home.  It is awfully decorated but is otherwise fine. You can get there by train from Sants station in Barcelona, it takes 10-15 minutes and costs 1,35 Eur /single journey/. The miniibar, safe and wireless internet /you need to ask for a code/ is free, there is a gas station just opposite the hotel so you can buy something to eat, drink, read... We booked the schuttle the night before and had no problems, you should check if your flight is from Terminal 1 or 2 because they are quite far from each other  and you need to tell the driver.

title: Handy for airport , and could be a decent base for the city
review: Shuttle bus arrived about 15 minutes after the call (10 pm) but with two of us and another group at the other terminal it took two trips; daytime they have two minibuses. But avoid a taxi (€20 minimum from the airport, even for 2km to this hotel). There is a local bus PR1 from the airport to El Prat that goes to within 5 minutes walk of the hotel (N17 at night, a few minutes walk away) but the shuttle should be fine.  Tried the pool - small, shallow, and only gets sun in the middle of the day (a part-glazed roof) but quite nice, and the sauna.  Room fine - not much to look at from the window - but decent 4-star standard, and it can be very cheap (€60 a room) for what you get because of its distance from the city. So could you use it a base? If you want to be central and pop back…

title: Cheap but not cheerful
review: We stayed here on the last night of our holiday as being in El  Prat de Llobregat it would be less stressful to travel to airport next day-big mistake! Found hotel without problem, but on leaving next day found local directions to airport practically non-existent and ended up going in opposite direction to airport. The hotel is situated in residential apartment area for locals-not a particularly attractive small town with no real centre-just urban sprawl. This would have been Ok , if the hotel had offered the restaurant service it advertised in its glossy information pack. The a la carte menu advertised was not available-all they offered was a hot/cold buffet at 20 Euros each. The buffet had obviously been displayed for at least 2 hours when we viewed it at  8pm and by then the…

title: Comfortable hotel, recommended
review: Stayed here on two occasions for one night, as Iberia used this hotel for passengers that missed their flight (both times due to delays in the previous IB flight).  The hotel is very nice, friendly staff, very good and tasty breakfast and dinner. The hotel is close to the airport with a complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport. Not sure about the connectivity to the city centre of Barcelona, as we had to get an early flight the next morning (both times).

title: great for night before early flight
review: We had a very early flight from Barcelona, and this hotel was an excellent place to spend the night.   If you are arriving from the airport, you do need to call for the van to pick you up. We didn't have a mobile phone, but a good Samaritan used his mobile to call for us. The hotel said someone would pick us up in fifteen minutes but the van was there in ten.  Check in was efficient. The room was quiet and clean and perfectly adequate. My only complaint is that the walls are thin, and I could hear voices and coughing in the next room. There was no outside noise, though. The bed was comfortable. One surprise was the very nice amenity kits, quite unusual for such an inexpensive hotel. Our free ride to the airport at 5 a.m. was great.  I think this hotel is an excellent value and I…

title: Great Hotel
review: We stayed at this hotel for one night, on 1st of February since we had an early flight next morning.  The service was ok, the room was clean, the bathroom clean and modern. I recommend this hotel if you're spending 1-2 nights in Barcelona, but it is not suitable for visiting Barcelona. It is far away from the centre of the city.  The only inconvinient was the fact that we had to wait for the shuttle bus for about 45 minutes until it arrived at the airport to pick us up even if the distance from the airport is 10 minutes by car.  Anyway, is an excellent hotel for one nights stand.  Regards, Alina.

title: Hotel was fine, but service made it miserable
review: We had a wonderful week in Barcelona staying in an apartment in the city, but decided to stay at the Ciutat del Prat for our last night since we had a very early flight the following morning.  We were under the impression that the hotel sent a bus every half hour or so to the airport to pick up any guests (in fact, we were told this at the information desk inside the airport!), but that was not true.  So eventually we called the hotel and asked them to come pick us up.  Even though the hotel is only about 10 minutes from the airport, they said they would not be able to pick us up for a half hour.  That half hour turned into a little over an hour!  Then there were about 20 of us waiting by the time the bus arrived, but the bus only had room for 7 people.  We had actually debated…

title: Perfectly Adequate Hotel
review: Spent a night here on my first business trip to Barcelona.  Wanted somewhere close to the airport.   Rooms are small but nicely decorated.  The bathroom is almost as big!  The staff were friendly and attentive.   The restaurant is reasonably priced and the standard of food is good.  I recommend the house wine too - the sommelier must really know his stuff.   Altogether a pleasant stopover.  Recommended.

title: Nice Hotel but terrible Airconditioning
review: Unlike some previous reviewers we found all the staff happy and friendly. We could not fault them. The hotel was in an industrial area but it was safe and ok. Reception areas and rooms were nice and though it was really small the pool area was fine.  Our only complaint was the air conditioning. The heater and air con work on the same system so only one system works at one time. Though it was January the room was warm so we tried to cool it. After several minutes we realised hot air was blowing out and the room was really hot. A call to reception confirmed this is a usual hotel issue.

title: Highly recommended!
review: We had a wonderful stay at Cuitat del Prat.  Totally recommend it!  Our room was beautiful and well serviced, and the reception staff were very helpful and spoke good English. It's a 10 minute walk to the nearest metro station (La Prat del Llobregat - reception can give you a map) and then a 13 minute train trip into Barcelona's central station (Sants).  You can buy a T-10 metro ticket for 7.20 EUR, which gives you 10 metro trips and can be used for multiple people (just pass it back after you swipe it). We thought it was quite handy to the city centre and did not experience any of the negative things some have mentioned below.  This is a very nice place to stay!

title: Great airport hotel.
review: We stayed at this hotel the night of Oct. 31st because we had an early morning flight the next day.  Room was clean & comfy; hotel staff was courteous and very helpful and, best of all, there was a complimentary shuttle to the airport.  All in all, a good experience if you want to be close to the airport for an early morning flight.  Would definitely stay there again.

title: ideal as an airport hotel
review: First to clear up any misunderstandings; this is the same hotel as the Salles Ciutat de Prat. Having stayed at all the "Barcelona Airport" hotels - none of which is actually at the airport itself - this is the best of the small bunch. It does not have a corporate air, it's food is excellent (both buffet breakfast and high quality dinner), the rooms are comfortable and it has its own shuttle service to the airport, less than 10 minutes away. It has its own car park, where rates are on a par with parking at the airport itself, i.e. quite expensive, it is not really a suitable base for a tourist visit to Barcelona, being too far away from the city, (although easily reachable by train and bus), and it is situated in a not particularly attractive town. But for a pre-flight or…

title: Rooms were good...but the service totally sucked
review: Rooms were clean and convenient... But the receptionist was extremely rude and crass..  If you like neat rooms and dont mind a scornful welcome when you land ....then this is the place to be!

title: Avoid at all costs
review: Probably the worst 4* hotel we have had the misfortune to stay in!! Restaurant was closed on Saturday night, staff on the whole not helpful and one at least very rude. The rooms were disgusting. Our complaints were completely ignored. Just don't go. You would have to be a prat to stay here!!

title: Ok hotel, terrible breakfast
review: We stayed at the hotel for one night because of the close location to the airport. The hotel was ok for this price, the service was good and the room was clean. They had a swimmingpool, but it was "inside" and not like in the pictures in the hotel information in the room (with a jacuzi). The breakfast was not included. It cost 15 euros and was NOT worth the money. They did not have fresh bread and everyting else tasted bad.  The location is 10 min away from the airport. I dont know if there is a bus, we had a rental car. The area around has a few bars etc., but not any good restaurants. I would not stay there again.

title: Good hotel near airport
review: Nice clean comfortable room.  If you want to park you will need to get directions from reception to underground car park (15 euros per night).  Don't think I would want to stay here if we had been visiting Barcelona as it is a bit far out, but was ideal for overnight stop.  Would stay here again.

title: Good hotel next to the airport
review: I've booked this hotel because I wanted to start driving towards the pyrenees right in the morning after arriving at Barcelona. We arrived on a rainy night at midnight. The checked in went quickly and smoothly, the room was very nice and clean. Much better value for money than hotels in downtown BCN. The reception desk lady was very helpful and made every effort to navigate by car out of Del-Pratt.

title: A great airport hotel and base for the city centre "BEWARE BEING RIPPED OFF"
review: We stayed at this hotel from 1st to 5th june 08 expecting a twin room and got a king!! bonus, on arrival we asked a male receptionist about a bus to the city centre, he said there was`nt one, but he could call a taxi for 20 -25 euros!  bit suspect we thought, but we had already read that there were busses, so we went out and asked around sure enough you can get one not far from the hotel and at 1.30 euro`s p.p very cheap, its a 165 el prat express which runs regularly you come out of the hotel turn right and walk towards the supermarket a little walk away just on the roundabout there is a bus stop, on the opposite side of the road to the hotel, I have since read that you can also turn left ouside the hotel and catch a number 21 bus, but either way no probs getting into the city…

title: Good overnight, would stay again
review: This hotel is relatively close to the airport and they do have a free shuttle in the morning that you book the day before.  It is however quite far away from the shopping and sites of Barcelona.  We walked the 10mins to the train station and were in the action in about 30mins.  Rooms were clean, antique furniture was neat.  Pool area was enclosed so very quiet and sauna was hot.  We left to early to hit the breakfast.  For an overnight this was great but if your in Barcelona for more than a day or so, you would probably want accomodations closer to the tourist areas.

title: More than we had expected
review: This hotel offered everything that we needed during our stay. The room was large and comfortable although I'm not one for "fake flowers" which were part of the decor. The sheets were of a high standard, the air conditioning worked well, the bed was comfortable (we did ask for extra pillows), every corner was clean, and the free mini bar was convenient.  It is located in a residential neighborhood which means plenty of small shops and places in which to eat. The lobby is quite roomy with a bar and there are two computers (with printer) for guests' use for a small fee.  The free airport shuttle was a real bonus because the taxi charges in Barcelona are extremely high.

title: Good outweighs the bad
review: There is nothing fancy about the hotel, but it was all we needed for an overnight stay.  The room design was outdated, but it was very spacious and clean.  The bathroom was big too.  The only thing that worried me was that the water was not hot enough, but tolerable.  There was also wifi internet service in the room.  The front office staff that checked us in was very nice and friendly, which made a big difference, given our chaotic experience at the Barcelona airport.  The shuttle was on time too.  If you're staying in Barcelona for a longer period of time, this probably won't be the ideal hotel.   Hoever, Ciutat del Prat fit all our needs for an airport hotel.

title: Good for what we needed
review: Because we are a bi-racial couple, we were hesitant to book this hotel due to a negative review re. the hotel's service to minorities. But we took a chance and were happy we did. The people at the hotel were actually very accomodating and even offered to talk to the pizza-delivery place for us when we ordered dinner by phone. (Neither of us speak Spanish too well.)  The location is pretty far from Barcelona proper, so we would recommend this hotel only if you need to stay close to the airport. Also, the shuttle picked us up from the airport much later than we thought it would. We would've given a higher rating if the shuttle service to the hotel was better.

title: A tired hotel and a very ordinary experience
review: We stayed here for one night in February when we needed to be close to Barcelona airport.  We chose it based on it having received the best reviews of the other hotels in the area.  However we were rather disappointed.  Although built in 2001, and looking modern from the outside, it feels very much older.  The style is very 'Seventies Spanish' with old, elaborate furniture and a very dated decor.  The bathroom was large but the marble fittings were showing considerable signs of wear.  The shower over the bath was only just adequate.  The bed was reasonably comfortable but there were only two bolster style pillows for two people and these were very flat.  Maybe we could have asked for more but we were already tired and frazzled.  The room was adequately clean but the ageing…

title: not as advertised!
review: watch out what you are getting yourself into. The hotel is not near the airport and shuttle is not provided as per advertisement.  I am very dissapointed, especially because I paid extra $50.00 for the convinience of location and shuttle availability

title: good overnighter
review: Ciutat del Prat Close to airport.  Free shuttle available to and from airport.  Came within 15 mins for me but another couple waited 1 hour.  Need to call hotel for shuttle (message starts in Spanish with English translation later).  Room was clean.  Very convenient if you need to get to the airport early the next morning.

title: Good Choice
review: We chose this hotel as it was near to the airport with a free shuttle as we were picking up a hire car at the airport 2 days later.  We used the hotel shuttle bus which arrived in a few minutes.  We found this hotel excellent value for money, the rooms were of a good standard and the breakfast more than adequate.  We used the train to get to the centre which was a 15mins walk from the hotel.  If I had been staying more than 2 nights I would have booked a hotel in the centre to save the train journey back and forwards but the hotel itself I couldn't fault.

title: A surprisingly good hotel
review: I booked this hotel for a three night stay in Barcelona.  I was travelling with my husband and another couple.  Although I had read reviews that the hotel was not really suitable for a base to visit Barcelona's attractions, the hotel was cheap and we decided to give it a go.  We caught the free hotel shuttle outside arrivals without any problems and arrived at the hotel at around 11am.  We weren't able to check-in until 1.30pm but we left our luggage in the luggage room and set off outside to look around the local area.  It is an industrial area but there are a few shops and bars nearby.  We checked into our rooms and we were not disappointed - the decor was pleasant and the bathroom was spacious.  The complimentary soft drinks in the minibar and the toiletries packs were a nice…

title: Good airport hotel
review: Good airport hotel with nice room decorated in a boutique style. Very good breakfast with nice dishes to choose (even calamares ;).  Hotel has own 24 h transfer  between El Prat Airport and Hotel (about 5 minute journey). The buses stop is between terminal 2 and 3 or you have to just call the hotel reception. Also 4 soft drinks (water, coca cola, juices) in your minibar are included in your room price so nice surprise after arrival  Recommended :)

title: Cute Boutique Hotel in an Industrial Neighborhood
review: As noted in the title above, this hotel was a pretty nice hotel. I was very surprised and impressed at how beautiful and romantic the room decor was; the bathroom was pretty roomy, modern, and very clean - all marble. Note that this hotel has a free shuttle that picks you up from the airport, but you must CALL the hotel to tell them you're there (unlike other hotels, that run a shuttle every x amount of minutes); they also lag a little on the pickup so expect to wait ~20 minutes longer then they say. We arrived pretty late at night and decided on grabbing a quick bite at the hotel bar and found that it was average food at high prices (even though the price was much better then if we had chosen to dine in the restaurant, which closes at around 11-11:30 pm). As this was the first…

title: Fine airport hotel
review: It gets the job done as an airport hotel but that's about it.  The free shuttle picked us up at 1am from the airport and drove us back in the morning.  The location is creepy but who cares.  I wouldn't stay here for any reason but convenience to the airport.  If you need to call the shuttle, the hotel phone number is on the hotel shuttle pick up sign outside the airport.

title: Great Airport Hotel
review: If you need a hotel for an overnight, this is it.  The room was clean and big, and the bathroom also was big.  It even had disposable toothbrushes, toothpaste, comb, blade and the fridge had a couple of sodas and water for free too.  I booked this hotel for the free shuttle and I called them from the airport and they gave me a pickup location (late at night too) and then I booked it for my return to the airport the next day.  Both were on time.

title: Avoid this hotel at all cost!!!
review: The physical infruastrucure of the hotel was great i. e room etc but the customer service for ethnic minority client was far from acceptable. The staff was very unhelpful and rude each time we rang or went to the front desk to enquire about anything. Even attemtped to over charge us on check out. The bar was closed when we tried to get stuff to drink and order food. It was very obvious the service we recieved was very different from  the caucasian clients at the hotel. We were not even informed or offer the free shuttle to the airport as the others were.  I highly recommend all ethnic minorities avoid this hotel.

title: Great hotel if you want to be near the Airport
review: If you need to be near the Barcelona airport then this is the hotel. Upon our arrival to the airport we called for a free shuttle. It arrived within 15-20 minutes. The pickup point is outside between terminals B&C and has a sign listing the hotels serviced. The hotel itself was very clean and quiet and the room was a good size. The fitness room was really small but fit our needs. We skipped breakfast and went down the street. Like another reviewer wrote, turn right outside the door and go down a couple blocks. On the right side is a good bakery with coffee too.  Overall, a great deal and the service & staff were excellent.

title: Fine airport hotel
review: Our family of four stayed just one night en route for the Costa Brava after a late evening arrival at Barcelona airport.  The airport shuttle worked just fine and we were not left waiting too long at the airport. The front desk was excellent, making us feel very welcome on arrival and providing very good advice about public transport the following morning. The rooms were very comfortable indeed and the sumptuous marble bathrooms very well equipped. As well as the usual toiletries the hotel also provided a shaving kit, disposable toothbrush and show polish. The minibar was stocked with soft drinks at no extra cost. There were very good business facilities with free wi fi and nice conference rooms.   The breakfast was hard to fault-perhaps the only negative was the fact that the…

title: Great Airport Hotel
review: This hotel is a great hotel for the airport. There is a free shuttle which picks you up or drops you off from the airport which is about 5 minutes drive away.  The hotel itself was modern and clean, the bed was v comfortable and the bathroom spacious. It is also convenient to get to the centre of Barcelona too from this hotel, you will need to walk 5 minutes and you will get to a train station which you can take to the centre in about 15 minutes. The trains are also quite frequent - every 15 minutes or so and also run until quite late.  We didn't try the other facilities they had at the hotel like the gym or pool or jucuzzi unfortunately. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: VEr nice, right next to airport for quick gettaway
review: Not much to add from other reviewers. Excellent hotel and location. We stayed there 2 days ago as we had an early flight back to the States on Sunday. Very nice room. TV. Free mini-bar (no alcohol). Free shuttle to the airport, about a 8-10 min. ride. Train station to Barcelona city is close also. 10 min. walk. and will cost you 1.20 euro for a one way ticket.  I suggest you skip breakfast in the hotel and go to a really good pastry/cafe half a block away. When you exit the hotel, make a right down that main street and it is at the end of the block. Great coffee and pastries for a few euros.  If you want a good pizza for diner make a right when you exit the hotel and walk about half a block. It is the first restaurant you will find. Makes really good pizzas out of some kind of…

title: Convenient to airport
review: Recently stayed at Hotel Cuitat del Prat in Barcelona the night before leaving Spain.  The rooms were clean and spacious.  They do need to do some renovations as the hallway carpets were worn.  But the lobby is very nice and the front desk staff were  helpful and courteous.  The plus here is its close proximity to the airport and free airport shuttle which runs 24/7.  Our shuttle driver patiently waited with us at the airport as our relatives returned their rental car, that was a surprise.  Got a great rate online.

title: Excellent airport hotel!
review: Great hotel, impressed. Location good, and if you have qualms about getting to airport on time, stay here on the last night. It's 2 minutes away and they offer free shuttle to and fro. Just call them when you arrive and they'll get you. In fact, make sure you do as the taxis charge min. 12.30 euro plus a baggage surcharge per item. The meter read 3 euros when we arrived but the fare with our 3 bags was 15 euros.  Walking distance to train (not metro) station and you can get to the heart of Barcelona for 1.20 euros each. Be warned it takes about 25 minutes, but it could take that long in rush hour by car.  Clean, safe seeming for an industrial/commercial area.   Hotel is very nice, modern, new, marble floors, modeled after an Itlian palace. Rooms are really nice, clean,…

title: Clean and great for catching an early flight
review: The hotel is clean but the lobby is filled with the aroma of cigarettes. They do have non-smoking rooms that have cleaner air. I stayed here because I had to catch a 6am flight. The hotel is very close to the airport (~ 1 mile away), with free shuttles running starting at 4am.

title: Nice hotel but industrial location
review: Okay for the price nice hotel but step outside and it smells like a sewer system..probably because you are in walking distance of all kinds of factories.  Good to stay for the night to catch a plane from the airport but make sure you know your directions especially if driving a rent a car here.  Circled the city 3 times before we found the place and when we arrived found that they had no place to unload so had to park in handicapped parking to unload the luggage!
